Reviews.Author: Jenk
Reviews.Content: UPS driver dropped it off at my doorstep without a signature. Of course the right thing to do was to claim I didn't receive the item. Merry Christmas to me!

Reviews.Title: The Best Television Priced over $39,997 on the market - worth more than one Amanda!
Reviews.Author: Adam Indikt
Reviews.Content: With the Australian Dollar a bit off its highs of earlier this year I wasn't sure whether I could afford the US$39,997.99 to buy this television. The white slavery market, being saturated now by Amandas, made selling our own Amanda an exercise in frustration. We had to settle for a figure that was less than half the price that the market was paying for Amandas only 5 days ago.I think Amanda was disappointed at the sale price too, and the fact that the TV is only 120Hz and LED instead of IPS, but was somewhat cheered in knowing that her brother David would be joining her to ensure we could meet the fluctuating AUD:USD exchange rate influenced price of the television.The purchaser did promise to buy his own 4K capable camera and send us the occassional movie which we will be able to view in majestic colour on the big screen. The vivid colours and detail will no doubt highlight every tear that trickles down Amanda's reddish face, her eyes bloated somewhat from constant crying at the low price she was able to attract.But lest this review divert too much from the amazing features of this Samsung television, the experience to be held by gazing upon 85 inches (215.9 centimetres in Australian metric units) is truly inspiring - akin to watching your child being born, though without the messy afterbirth. The remote control, which, unlike a child, comes with two AA batteries, is svelt and secure in one's hands. It never fidgets, each button doing precisely what you tell it to do, each and every time - never complaining, nor getting over tired while all you want to do is for the day to end and put it to bed.The channel switching is remarkably quick, and without children around there's no need for the cumbersome parental locks to be put in place - though they are there for when the children return. I found the glare from the vast expanse of glass that is now our living room wall to be somewhat offputting. Not as offputting as Amanda's screaming when she's had her iPhone confiscated for running up a huge phone bill and drowning out a movie we are trying to watch - which will be very tough now from thousands of miles away.All in all, despite all its measurements being in the old imperial scale, yet taking into account that it can deliver a range of programming via voice control - not screaming childish blabbering which just really annoys any sane person - I can heartily recommend the Samsung UN85S9 85-Inch 4K Ultra HD 120Hz 3D Smart LED TV as just about the best television priced over US$39,997 on the market today. Did I mention that it comes with two AA batteries, which work the same in Australia as they do in the US.

Reviews.Title: Why would you NOT get this
Reviews.Author: Philip Fry
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV last week after selling my head on eBay, I still had enough left over to buy a PS4 (I have a very big head!). The picture quality is like nothing I have ever seen, now you might think that's because I no longer own a head but I kept my eyes, I'm not stupid! The resolution is so high you can almost touch it, which I can't, did I mention I also sold my arms to buy Mars. Basically, you have to be a moron not to buy this TV.Happy holidays from Mars, I'm waving with my foot!

Reviews.Title: Totally worth a life
Reviews.Author: Eltroyo
Reviews.Content: As soon as I saw this I just knew I had to have it. Luckily on my stroll home from Tiffany's a homeless man looked at me a little funny and I saw my opportunity. I mean it's not like he was taking care of his kidneys and someone else is now better off ...besides me and my newfound TV viewing glory of course!I can just spend hours watching my favorite shows and impressing my friends on movie night. SO Worth it!

Reviews.Title: Awesome, but too big for drone shipment.
Reviews.Author: Ron
Reviews.Content: Amazing picture aside, this baby is the BEST TV tray we've owned when it's on its side. Picture is so friggin' realistic I swear the dude from Duck Dynasty reached up and grabbed the chicken leg right off my Swanson Man's Dinner! Free shipping, man I want Amazon to write the next health care law!

Reviews.Title: Great for outdoor use!
Reviews.Author: Pchu
Reviews.Content: My friends and I love using it to watch porn on the front lawn. So much more dong for your dollar!

Reviews.Title: Science is Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Dale Walker
Reviews.Content: Well let me say B*****s, this TV really lives up to its price. The picture is amazing!! You see, I was a poor high school kid, almost dropped out actually. My science teacher and I struck up a working relationship and started producing some great blue glass. Well, once I made enough money I had to have this set. It looks great in my house and both my buddies Skinny Pete and Badger love it for porn! My only regret is that I had a falling out with my boss, Mr. White, and he almost killed me for buying the TV. Rest assured now that Walt has passed away (sad he died in a gunfight and not cancer), I will be buying two more of these! The last thing Mr. White said to me was "Jesse, you asked me if I was in the m**h business or the money business. Neither. I'm in the empire business". Well, who is the empire now B***h!!!

Reviews.Title: Giant TV for the adults in the room
Reviews.Author: J. Piwaron
Reviews.Content: Wow! You just haven't seen porn until you've seen it on this TV in 4K! It's awesome! Gosh, I could feel the sweat raining on me from the performers. Well, I think it was sweat. . . .

Reviews.Title: Psshhh
Reviews.Author: Ricardo haha
Reviews.Content: Well one of my co-workers bought this "Television" and was bragging about it at work,he said it was unbelievable. I said for $40,000 I'm sure it is,he then proceeded to bum a cigarette from someone.

Reviews.Title: In one word, awesome!
Reviews.Author: josh Reuter
Reviews.Content: After having my vasectomy done by my local Taxidermist I thought I would use some of the money I saved on something the whole family would love. Naturally, seeing that the refurbished Samsung UN85S9 was priced to move at 30,000.00 I snatched it up. The TV is fantastic! It has helped my wife and I with our parenting. My kids sit in front of it all day long while I sit with cold pees on my lap. Thank you Samsung, you rule so hard!

Reviews.Title: Project TV
Reviews.Author: direchef
Reviews.Content: The major downside? I unfortunately had to build a new house around it to keep off the rain, but otherwise, great reception.

Reviews.Title: No RF Input
Reviews.Author: Endroren
Reviews.Content: VERY disappointed. After the squad of octodrones dropped it off, I discovered that it DOESN'T HAVE AN RF INPUT! What the hell, Samsung? How am I supposed to hook up my aerial? Or my Colecovision for that matter?No idea what I'm going to do with the thing now.

Reviews.Title: My god it's full of stars!
Reviews.Author: musiclinks
Reviews.Content: I saw this TV of monolithic size and proportions on Amazon.com and also partially buried on the moon near the crater Tycho. I decided to check the one out on the moon as the shipping charges would be cheaper.The damn thing emitted this high pitched squeal and deafened me and my whole team. Fortunately, I have an Amazon Prime account and they told me that this UHD TV is trying to communicate with another one orbiting the Jupiter moon IO.So I joined the Jupiter mission and 9 months later I was orbiting IO in the ship "Discovery"Heywood Floyd said that the on-board computer, HAL 9000 was starting to get jealous of the UHD TV and started to act out and kill the crew. I decided to take a pod (open the pod bay doors HAL), and leave discovery taking the Samsung UHD TV with me.Then something happened while we were orbiting Jupiter, what happened?... something wonderful.

Reviews.Title: Cheaper in the long run than my  Lexus IS
Reviews.Author: b.mcmillin
Reviews.Content: Granted this TV cost a couple thousand more than my  Lexus IS however if you add in the cost of general maintenance and auto insurance, it is much cheaper in the long run.  There are so many advantages to watching television on a $40,000 television that it is difficult to know where to start. Comedies are funnier, there are less bad stories on the nightly news, you will solve the case before the NCIS team does and MTV shows music videos again. Also, it is great for your Wii gaming system. You can actually see the pores on Mario's face. Next week we are flying Peter Jackson in to provide director's commentary as we watch The Hobbit on blu-ray.

Reviews.Title: Very good, but could be more expensive...
Reviews.Author: BullsFan
Reviews.Content: I was looking for ways to show off my incredible wealth and was having a difficult time deciding on what I was going to buy to rub it in the faces of lower and middle-class America, so this television was one of the items I chose to splurge on. There were plenty of options out there that were comparable in size and quality for a tenth of the price of this beauty, but personally, I just like the idea of telling people I spent $40k on a television that isn't the size of an iMAX screen.Sure, there are plenty of other "productive" things I could have done with the money. I could have helped a charity or two, put a couple inner-city children through college, or fed a starving village in Africa for a decade, but you can't hang that on your living room wall now, can you? The only gripe that I have with this television is the price; personally I would have preferred to have spent $50 or $60k, but I guess Samsung decided that $40k for a television in a free market economy is a fair price... oh well.For those of you that might be on the fence between this model and a 4K HDTV that doesn't cost as much as a new BMW, I would strongly suggest investing in this under-valued work of art. Please note - You don't have to be wealthy like me to own a TV like this one! You just have to value entertainment more than anything else in life, including eating. You won't regret it!

Reviews.Title: Energy Saving!
Reviews.Author: Truong Le
Reviews.Content: After buying this tv.  I saw a big difference in my energy bill.  I would've been stupid of me not to buy this!  Thank you Samsung

Reviews.Title: Makes a great clothesline!
Reviews.Author: Stephen Kozeniewski
Reviews.Content: I received the Samsung UN85S9 as yet another in a string of unwanted birthday presents from my dowager Aunt Griselda two years ago.  "Gee, thanks Auntie Gris," I said, rolling my eyes, which, fortunately, she couldn't see (Aunt G. was blinded by gout years ago.)  I had Clark and Hudson throw this stupid piece of junk in the mudroom of the servant's quarters with all the other crap my aunt's bought me over the years: diamond encrusted Victoria's Secret bras, Hitler's Volkswagen, the deed to Fallingwater (you know, junk.)  I thought I would never look at it again until we moved to Geneva permanently, but then, a few weeks ago Martha ran out of twine and asked me what else she could hang the laundry on.  That's when I remembered the TV!  I had Cookie and Jeeves drag the Samsung out of the mudroom and prop it against the tennis net and you know what?  Those 85 inches were just what Martha needed to hang my undies on.  I have no idea if it functions as a TV, but as a clothesline, it's top notch.  (I'm taking a star off because it could be longer - Martha informs me 90" would afford me an extra pair of briefs.)

Reviews.Title: SInce 2 month
Reviews.Author: Sebastian
Reviews.Content: I bought the Screen in order to connect it with my PC and use it for graphical projects (PS, AI). But 2 month ago I lost the curser. I can't work anymore ...

Reviews.Title: Hidden Costs
Reviews.Author: Carl T. Raff
Reviews.Content: The add failed to mention the hidden legal costs resulting from the 85 in screen exceeding the maximum size allowed by current copyright regulations.  Each time I watch a show or movie I'm served with a notice to appear in federal court.  The filing fees alone are killing me.  My attorney advises me that even if I give the TV I may still be liable for facilitating the copyright violations of another.  I'm doomed.  Is there any way out?

Reviews.Title: Not Over the Top
Reviews.Author: Robert C. Solomon, M.D.
Reviews.Content: Some of the reviews, and some of the comments, seem rather judgmental.  It's almost as if the writers do not approve of that sociocultural phenomenon for which America is known around the globe: conspicuous consumption.  But really, is it conspicuous if you don't position the TV so all your neighbors cannot help but notice it through your family room's picture window that just happens to face the front of the house?  And if that turns out to be the best spot for it, just keep the drapes drawn, at least most of the time.  Yes, you can leave them open at night.  Don't worry that passing motorists will see your new TV and wonder when the neighborhood went retro and acquired a drive-in movie place.  You will be so busy watching your new giant/enormous (sorry, "ginormous" has been around since the 1940s, but I still haven't accepted it) screen that you won't notice the noses pressed against the picture window.  If you do notice them, keep in mind that their envy of your state-of-the-art technology, when they all have 50-inch-plus plasma screens and want for very little in life, is definitely a first world problem.  Too bad for them!

Reviews.Title: Need one of those TV's
Reviews.Author: Linda H.
Reviews.Content: I just love this TV, but I am not as lucky as most of you.  My children are older and have moved out, so I won't be able to sell them on the market. But wait, I do have grandkids. Maybe I am in luck after all. I sure hope so because I really want one of those TV's and this is such a great deal!!

Reviews.Title: Put me down for 2% cashback!
Reviews.Author: BizarroAF "bizarroAF"
Reviews.Content: 2% cashback. Wow! I'm sold. That's $800. I can buy a 50" mini-me Samsung for that.Also, I could return it to Amazon after 30 days if I didn't like. Amazon Prime can suck it!Wait, I could start a kickstarter campaign to buy this TV :) Anyone wants to pitch in?

Reviews.Title: Free 30 day tech support!
Reviews.Author: Adam W Hamilton
Reviews.Content: With free tech support for a whole 30 days, how can you refuse a deal this good?  I wish there was a 6th star.. :(

Reviews.Title: Great for Makeup
Reviews.Author: E. Stewart
Reviews.Content: My wife loves to use the built in camera to apply her makeup. It makes every freckle the size of a grapefruit and she is more beautiful than ever so worth every penny.

Reviews.Title: Better than an Island in the Kareeb
Reviews.Author: holonalu "Thomas Praetzel"
Reviews.Content: I was originally going to use my new found wealth from a recent settlement with the Department of Justice, USA, to buy an Island in the Carribean. As you may, or may not know, with my backround in Central American politics, an Island can come in very handy. However, the upkeep of any Island, what with the weather, earthquakes, occaisional peasant uprising, (those I can deal with), electricity, gardening, attempted military junta overthrow, (once again, can deal) almost make the purchase of an entire Island a bit daunting. Well, once again, the USA has come to my rescue. Seems that leasing, as opposed to buying, is an excellent tax haven, so, VOILA!!, I leased an Island in the Kareeb!!! And not just any Island, but one that I'm already vaguely familiar with! And where do these lovely, bargain basement priced, trinkets from Amazon come in? Simple. My new Island is filled with peasants, and, I need to closely monitor their behavior. However, due to some temporary restrictions regarding my travel, I must monitor these worthless vassals from my present abode. So, I bought a dozen of these beauties, and have them hung on the walls, (the stands can come in very handy for suspending revolution minded peasants from, grab a whip and you're in business!!) That, and the network of GoPro cameras I have 47% of the peasants wear, (no need to worry about them taking them off, thank you Crazy Glue and Staples!) and I'm in business!!!Thank you Amazon, and Amazon PrimeYours TrulyManny N.Absentee Dictator

Reviews.Title: Who said size isn't everything!
Reviews.Author: Mr. Aw Lee
Reviews.Content: Got two of these bad boys. Was going to by a Porsche but thought, I will have one for the bedroom, on the ceiling of course and one for the lounge!

Reviews.Title: Brings the family together
Reviews.Author: CheesyG "K. Hopkins"
Reviews.Content: ... playing old, cheap board games, actually. I mean, great picture quality when local channels are on and able to be received, but it was either this beauty or cable/movie rentals/video games/trips to the museum/gas to visit the library/dining out/a puppy/braces/leg braces for Timmy/new shoes/new underwear/winter coats/minimal utility shutoff notices. I'm certain we'll bond nicely next weekend learning how to make our own candles!

Reviews.Title: so fabulous
Reviews.Author: kinch
Reviews.Content: I am so glad I waited for this to go on sale. I'm pushing 44 and my eyesight is going fast so these extra inches really help me see the picture more clear. I'm hoping I can get the upgrade to 100 inch when it comes out. I'm sure I will need it by the time I am 45. What a deal..go amazon.

Reviews.Title: What a great deal for the low price!
Reviews.Author: Badfish5000
Reviews.Content: I was so excited about taking out a second mortgage on my home for a television. Not to mention my wife's savings account. We almost decided to upgrade out kitchen, bathroom, bed room set and possibly a new deck, but hey! Why not a new TV? We are super stoked and in super debt now. Thanks Samsung. I will say my new NBA2k 14 is bad to the bone on this mug. Cheers

Reviews.Title: My very own scoreboard
Reviews.Author: Lindust20
Reviews.Content: I've always wanted a scoreboard for my man cave! You just made all my dreams come true!!! Now if only I could find a big enough surround sound system.

Reviews.Title: A must have for any rich millionaire, billionaire....
Reviews.Author: Zheenyar Karim
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV just because I can!I don't care about its amazing display or "85 inch screen" why should I care about that when I have 95 inch down here.I just store it in my 100X200X bathroom and leave it unused but for the pleasure of my friends seeing it and say "hey that's a nice screen."I mean after all.... Why do I need this when I have the cinema's a couple of 100 miles away from me (which I can get their with my raptor and parachute off in less than 5 mins....)So if you want to show off to your friends, this is a must. If not, just go to your local cinema!

Reviews.Title: Just Do It!
Reviews.Author: Ashraya Arya "Ashray5"
Reviews.Content: Price was a shocker at first until the "micro dimming ultimate" feature sold me on it. Hope my kidney is enjoying its new house.

Reviews.Title: Should I defrost my cryogenically preserved Uncle Mikhail?
Reviews.Author: Cappy
Reviews.Content: Oh baby! I nearly crapped my pants when I saw this bad boy. But now I got a serious problem. Should I put my Tesla Roadster up for sale on eBay? Or pull the plug on Uncle Mikhail? He's been floating around in a vat of liquid nitrogen for the past four years. It's freaking expensive. But I mean seriously dude, cryogenically speaking this is the future. Why wait for the nanotech necessary to upload your brain when you can stare goggle-eyed at a 7 foot 1 inch wide 4K Ultra HD visualization of the cosmos (or watch Baywatch re-runs) while reclining on a giant oversized bean bag in your living room with cheese puffs and Stolichnaya infused kale smoothies here and now!

Reviews.Title: Too much tipping...
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: I find myself in a bit of a quandry here...Since my new TV will be delivered using enhanced delivery, does this mean I have to give them an enhanced tip? And furthermore, at what percentage do I tip? Will they help me set up me RCA VCR and Atari also? I am really looking forward to playing space invaders in 4K. I also have to arrange for special disposal of the packaging materials where I live which means I have to tip yet again!!!! Am wondering now if I should have scaled down my purchase and went 'on the cheap' with the $16K poor folks 'B' model. I knew I should have put the aluminum foil on my head before deciding to hit buy-woulda kept the gamma rays out.

Reviews.Title: Must have woodworking bench for the do it yourselfers !
Reviews.Author: STEVE HEINEKEN
Reviews.Content: This will make a great woodworking bench. I can just cut my wood on the scratch resistant screen. Makes great gift for the Holidays !

Reviews.Title: What a bargain!
Reviews.Author: S. Hagood
Reviews.Content: This television is incredible! The clarity is second to none. It's stylish, slim, and easy to set up. At $40k, it was too good of a bargain to let pass by, so I not only bought one for the living room, but also bought one for our bedroom, one for the kitchen, one for the kid's room, one for each dog, and one for all 7 of my neighbors. Tomorrow I'm getting one for my friend's fetus - 9 months without cable television is something no one should go through. Hopefully the installation in her womb goes off without a hitch. Fingers crossed!

Reviews.Title: Why the "Swing Set" TV stand???
Reviews.Author: Kiss
Reviews.Content: I am not sure why they included the ridiculous TV stand that looks like a child's swing set. Did they think the walls of my trailer would not support the weight of their TV? I can't wait for next season! ROLL TIDE!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Worth the cash... Trust me.
Reviews.Author: Mathew P. Pedersen "Matt Pedersen"
Reviews.Content: So I decided that I need a new TV. I don't trust the OLED technology, and being a early adopter of plasma TVs in the mid 1990s, I decided that this was a perfect solution to my needs. I needed a TV that was compatible with my Beta VCR AND my upcoming purchase of a Mac Pro. My quams with buying a TV with only a 120hz refresh rate were satisfied with watching home movies of my childhood. They were so perfectly upscaled that I could make out the delicate contours of my parents drywall. And there is no lag playing my new PS4 with this beast. And lets just not talk about what I did to afford such a wonderful TV. We will not talk about it.

Reviews.Title: Bathroom Boomer!!!
Reviews.Author: Steven Chung
Reviews.Content: I put this 4k beauty in my bathroom, man... I am using the bathroom in style now baby, its literally one side of my wall now in the bathroom!!! The guests love it!!!

Reviews.Title: Worth the experience
Reviews.Author: Subith VS
Reviews.Content: Giving it a 4 star because the sticker behind the TV and on the box it came with had stuff written in korean. Common I dont read korean and everything needs to be translated into english. It puts me at a disadvantage. It looks really good on photos. Everyone loves this TV.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Product.
Reviews.Author: Ali
Reviews.Content: It works and looks great next to my indoor waterfall. I picked up 3 of these bad boys as they are truly amazing. I do wish it would come in solid gold with ruby's as the buttons but unfortunately there aren't any models like that. I've considered mounting one of these in my bathrooms as It would make for a more immersive poop. 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Long Live the Emperor!
Reviews.Author: Spudcommando
Reviews.Content: When I saw the discount, I jumped at the chance to purchase one of these marvelous pieces of engineering for his highness Emperor Palpatine of the Galactic Empire! The mind boggling picture quality and artistic design of this device is truly the perfect gift for when one is to meet with the Emperor of the Galaxy. Indeed, I expect this gift will all but ensure my candidacy as Grand Moff of the Mid Rim.

Reviews.Title: Finally sitting pretty in front of my Samsung UN85S9 85-Inch 4K Ultra HD 120Hz 3D Smart LED TV
Reviews.Author: Skyblue2u "Skyblue2u"
Reviews.Content: Although I do like this Television quite a bit, I just have not been able to get completely comfortable watching it. I have been a bit frustrated searching for just the perfect viewing position. Thing is, I am a multi-tasker at heart, and as such there are certain special amenities to which I require ready access.  I tried every chair, settee, chaise lounger, and beanbag pillow in my abode all to no avail. Sadly I was beginning to think this purchase was destined to be returned and had logged on to Amazon with every intent to start the process. Then it hit me! Why not take a few minutes to avail myself of Amazons fabulous search box and their plethora of readily available merchandise?  Where, if not on Amazon, would I possibly stand a better chance of discovering just the right item to satisfy my personal seating requirements and at the same time reconcile the one troubling aspect relating to my full enjoyment of purchasing my Samsung UN85S9 85-Inch 4K Ultra HD 120Hz 3D Smart LED TV ?With just a few tweeks of my search string the fabulous Amazon search box led me to just the perfect item to make my enjoyment of the Samsung UN85S9 85-Inch 4K Ultra HD 120Hz 3D Smart LED TV perfect. I share the Amazon link here just in case there are any other multi-taskers who find themselves in a situation similar to the one that had me nearly ready to pack up and return this fabulous TV. I can only add that this little gem did the trick for me: CTA Digital 2-in-1 iPotty with Activity Seat for iPad ( B00B3G8UGQ )Now I am completely comfortable and sitting pretty. Finally feeling fully at ease in front of my fabulous Samsung UN85S9 85-Inch 4K Ultra HD 120Hz 3D Smart LED TV. Sometimes it isn't the big things in life that matter as much as the small ones after-all.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely Stunning
Reviews.Author: Aaron Castellano
Reviews.Content: First and foremost I was so excited to recieve my tv. It was love at first site and I knew this was it when the trucked pulled up with this [...]Only problem was I couldn't fit it through my front door of my studio apartment. So needless to say I knocked down my neighbors wall to bring it in and now live WITH him in a double wide studio. He was upset at first until he laid eyes on this bad boy. Now we are just a couple of single guys playing xbox and watching the most hd porn together. Only thing is he's leaving some weird stains on my couch. Regardless 5 stars for this tv highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: Two choices...and I'm glad that it was this one.
Reviews.Author: Maek
Reviews.Content: The FBI had offered me the choice recently of paying the ransom for a loved one.  Then I saw this TV, and WOW, I simply could not say "no!"  Now, I watch CNN all the time and see my kidnapped family member whenever I want, hearing that they have no new leads on the case before moving on to Bieber/Lohan spending time in jail together.  At $40,000, I have no buyer's remorse whatsoever.The best part is that the "ticker tape mini-news feed" on the bottom are in letters approximately 9" high...even my mother-in-law could read them if she wasn't constantly nagging me about when I was going to get around to meeting the ransomer's demands.  Sheesh...you have a couple other daughters, you know.  That, and she doesn't fully appreciate the definition on the screen when we're watching TAKEN on Blu-Ray.  I mean, seriously, we were watching it, both of us crying, and I looked over at her and said, "I know...it's a beautiful picture, right?" while sniffling.  She screamed some obscenities at me and left.

Reviews.Title: so disappointed
Reviews.Author: Sharon Hayward
Reviews.Content: I wanted to get several of these as they would just perfectly fill that empty void in several rooms. We just bought our house and have very little furniture so it looks bare and cold. I was SO disappointed to see only 2 were left.

Reviews.Title: What happened to my Electrical Bill???
Reviews.Author: eric danko
Reviews.Content: OK...these things are supposed to be efficient.  After I bought one, my electric bill went up $.25!!!  WTH???  I cannot afford this raise in my electrical bill.  Especially with all the PPV I am getting now.  This needs to be addressed by the company, or I am not getting one for the bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Paid for by a 3rd mortgage on my house..
Reviews.Author: David Williams
Reviews.Content: I bought this by accident, you see I was trying to sign up for obamacare and it asked if I wanted all the bells and whistles with the plan I chose and voila this showed up at my door.  I also got a heart transplant for my pet emu but that's a different story.  This TV is so realistic, NFL referees call me to review plays.  I haven't left the house since I got it however but my next goal is to find out how I can legally marry it.  Most beautiful thing I've ever seen!!!

Reviews.Title: Samsung:  The Sound of Music?
Reviews.Author: Kay
Reviews.Content: The price of the TV was a bit of a concern until Maria ripped the clothes off of the children and sold the extra drapes for cash. Thank Goodness, because Gretl loves watching Sesame Street on the big screen!  She doesn't mind that she is naked. That's my girl!  She takes after her father.How do you solve a problem like Maria?I say "How do you solve a problem like Samsung".  Initially, our TV was shipped to Austria.  This set off a chain of events of which you can only imagine (I secretly wonder if Rolf had a hand in this). Did Hilter have this same TV? -- I don't know. But it does concern me.Also, the free batteries didn't matter much to us.  We knew Mother Abbess would take care of it.  Those sisters know how to do just about anything: disable cars etc. But, they were of absolutely no help in setting up the Samsung TV. I guess they don't care about screen resolution --But, I do have to tell you Jesus looks great on the Samsung! I watched the Last Supper yesterday and it was like I was there in person.  That's some s***!!Other than that, what a mess!  I'd say supercali"f-ing"expialidocious. However, I don't like to use curse words around the children.  And also...I think that's a different movie.  Now, I'm confusing myself.The one thing I do know is that when I contacted Amazon and Samsung to complain about the delivery to Austria they provided no options.  I guess there won't be compensation for it which annoys me. But, as a military man I am used to that.  And I am not faint of heart - we will continue to pursue remedies for this intolerable action!As to the system itself -- the sound quality is just "OK".  In my opinion, the hills could have been much more alive!Also, during the gazebo scene, Liesl thinks she looks too fat on the Samsung -- this has resulted in body image issues.  I'm not sure if she'll ever get past it.  As a father, this upsets me greatly.So, overall, this TV is not one of my "Favorite Things."

Reviews.Title: Size matters
Reviews.Author: Mz
Reviews.Content: i love this tv , i watch so much porn  and i am just spewing with joy . It puts the D in HD

Reviews.Title: Awesomeness embodiment .
Reviews.Author: Pedro The Destroyer
Reviews.Content: I decided after every material possession on this planet and my soul to Satan, that I just enough coin to purchase this awesome piece of electronic nirvana. It's huge-it barely fits in Costco shopping cart, but it's worth all the stares from the lower minions who won't sacrifice to get one. I just find an outlet and steal a cable signal and voila! I'm watching television programs that I thought were beyond my reach. I can read people's thoughts the clarity is so profound. And speaking of nirvana, I've been able to raise Kurt Cobain from the dead with this beast. He's beginning his comeback as we speak. Get this television or you'll be just one of the lower minions. You don't want that.

Reviews.Title: WOW. What's is 4k?
Reviews.Author: JRivera
Reviews.Content: Soon as I got to see this TV on display only at the Samsung website, I decided to get rid of my poppy so I could save the money I spend on food to buy this tv. I know friends are for ever but hey what the heck, my dog is nearly blind the tv will last me longer.

Reviews.Title: Better than houses, further education, and $
Reviews.Author: P. Scheel "the soldier"
Reviews.Content: I thought about purchasing a property, car, and having some money left over, but then I saw this super ultra awesome picasso. I said aloud, why invest in property when I could live in the awesome box that came with this Samsung. I went to the local nuclear reactor so I could plug this bad boy in. After almost causing nuclear meltdown the TV turned on and vaporized almost everything within 100 miles. So I decided to spend another 20K$ on some special glasses to withstand the wonderful deathrays this thing emits. Also I got some Uraniplutonium batteries to power the remote from a nearby group of extra terrestrials for selling out mankind. Man, I am sure happy I didn't waste my $ on properties or cars or savings lol Great buy, by the way do not forget to get the PSXBoxwii 1million it works excellently with this set.

Reviews.Title: Gotta be good
Reviews.Author: D. M. Farmbrough "Dave Farmbrough"
Reviews.Content: Everything I have bought from Samsung has been good. From the tiny 'phones to the several digital cameras. However there is one tiny flaw with this device. It not only costs more than my house and car combined, I would have to work for 16 years to make enough money to buy it...and I am betting that in the year 2030 they will have a thing like a green CSO wall in every room of your house anyway so you can see messages beamed in by the totalitarian Microsoft or Google who has by then taken over our world.Hence, only 4 stars.

Reviews.Title: The future is now!
Reviews.Author: HecticTurnip
Reviews.Content: Just bought it last night, its really freaking sweet, I lobe the resolution, the picture, the smart T.V functions on it, the fact I sold my life to Satan in order to get this T.V. Yup, my current life is so boring, its not a 85inch 4K Ultra HD 120Hz 3D Smart LED UHDTV... So I can enjoy watching Justin Beiber getting arrested while having a cocktail with Satan! Thanks Samsung!!

Reviews.Title: Nice TV --- If You Can Get It...
Reviews.Author: Dan P. "Dan P."
Reviews.Content: Was all set to make the purchase, then the salesman sat me down and told me my FICO scores were too low to qualify.  He said I didn't even qualify for the Making-TVs-Affordable Act.  Bummer.I asked my dad to co-sign but he said there was no way he would until I paid off my Tesla Roadster.Sure hope the price drops.

Reviews.Title: Annoying voice control
Reviews.Author: geekgirl101
Reviews.Content: I'm having to refrain from watching certain channels that have advertisements for voice activated TVs.  Every time they say on the advert "TV off" it switches my TV off!

Reviews.Title: Life Changing
Reviews.Author: Waylon West
Reviews.Content: Listen up people, When i bought this tv it was out of spite, because my wife kept bugging me to loose weight and get healthier instead of sitting around all the time. Well since i bought the tv, i learned more about my life than i ever thought possible. How to change the oil from popular tv shows that i can actually watch clearer now. I lost 180 lbs just buy doing what i always did. dont ever cut yourself short. be who you are and fight the good fight.as far as the wife still nagging, where did you think the 180 lbs went.Best move i ever made

Reviews.Title: Perfect timing
Reviews.Author: Ronald W Tilley
Reviews.Content: Just in time for the super bowl.  Might have to knock out a wall so I can watch from the other room.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: ottalee schiffel
Reviews.Content: I put it on my credit card I bought from 'Target.cn/creditcard'. Before it was delivered, I ordered 2 more and sent them to McCain's office  and  set up a meeting with the Arizona Better Gubrnment Klub. They were so impressed they gave him back his GOP endorsement. He was so impressed he's ordering one for every military base in Afghanistan at $400k each. The GOP is buying one for each and every C-17 in the Air Force as nothing is too good for our troops. Especially this close to Super Bowl Sunday.

Reviews.Title: Wait until Black Friday people.
Reviews.Author: Maboehnlein
Reviews.Content: I'm just going to wait until Black Friday when it's 50% off and affordable. Then it's only $20,000! What a deal!

Reviews.Title: OK... interesting.
Reviews.Author: BUCK RODGERS "SCI-FI GUY"
Reviews.Content: Cheaper than a 3 bedroom condo, about the same as a motorhome, but who wants to live in a stupid motorhome... this is 85 inches of YES PLEASE!

Reviews.Title: splendid
Reviews.Author: random rich dude
Reviews.Content: Ahh where to start. I received my wealth by stealing and selling children on the black market. The only way to hife from my guilt is to spend triads amount of money on items like a 15 inches shy of a 100 inch TV. Plus the HUGE box makes an amazing cover for my yacht. The only negative to the TV is I keep having to hire new help cause my butlers (cough*slaves*cough) keep going blind from the amount of light the TV puts out

Reviews.Title: Worth every penny!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I would give my right arm for this TV, oh well call me Lefty! It is hard typing with one hand.

Reviews.Title: VHS has never looked so good!
Reviews.Author: Brandon Fowler
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for a value, this is it.  I have never seen the world as clear!!I rated 4 stars because it doesn't have built in HiFi VCR.  Oh well, I was able to hook up my own VCR and really makes a difference.  I rented the Might Ducks (VHS) series from my local library and wow does it feel like I am one of the ducks when watching!!

Reviews.Title: Get the Warranty
Reviews.Author: Nitrixx "nomad"
Reviews.Content: Great tv. Cobalt trim. Comes with spoiler. sadly it loses 20% of its value when you roll it off the lot.

Reviews.Title: Screw selling automatic weapons, these are worth more on the black market
Reviews.Author: Nichole Bruff
Reviews.Content: I must say this TV has changed my life...  Actually, it changed many people's lives here in Charming.  My husband Jax wanted his club to start making better changes, so he quit selling AK 47's.  He was able to jack a few UPS trucks that were delivering these bad boys to the rich and turn them for a profit.The niner's and Mayans are fighting over who gets to buy these shipments from my man's club.  There has been much blood shed over these bad boys.  Abe and I are happy that daddy is selling these rather then the automatic weapons.The ATF no longer bothers us since this is out of their jurisdiction.  Now we deal with NSA watching and listening to everything we do.  Pffft... Who cares though?  They listen to everyone, so we aren't that special.We did find it rather difficult to use this as a weapon when the Mayans came to our church meeting.  It took many of SAMCRO's men to push it towards those scheming thieves.  This TV killed all of the Mayan's that day...The Irish are mad that we made a business pact with the Japanese... Oh well, they will get over it soon enough

Reviews.Title: not a 5 star product
Reviews.Author: Sue Ellen Parmenter
Reviews.Content: I'm only giving this item 4 stars.. sure its AP and eligible for free shipping but when I had it delivered and the drone drop occurred the national weather service recorded it as an F2 and it obliterated my entire town! Now I'm sitting in what's left of my house (basically the framework) I have it leaned up against some boards that used to be my neighbor Ralph's handicap ramp (his house was leveled so now his place is all a ground floor unit) and they absolutely REFUSE to let me return the convenient "wall mount kit" citing that my no longer having walls isn't a good enough reason for return. On the plus side it came very well boxed and the box it came in I donated to the American Red Cross and it housed three of my homeless neighbors.....but still your return policy sucks! Now I'm reduced to selling this brand new mount kit to my local scrap cars for cash outfit and I'm out 3 grand :(

Reviews.Title: Moving on up, to a Deluxe TV.
Reviews.Author: ckkkbaker
Reviews.Content: I recently moved from next door to my racist neighbor Archie and figured I'd get one of these for my new deluxe apartment in the sky located on the East Side. My laundry business is doing so well, I figured what the hell. A pair of drones delivered it right to my balcony and and I had my neighbor Mr Bentley help me install it. The colors on this thing are beautiful and pop. The only problem I'm having is that my wife Louise AKA Weezee and my maid Florence just sit at home all day and watch the TV.Jorge Jefferson

Reviews.Title: Gatsby thought I'd like it...
Reviews.Author: Scott A. Weidig "VanishingPoint"
Reviews.Content: I'm just so bored, bored, bored all the time, so my ex, Jay, bought one of these and mounted it on his pier, facing my dock.  I will say that the picture is excellent-- even from across the bay. However, he chooses to play the strangest films.  I can't go out on my veranda to sip a gin fizz without watching another "Blood on the Highway" safety video. I'd complain, but the clothing commercials have me absolutely riveted, darling: I swear I have never seen such beautiful shirts.  The resolution on the screen makes the shirts look virtually three dimensional.Anyway, Tom says he *might* purchase one to watch all of his ridiculous sports programs, but he wants a custom option: white trim with Samsung in teeny, tiny gold script lettering.  Won't that just be darling?  I've always been partial to white and gold.  Besides, I think Pammy will enjoy watching cartoons on a large screen.  Some people may say that watching so much television will rot the brain, but I say let the girl enjoy herself. Let her be a fool, a beautiful, little fool!  And let it begin with this television.

Reviews.Title: Thank you Amazon!
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: I decided to buy this TV for the sole reason of being able to write a review on it because it just seems like all the other reviews are fake and it really isn't fair to the people strongly considering the purchase. I financed it with the Amazon Store Card interest free for 60 years. I mean how could you not pass up on 720 easy monthly payments of $55. I mean if I invest $39,999.99 now and earn interest on it over those 60 years it basically pays for itself. Silly Amazon and your interest free financing. A word of advice is to definitely make sure you choose the 720 month option at checkout because if you choose 24 months by accident you might need to sell your car or take out a home equity loan, unless you already did that to buy some other necessity. I also recommend taking out or increasing your life insurance coverage to cover the cost of the TV so that your beneficiaries may enjoy it for years to come if you end up no longer able to make the monthly payments. It was 'eligible' for free shipping though which was great but only became eligible after doing some things that I would rather not speak of.TV works great!

Reviews.Title: this changed my life
Reviews.Author: Rami
Reviews.Content: i bought 3 , one in my bed room , one in the living , and one in my FIAT 500 for my kids ...the best thing i like is the fast food delivery drawer . order over the internet and the food deliver in 3 minutes from the back of the TV

Reviews.Title: To heck with Morpheous...
Reviews.Author: Christopher Thompson
Reviews.Content: The minute I got uploaded back into the Matrix I knew I had to have this TV! I may have had to give up Morpheous and the location of Zion, the last human city on planet Earth, to Agent Smith, but can you really blame me?! I can practically taste the steak in this Red lobster commercial!

Reviews.Title: Great for gaming
Reviews.Author: Darik Snokhous
Reviews.Content: I mounted one of these beauties to the floor, ceiling, and each wall of my walk in closet so now I have the most immersive Call of Duty experience possible! I have to mop the one on the floor occasionally to get rid of the residual Cheetos stains and Mountain Dew puddles that comes standard with hardcore gaming.The one complaint I have is that the unit on the eastern wall came with a dead pixel, QC is suspect.

Reviews.Title: Great price but NOT flame retardant.
Reviews.Author: Dean Harand
Reviews.Content: After reading such great reviews about this TV, I thought I'd spend a few extra dollars and give it a shot....Why not? A great TV at a bargain price...Arrived much faster than anticipated!After hooking it up, decided to see if it burns...WARNING: NOT FLAME RETARDANT!Returning it tomorrow!

Reviews.Title: Caution if buying from the UK
Reviews.Author: Alan Tickner
Reviews.Content: i was unsure if i should buy this, but with the price having came down by $5002 i felt i had no excuse not to, especially as my budget was $2 more.Problems started almost instantly though.First off, being from the UK, the exchange rate changed and pushed the saving to only $4998, thus, having saved $2 i was now $2 over budget, there goes my cup of tea tomorrow.Next there was the issue with shipping. Nobody wanted to ship it to the UK. I even tried those guys from "shipping Wars", but they said i was crazy. Finally, i chartered one of those "dreamliner" plane things. This ended up costing more than the TV!!When i finally got it, having remortgaged my house and sold my pension it wouldn't fit through my front door!!! I have had to leave it in my front garden where all my neighbours can take advantage of it also. That is once i had the power converted for UK standards.The only good thing i can say is that it does make a good car port as it can be swivelled on it's frame.UPDATE:The remote control doesnt work with UK batteries either

Reviews.Title: LOL
Reviews.Author: steve
Reviews.Content: Has anyone actually bought this tv. The reviews on here have my rolling on the floor. Hopefully that sweet Amanda girl is back to her real family hahaha this is crazy

Reviews.Title: What's with the class warfare?
Reviews.Author: cynical american
Reviews.Content: Making fun of those of us  who spend $40,000 on a TV is just like Kristallnacht. Its the job creators who buy these!Well, the jobs may be in China but some of them will trickle down here. Medical for the injured backs, and air pollution for just two quick examples.

Reviews.Title: Wow Wow Wow
Reviews.Author: Bryant
Reviews.Content: I am able to watch CNN in crystal clarity. I even saw the blue-greenish mole on Piers Morgan's neck last night for the first time - EVER! Never saw that before with any other TV I had. I love this damn thing. Buying this TV is worth seeing that mole in life-like form, let me TELL YOU!

Reviews.Title: Social Media! Hey Now!
Reviews.Author: Ryan H.
Reviews.Content: I love going on Facebook with this TV! Now when I "Like" something, I literally give a thumbs up with my right hand! It's like I actually Like it!! I really, really Like it!!!

Reviews.Title: This is why I was born with two kidneys!
Reviews.Author: wyndman
Reviews.Content: At first I was a little taken aback by the price tag of this fabulous television set, but I listened to my wife and slept on the decision. It then occurred to me the perfect way to pay for this was to sell a kidney! Well I might have one less now, but I have 85" of entertainment!

Reviews.Title: syncing
Reviews.Author: Hg Rev Taco
Reviews.Content: Had troubles syncing up with my Samsung Galaxy S4 Android 4.4 Kitkat 4G LTE lightning fast speeds only on Verizon network. Glare was annoying during high noon, ruins lunch.

Reviews.Title: I should have waited...
Reviews.Author: M. Tepin
Reviews.Content: I just bought a 70" before seeing this prize.  The technology world spins too fast.  I would have lasik surgery just to see this puppy in action.  Actually, I may pull the trigger on this too.I've considered the olive burger to be the true litmus test of any restaurant, and "Pee-Wee's Big Adventure" to be the same for humongous televisions.If you buy this, could you please report back.  Just how big is Large Marge on this screen?  3-stars just for the stand.  I could make a heck of a pitch-back from that.

Reviews.Title: Holy Poo Batman!!!
Reviews.Author: Jene Scotskaid
Reviews.Content: I cannot wait for the Amazon cyber drones to deliver this to my door in less than 30 minutes...This might just be better than Dominoes...I hope the enhanced delivery advertised is in high definition....

Reviews.Title: This thing is huge! Whoa!
Reviews.Author: M. Alonso
Reviews.Content: In an effort to raise funds to purchase this amazing TV, I sold my house and now live in a small studio apartment.  Although the TV Takes up my entire living space it has proven to be an excellent investment.  My family often comes over to watch TV  but only 2 or 3 people fit in my apartment at the same time.  Thankfully I strategically placed it  opposite of the window so my other family members can peak thru the window and view if necessary...  =)

Reviews.Title: Offical tv Jeff Bezos
Reviews.Author: Cameron
Reviews.Content: I have it on good authority that Jeff Bezos, CEO and Founder of Amazon dot com, has and enjoys this very tv set. Sure, it's a little expensive. But you've got to spend money to make money, right? How do you think CEO and Founder of Amazon dot com Ref Pesos got to where he is today? By settling for some Vizio piece of crap that will last you a couple of years if you're lucky? No. It's about quality. You pay for quality. And if there's someone who knows a thing or two about quality, it's CEO and Founder of Amazon dot com, Chef Lassos.Look I know the economy is still more or less in the s***ter, but things are getting better all the time. People are hiring again. Amazon dot com is hiring. Why not go to work and learn under the tutelage of the man himself, CEO and Founder of Amazon dot com Buff Pathos? He might even give you a discount.In conclusion, if you want to run with the big dogs--like CEO and Founder of Amazon dot com Miff Phobos--you can't piss like a puppy. This is America!

Reviews.Title: What a deal!
Reviews.Author: simon leonard
Reviews.Content: You Yanks have no idea as to what constitutes a bargain. Here in England (a small country just outside London) this TV is £39,995 - yes pounds that's $65000! What's more the Amazon drones aren't allowed here - some misunderstanding about rendition I believe. However we can get it installed by other retailers for a mere $60. Anyway flying to the good old US of A to pick one up was well worth it although I have deducted a star because it won't fit in the overhead lockers (actually it doesn't fit in the hold). By the way Amazon UK have started selling used kidneys (try putting "kidneys" or "body parts" into the search box under "Audio and Home Theatre")  - apparently there's a bit of a glut of them at the moment.

Reviews.Title: Well , isnt this just spiffing.
Reviews.Author: tommee tippee givemee your monnee
Reviews.Content: I bought this with my familys food money, the food money we were going to use for the next 20 years, but it's OK, we still have pizza and fizzy pop and crisps, sometimes even worms and leaves from the garden. I have now lost my job, but its OK as I have the telly to keep me occupied. My family are now fat and lazy as am I but at least we can watch the food channel and drool over all that wonderful food we are missing, so we get the best of all worlds. We have all had gastric bands fitted and it seems to have helped so now we can buy a DVD player with all the money we would other wise spend on food, brilliant! Pukka! Innit Nan!Jamie Oliver.

Reviews.Title: get a prenup
Reviews.Author: carmen1973
Reviews.Content: My husband and I had been married 17 glorious days before we divorced. Who would have ever guessed that 85" would have broken us up after dating for 36 hrs. In all honesty I probably should give it a 5 star rating because it showed me the kinks in my marriage. U think after dating someone so long you'd have a rock solid marriage. However, the problem now is who gets the TV. I should get it because I'm keeping our studio apartment and he's keeping the 2 kids and 3 dogs. Like I told him, I'm looking at what's most important. Whose going to babysit the TV while he's at work. I don't work, so obviously it should be me. The kids are 5 and 7. Their practically grown and can babysit the dogs. I can't watch the TV and the dogs. Thank.  God the TV revealed his true character.

Reviews.Title: Hopefully my christmas bonus is big this year, LOL
Reviews.Author: Alva C. Shell IV "shells_dell"
Reviews.Content: How many miles to the gallon does it get???? Over 500 people have ordered already. Sure would like to know what they do for a living...

Reviews.Title: Sold my soul!! What a bargin!
Reviews.Author: Matthew Crisp
Reviews.Content: I felt a deep need to own this TV. Knowing I couldn't afford it myself I summoned my loan officer from the depths of Hell who was eager to give me a low interest payment plan. I felt like I was stealing from him! I mean this TV for my immortal soul!! What a bargin!

Reviews.Title: No battery back up otherwise really good
Reviews.Author: Kevin Watterson
Reviews.Content: This is a really good TV but I can't quite give it five stars. My house is really cold due to the heat being shut off in the winter (I didn't pay my bill) and the screen will sometimes fog over due to the temperature difference. It also lacks a battery backup which is important because I don't always pay my electric bill. (Money has been really tight ever since I quit my job in January 2013.) I do however appreciate them being willing to let me pay for the tv in an installment plan as my unemployment checks came in, I probably wouldn't have been able to afford it if they made me pay for it all at once (I checked with the government office but it wouldn't give me all my unemployment money at once).

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Julie Hall "mommycat"
Reviews.Content: Just emptied my kids college fund account because this is one hell of an opportunity. Seriously, you cannot go wrong investing in this type of product. It is golden. In today's unstable world economy, there is still money to be made in long-term investments such as this. Like most electronic devices these days, it will only appreciate in value. The difference here is that this item will appreciate eve moreso, exponentially even. Seriously, this is a once in a lifetime opportunity to take $40,000 out of the hands of a corrupt banking Industry or unscrupulous Wall Street brokers and put it somewhere safe and reliable. College will be paid for. (For several generations?) Your retirement plan will be more than airtight. This is a thing of beauty. It could not possibly ever lose value. Items like this baby never become obsolete. The smart TV is here to stay. Just like your Betamax, your 8-track tape player, your Kodak Instamatic camera, your Sony Walkman, your Victrola.... This baby is a sure thing, baby.

Reviews.Title: New Wall for our Mobile Home!
Reviews.Author: S. Ratley
Reviews.Content: We are so very happy with this TV.  The wall to our mobile home was torn out by the last tornado that came through our town.  We ordered that TV and now we have a new wall and now the raccoons and other critters can't come into the house!  We do have some problems with birds nesting in the back of the TV but heck we are using our government money for it and now we can see all the rassling matches, ball games and cock fights we want!  The picture is  so clear that Ma can stand in the kitchen and cook without having to leave the kitchen.  She gits my beers and never misses a lick fryin those  rocky mountain oysters!  DANG, this is the best deal out there -- even better than the Dollar Store.  Ya'll check it out, ya hear???

Reviews.Title: Our Own Front Yard Drive-In
Reviews.Author: Tahitian pearls
Reviews.Content: We paved the front yard, added speakers on poles, my 10 year old twin daughters have their skates on, hubby's got the grill ready, grandma's got the popcorn popped, and the TV should be here any minute. Everyone in the city has paid 10.00 each to come watch the news tonight, then a rerun of 2 1/2 men, and the full hour episode of Survivor. With 5,000 people in our town, 4.00 for the hot dogs, 2.00 for the popcorn, and 50 cents to drink out of the hose, we will have this paid for in 1 day. Thanks Samsung for making this possible

Reviews.Title: Auto picture adjustment amazing.
Reviews.Author: Ivan
Reviews.Content: Replaces Hayden Christensen with Sebastian Shaw, returning the ending of "Return of the Jedi" to how it originally was automatically. Worth every penny.

Reviews.Title: The American Dream
Reviews.Author: Phoebe
Reviews.Content: After much careful consultation with my parents, I have decided to sacrifice my hopes of higher education for higher resolution. Life is all about sacrifices, right? I know my parents have worked hard in order to give me a better future, but I know they won't mind. The second mortgage on the house is pretty tough, but my new job at TJ Maxx is helping them out a little.

Reviews.Title: Buyer Beware
Reviews.Author: teamc
Reviews.Content: So I go to buy this TV from Amazon, unfortunately due to stock issues can't get one.  So I turn to eBay and find a refurbished unit from South America.  Two weeks later my package arrives and it's a beauty... One can't describe this in words.  Anyway, I plug it in and the thing is dead.  Being a bit of a handy man I decide to remove the back cover and see if the processor had come loose during transit. Imagine my surprise when I find 4 kilos of white powder in bags hidden inside the TV. I ordered the wrong 4k TV. Not 20 mins after I find the stash, three shady blokes kick in my front door screaming at me, wanting to know where the TV is.  We're they kidding???? This thing is 80+ inches!... So they walk the three feet over to the TV and proceed to remove the stash and leave.  Now I have another friggen Samsung TV to join the other four Samsung tv's that either were DOA or died in the first month.  They do look good though!

Reviews.Title: Great definition!
Reviews.Author: Flam
Reviews.Content: The really great thing about this TV is the picture quality. Now I can tell the difference between George Takei and Yoko Ono. Steve Tyler and Fizzgig. Ricky Gervais and someone who is actually funny.Forget about the price- pfft, only the poor complain about money. Buy three for hyper realism now!

Reviews.Title: Just the perfect size for the shower rooms
Reviews.Author: Jeff Buxton
Reviews.Content: At a price that low I bought 3, one for each of the full-size shower rooms in my Scottsdale second home. Anything less than 80" in the shower room is like being poor and I'm so done with THAT !Now, I'm a reasonable man. I stuck with the 66" TV for the gym shower. I mean, my personal gym shower room is only 12' x 15', so a 66" is adequately sized to make sure I don't miss anything on my way from the gym to the shower to the family room.Now, those family room and gym TVs are properly sized to the rooms over there. Look, if I have the money to put in my own 4K movie screens with surround sound, you should be happy for me instead of all jealous and stuff. I'm practically keeping the economy moving all by myself.In case you want to visit, my address is #1 Champion Drive, Scottsdale, AZ. Text me and I'll leave the security system off for you. No way I'm tearing myself away from the TV to let you in, and besides, I could be tanning.

Reviews.Title: Accidentally bought with 1-click purchase, not disappointed!
Reviews.Author: Blair Williams
Reviews.Content: Thanks again to amazon for making me purchase more than I need with the single click of a button. Due to laziness, I didn't cancel the order. Subsequently, due to that laziness, my wife divorced me. Ironically, she married a millionaire who had this exact same TV. He's a douchebag nonetheless but a rich douchebag with a $40k dollar TV gets the girl apparently. Oh, in review, the TV was great! Yes "was." Until the house fire... Wish I could've afforded to insure it.

Reviews.Title: TV touches the heart
Reviews.Author: WhateverWorks
Reviews.Content: Working for a reclusive billionaire has its perks. He agreed to set this up in one of the guest bedrooms in case a friend decides to visit. Its been several years since a friend has arrived, but the island is hard to get to. Anyway, the other servants and I were "testing" the television to make sure it was working properly when my boss walks in. He stopped and actually watched a TV show! The next thing I knew he was crying and told us that he had no idea Americans lived in such poverty. He has assigned me to coordinate relief efforts for the poor down-trodden family he saw on television. Problem is...I have to come up with a way to help the Kardashians.

Reviews.Title: Free Shipping
Reviews.Author: kar
Reviews.Content: Hey - free shipping. With the money you save on the shipping costs you could afford to buy a sound bar or speakers to go with it. Y think this will work great as an external monitor for my laptop :)

Reviews.Title: The Frame The frame
Reviews.Author: Zenon duda
Reviews.Content: Well kinda satisfied except for the frame thing has been a little hard to live with but my grandpa came over and put a few 3 1/2 inch dry walls screws into each of the corners and now it seems much more stable on the walls. I wonder why they just don't put that in the assembly packages.Also am a bit uncomfortable with the way it reads my mind when I look at it. It did't do it a lot at first but now it's like every time I sit on the sofa.We've been watching the NASA stuff on the Discovery Channel and I can use my telescope from my neighbors house to look at the moon. In fact I don't think I'm ever going to look at the moon again, this VR stuff is way better.

Reviews.Title: life is over
Reviews.Author: bmott81
Reviews.Content: In all my life I have never seen a TV as wonderful as this.. I popped in a "drunk truckers and blond f!@#$$" blueray and OMG!!!... even blobs in real life dont look this amazing.. As soon as I get out of jail for indecent exposure at Best Buy I am going to buy one of these..

Reviews.Title: Take a step back and mute
Reviews.Author: ProgSociologist
Reviews.Content: At first I hurt my neck trying to watch tennis on my new Samsung and was kind of disappointed, but after I installed it at the end of my bowling alley the picture is great.  (For tennis, the mute button is essential.  Otherwise the grunts set off all the neighbors' car alarms).

Reviews.Title: What they don't show you....
Reviews.Author: Steven Dallwig
Reviews.Content: This TV uses good ol' fashioned rabbit ear antennas (Which they don't show in the photo) and due to the size of the TV there are actually 16 different antennas that extend a full 10 ft.  Most channels come in really clear but when watching Fox my 7 year old has to hold all 16 antennas in-between his fingers while standing on one foot.  One or two tv shows is fine, but football games..., he gets a little cranky.  If they can fix this then I can't imagine why anyone wouldn't want this.

Reviews.Title: Zygon fakery...again!
Reviews.Author: Kris James
Reviews.Content: The images this screen displays are NOT bigger on the inside. They are NOT slices of real time. Samsung is trying to pass this behemoth off as authentic Gallifreyan technology, but if you examine the back of the casing in the lower left corner, you can clearly see the tiny stamped Japanese kanji translate in proximity to the TARDIS. Seriously, who do they think they're fooling?

Reviews.Title: No battery
Reviews.Author: Youa Chang
Reviews.Content: Stupid, pay that much for a TV and no battery for the damn remote. I know what you're thinking, if I can afford a 40 grand tv then the price of batteries are nothing. But bloody hell, every tv I bought before had batteries.

Reviews.Title: It will change your life.
Reviews.Author: Joseph Jones
Reviews.Content: I don't know why that couple had to sell their daughter for this TV--if they had the same experience I have had, they'd never need to consider such a thing.This television has changed my life. Since buying this product, I can now leap over buildings (in a single bound!) I have written the great American novel. Women want me, and men want to be me. I've begun to have daily conversations with God--and He lets me do most of the talking. Food tastes better, air is cleaner.Every University in the world has offered me an honorary doctorate. I saw Patient Zero become infected with the virus, and single handedly prevented the Zombie Apocalypse. I won the Super Bowl with an amazing last second touchdown pass--even though I was tired after performing the half-time show. My License to Kill is now automatically renewed. And, best of all, Canada has decided to grant me automatic citizenship. Yes, I owe it all to this amazing TV!

Reviews.Title: Only pay 22% to get my TV!
Reviews.Author: Matt
Reviews.Content: I don't usually take the time to write a review because I am busy paying 22% interest on the loan I took out to buy this TV.  It barely fit on my horse to take it home and we had to unsew the tent to get it in the door.  If you ever want to unsew something you should call my wife.  She doesn't have many teeth anymore but she still can get stuff unsewed iffin ya know what I mean.  Anyway, this TV is nice.  I bought it for my 1 year old can learn from teacher Elmo.  The TV also is great for my wife to lose weight.  All she has to do is watch the biggest catch and she pukes from watching the motion in the ocean.  Better than disease are these big tvs.The TV does what TVs do it just does it in a way that makes my banker think I am pretty cool.

Reviews.Title: Great Investment - Start Your Own Business!
Reviews.Author: Kenneth E. Wilson "KenSanDiego"
Reviews.Content: After my unemployment ran out I decided to make some changes to my life. It was time for a fresh start. So with the last $40,000 from my panhandling under-the-table money, I invested in this beauty. I rented out my space at the busy intersection and 'will work for food' sign to a stock broker friend who had his 500k annual bonuses nearly cut in half. Hope he makes it. Anyway, I rigged 4 shopping carts together and mounted the TV to it. I found an electric outlet in the park used by the day maintenance guys and setup a nighttime mobile movie theater. I charge $5 a head and show movies that are currently in the theater by downloading the bittorrent with my Obamaphone and streaming them to the TV via wifi. Thanks to this TV I should be back on my feet in no time.

Reviews.Title: Bad Idea
Reviews.Author: chris
Reviews.Content: Makes me feel like a have a 2 inch dick when I watch porn the screens so big and clear it makes everything look so and real.Great for action movies though.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV
Reviews.Author: Jay
Reviews.Content: Goes great with my gold plated Xbox One and Platinum plated PS4. I bought it for my restroom for when I am bored while using my porcelain throne to do my business. It was funny watching the delivery men struggle to bring this behemoth into my mansion.L.o.L.M.D. Fluggersworth

Reviews.Title: I deserve it
Reviews.Author: steve t
Reviews.Content: I see a lot of you are having fun commenting on this very expensive tv.  Let me tell you. When you have 8000 s.f of living space with 8 baths and 6 bed rooms a tv of this size fits right in.  It's the american  dream.  You see I am a winner. I am knocking down close to 1 million per year. So there's no reason to live modestly. I must continue to feed the beast. Of course my wife and daughter can comfortably live in a  3500 square-foot home and still have room to spare. Shure I can spend $50,000 on car and have a quiet comfortable ride. But this is America and I choose to spend twice that amount. Besides what else would  I do with all that money? I see nothing wrong with pissing all of it away on property taxes,  landscaping crew, pool boy,housekeeper and everything else it takes to maintain a home as large as mine. So, you see this television is the perfect choice. I totally deserve it!

Reviews.Title: WTF
Reviews.Author: michelle morgan
Reviews.Content: It's not fair.I don't have any children of my own to sell off.  I also don't think the state of my internal organs will fetch me the money I'm going to need to buy this TV.Can I just pick up some kids off the street - sell them and/or their organs?Can I do this on Ebay?  Will I get more if i hold out for an auction?Second thoughts.... I don't think this thing will even fit in my lounge.  I will need to knock out a wall (and my neighbour's house).I'm also concerned it might terrify my cat if I play reruns of Lassie.

Reviews.Title: In Home Tanning Salon
Reviews.Author: Sreenadh
Reviews.Content: This TV is great now I don't have to worry about going out to get a tan, the giant screen gives off enough radiation for me to enjoy my tv while tanning at the same time! The best part is that they include 2 FREE batteries so there was no way that i was going to pass on that! Granted, my kids wont go to college but at least they will have a beautiful tan and feed their eye's with beautiful quality television

Reviews.Title: WHY BUY ONE WHEN YOU CAN GET TWO FOR TWICE THE COST
Reviews.Author: ANGER!
Reviews.Content: I BOUGHT TWO BECAUSE I THOUGHT WHY PAY 39,999.99 WHEN YOU CAN PAY 79,995.98 FOR TWO AND GET FREE SHIPPING. BEST TV I EVER BOUGHT. I PUT IT IN THE BATHROOM SO I COULD WATCH THE OCEAN WHEN SHOWERING. I HUNG THE OTHER ONE IN THE GARAGE TO WATCH YOU TUBE VIDEO. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND BUYING A FEW OF THEM.

Reviews.Title: It's not like us %1 don't have our crosses to bear - ...
Reviews.Author: JT Rafferty
Reviews.Content: Wow people, I'm offended by the class warfare espoused in these reviews.  This might as well be the People's Republic of Amazon what with all the hating on the job creators: the 1% of the people in this country that actually work hard to climb the ladder of success.  It's not like us %1 don't have our crosses to bear -- would you believe our 70 yr old Mexican housekeeper called in sick the day this TV arrived on the doorstep so I had to lug it in myself, pulled a muscle in my back while that old bitty played hooky skipping her 12 hour shift!!  Gotta get back to watching "Honey Boo Boo" in upsampled 4K splendor while the masseuse works on that sore back, see ya!

Reviews.Title: I hate this TV not worth the trouble...Price is ok
Reviews.Author: Idontknowmyname
Reviews.Content: I hate this dang 182.9 lb piece of crap. I had to return it because of the weight and its malfunctions. I could not hang it on my wall because of the weight and my wall fell down because of it. Warranty doesnt cover walls. Well BS....Also The worst thing about this tv was I was drunk and put it on my AMEX thinking it was 4K. Amazon should be in trouble for falsifying  their adds. This tv was not 4K it was $40K. But the free shipping was great.... In addition, I called amazon several times because the TV had a malfunction. Each time I would watch Adult TV on direct TV channel 595 my channels would change. I called them several times and the tech kept saying this tv has hand recognition... what a bunch of crap....

Reviews.Title: An Entrepreneur's Dream-Come-True
Reviews.Author: Ethan Fixell
Reviews.Content: Purchased this fine piece of electronic elegance for my dojo last week, and my clients have never been more pleased.  No longer must rails be administered off of long mirrors purchased at Home Depot... Instead, not only does this TV's massive display allow for multiple users to snort simultaneously, but the reflective surface is absolutely perfect for tracking those runaway specks of snow that are usually so difficult to collect LOL!Not to mention, Hanson, my tiger, is absolutely in AWE of the realistic images brought to life by the National Geographic blu-rays I can play on this television. He thinks he's back home in Bangkok!All in all, I can't recommend this item enough -- purchase it today and you won't be disappointed.Also, if anyone needs some coke, I'm your guy.

Reviews.Title: r u serious
Reviews.Author: it is the wrst game i efrd playd in my lief
Reviews.Content: why buy a new truck when i could have this. i need to know is worth spending all the $$$$$$$

Reviews.Title: Free Pizza!
Reviews.Author: Steve Piotrowski
Reviews.Content: Figured I'd like to pull the old Macaulay Culkin "Home Alone" scare the pizza guy away with loud gun noises trick to get my free pizza with no tip. Instead of going to the corner store to buy some cheap firecrackers I ordered this behemoth and sat it at the door. Pizza guy comes and I played the "XXX: State of the Union" bomb scene (CAUTION: Super Loud and realistic with this thing!) and bam, the guy s*** his pants and dropped the pizza. Now just 3,999 pizzas to go and I've covered the cost!If you'd like a free pizza just drop me a line, there's plenty to go around.Side note: Don't order extra cheese, it tends to run off when the box is dropped... just saying. I'm also selling the fertilizer this guy leaves every time he s***s his pants if you're interested.

Reviews.Title: I was on the fence but.......
Reviews.Author: kevinito
Reviews.Content: I was on the fence but then I read 30 days free tech support!!!!! I'll take two! How could I go wrong?

Reviews.Title: Nice!
Reviews.Author: Joseph Cianci
Reviews.Content: Hocked the wife's jewelry. Worked out just right.Took delivery today. Can't wait to see the look on her face.

Reviews.Title: World changing television!
Reviews.Author: Sean McManus
Reviews.Content: I had my doubts about this TV. Sure I had to sell one of my kidneys to a shady fellow in Tijuana (I have to admit the ice-cube bath was pleasant to wake up in) then agree to play coyote to impoverished people crossing a certain border. And then beat up about 1000 school kids for their lunch money, sell both my younger sisters into white slavery and perform about a dozen "hits"But it was all worth it! The second I plugged this TV in my hair was suddenly perfect, my acne was gone, about 150 pounds of fat just vanished to be replaced with adonis-like muscles and suddenly I had supermodels knocking in my door to "get with me". My wallet was suddenly stuffed with so much cash I could afford to wipe with $100 bills and not even care. My rink a dink jalopy was instantly replaced with a one of a kind McLarren supercar. If this TV was any more life-changingly awesome then it should be illegal in the USA.Now if you peasants will excuse me, I have about 45 of worlds hottest women waiting for me in my bedroom.

Reviews.Title: Terrible Picture Frame
Reviews.Author: T. Reid
Reviews.Content: I originally purchase this to display family photos of one of our vacations. I didn't actually realize how large this purchase was until it arrived. I sighed "oh well, it will have to do" and promptly set up the slideshow. To my dismay, the frame froze on one of the less flattering pictures from the trip, Auntie May, with her bucktooth and missing ear. I was unable to do anything to fix this, so I gave up. The picture frame now sits prominently in the living with with Auntie May giving us "the look", as we named it. My children won't sit in here with me though, they usually let out a shriek and briskly remove themselves from the room upon entering it. Overall, 5 stars!

Reviews.Title: Love this TV
Reviews.Author: Bank of America
Reviews.Content: The 320lbs for this tv is worth it. I had to call all of my neighbors over to help me lift it on my tv stand. Now he is in the hospital for a hernia. So worth the 40k.

Reviews.Title: Excellent For Life Size Enterprise Replica Enthusiasts
Reviews.Author: G. Christie
Reviews.Content: Thank you Samsung for creating such a top notch screen to be installed in my model starship bridge.I was going to use my dads old projection tv recessed into the bridges plywood and 2x4 hull wall.But this bad boy will integrate seamlessly with all the other technical things I can't remember the name of right now.

Reviews.Title: This tv changed my life.
Reviews.Author: James Belcher
Reviews.Content: I was holding out for the 86-inch, but I finally caved due to the price drop from $44,999.99 to $39,997.99.  You just can't pass up a bargain like that.  Granted, I had to knock a wall out to bring it into the house, that extra $5002 I saved more than paid for that.  All I know is that the picture quality is so excellent that every time I watch pron, I truly feel like there are two (or more, depending on what I'm into that night) giants having sex right there in my presence.  I can even see their individual skin cells.  And that really does it for me... I never knew I had a giant fetish until now.  Thank you, Samsung.

Reviews.Title: WORTH IT
Reviews.Author: Anthony Merkel
Reviews.Content: After knocking over 7 jewelry stores and 5 gas stations. I was able too afford this fine piece of technology. The picture is beyond words. It was so good I ducked while watching Independence Day on it because the picture was like looking out of a window! The sound lacks so by a quality surround sound system. Another thing I lo... Hold, someone is yelling search warrant get on the ground. I think the police are across the street at the neighbors house because their kids were using fire crackers , brb.............

Reviews.Title: Close, but no cigar
Reviews.Author: al rotundo
Reviews.Content: I was more than ready to buy this set, but it turns out that the stateroom in my extra yacht is 4 feet too wide, and it will look dumb if I just stick a Picasso or a Monet in there. Can't they build one just a little larger?

Reviews.Title: Warning!
Reviews.Author: california BEAR
Reviews.Content: Apparently amazon does not like my  profane language so I will re write this as clean as possible,this tv looks so real that when watching a boxing game or any other sport it looks so real, now I purchased this tv about 2 weeks ago as soon as I set it up I was watching mma when suddenly I got kicked  in the face or so I thought it's just so real I got up of my chair feeling dizzy of that kick and punched the su**r straight in the jaw, as to when I realized it was just tv and I had just broken my 40k tv with ought insurance I when's of into a dark corner to cry, moral of the story don't buy something so real!  I'd rather buy a projector than this.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for brightening up a dull room.
Reviews.Author: Carden Blackthorne
Reviews.Content: I must say, this is the perfect thing to brighten up Castle Blackthorne's dungeon.  Ever since those pesky laws were put in place saying you can't keep prisoners in your castle dungeon, that whole section of the castle was seeing zero use.  Now I'm well on my way to turning it into a home theater!

Reviews.Title: Great, but not perfect for home use
Reviews.Author: Sean
Reviews.Content: Tried to return this TV after having watched Shark week and now became horrified at the thought of the ocean, but they wouldn't take it back. Now my wife watches Desperate Housewives on Netflix off of it, and I have to avoid eye contact with her.Thanks, Samsung. You made a TV that emasculated me.The TV quality is good, though.
