It was a little awkward having to hang it, since the trailer doesn't really have a whole lot of wall space, but once we knocked out the wall between the bathroom and bedroom it fit fairly well. Once we cleared away the debris, we were the envy of our neighbors. They kept coming over and asking for various things, even late at night! One of them even tried to get our attention by knocking on the window to our bedroom at around 1AM, I think he heard that there was a marathon of Battlestar Galactica on, but ever since we started just sleeping in the car we really haven't had much trouble sleeping.I'd rate this TV higher, but unfortunately there's so much room for improvement here. For instance, the TV doesn't react well to water. So when we were installing it, there were some problems from backflow where the toilet used to be. Really, Samsung, would it be so hard to just put a protective covering on it? I spent a week drying it out and cleaning it before we were able to watch anything else, and that was just awkward.Another problem was that it makes it really hard to know what's real and what's not in your house after awhile, if you wear the 3D glasses all the time (and why wouldn't you, when you can see it from anywhere so clearly?). I mean, after a few weeks I had a hard time telling when my friend Jason would come over and hang out for hours. Since he'd be there helping my wife around the house before I got home in the afternoon it was sometimes hard to not think he was just part of the house.So beware, buyers. You should be prepared for some fairly significant changes to your life.

Reviews.Title: Property Taxes begone!
Reviews.Author: ROA
Reviews.Content: For those who think that this is too much money for a television, well, you are not thinking outside the box. I recently purchased five of them and set them up via house-of–cards style and the cost was much less than my now sold house, no property taxes and it has more square footage. Furthermore, I have a mobile house that has much more “street cred” than a stereotypical double wide. Check it: I now have a full blown screen house in which I can watch five basketball games at once. My bathroom is now in the second USB port. Seriously, I’m telling you: This TV is huge!

Reviews.Title: best TV ever
Reviews.Author: Thanh  Nguyen
Reviews.Content: My friend, DamTc, bought 2 these amazing TVs for me a few month ago. I put one in the kitchen and one in my 4 car garage. They are the best pictures I've ever seen.

Reviews.Title: I would have paid twice the price.
Reviews.Author: Nick L
Reviews.Content: I love this TV!!! I work at Burger King during the day but picked up a job moonlighting at 7-11 to help pay for it. I have been robbed 8 times and was stabbed 3 of those times but it’s so worth it. The 2 day shipping was spot on. The C-17 air drop was fairly accurate as it landed in my neighbor’s backyard. Once I sedated his pit bull I began to tear down the fence. I wasn’t able to move the TV on my own so I had to go to the local Home Depot and hire 4 undocumented workers to move it into my house. It cost me an additional $3.50 (an expense I didn’t budget for) but they got it into the living room and set it up for me. That was a week ago, the undocumented workers from Home Depot haven’t left yet and invited more of their family over, something about squatters rights or something? I don’t know, I don’t speak their language. Anyhow Telemundo is crystal clear. I couldn’t be happier

Reviews.Title: Upgrade your life!
Reviews.Author: Gonzalo G. Sanchez Jr.
Reviews.Content: After the death star was destroyed, I just knew it was time to upgrade some of our "out of systems" and LED Screen. They work great, we even put one in the break room. The boss man vader said there is nothing like watching "love it or list it". And the delivery was spot on from amazon's warehouse to our space gate! Those are the drones we are looking for. This is a must buy!

Reviews.Title: Energy Saver!!!
Reviews.Author: Antonio T. Sykes
Reviews.Content: When I realized that I could save on average $39 dollars a month on my energy bill compared to other TV's 69.5 in or greater I knew I had to have this TV.  Thanks Samsung

Reviews.Title: Don't forget about the accessories you'll require...
Reviews.Author: A young Navy brat
Reviews.Content: In anticipation of this TV hitting the market, My wife and I bought a larger house with a wall big enough to accommodate it. We also had to make sure the room was large enough for our stadium seating needs. All in all, the total cost for this TV was around $200k.

Reviews.Title: My husband is going to pay!
Reviews.Author: Amber
Reviews.Content: My husband and I were looking for a flat screen TV, and decided that a 55-60 inch would be a great size for our living room. He took over the searching of course, and I THOUGHT we agreed that anything bigger would be too big, and too expensive. He seemed sneaky somehow...so I decides to log on to his amazon account to see what he was looking at, and noticed he had this gigantic TV in his cart....so, instead of turning it into a verbal argument, I added a banana slicer to his cart as well :) ladies...it's not too hard to find one, it's in the section of what customers have also viewed. Save yourself a long drawn out argument, and make that man aware of what affect this could have on your relationship...and his manhood.

Reviews.Title: Batteries Included
Reviews.Author: JBig
Reviews.Content: Some might think that spending more that $30K on a TV is outrageous, but the UN85S9 is worth it in the extras alone. 30 days of free technical support after purchase was more than enough to let me know that this was a great value. most TV send you only a bulky poorly written owner's manual to help you get started. Not the UN85S9 though, they actually allow you to call tech support for up to 30 days at no extra charge! Incredible! The cherry on top though, was the fact that it came with 2 AA batteries for the remote. Nothing worse than opening your new TV and turning it on only to realize you have to run to the store to get some batteries for the remote. But with the UN85S9, there was no worries there, they were included. Honestly, that kind of service is priceless.

Reviews.Title: Would like to buy but...
Reviews.Author: Joshua Rook "RooK!"
Reviews.Content: I think the TV would be wonderful, however I'm a bit disappointed in Amazon and may buy from another retailer.No subscribe and save?  Come on Amazon, this TV is 85 in.  I can't be dusting this every month... The option to have one sent to me each month for say $37,999.00 to avoid dusting it is a MUST!  Come ON!!I will keep eyeing this.  I hope Amazon takes my suggestion to heart!

Reviews.Title: 0% Financing Mahout Central Bank of Nihar GmbH
Reviews.Author: carbonbased
Reviews.Content: My gorgeous 27 year old blue eyed, blonde wife and I enjoyed a fantastic getaway together north of the Jordan. Super exotic, just the two of us. Did I mention romantic? We took a few Indian pachyderms --- they could be Asian elephants what do I know? Who wrote this.She and her guide took one elephant. My guide and I took the other. Awesome expedition. In broken English, my Mahout guide asked and pointed, "Hoew muech." He was pointing at Bev. I said not by the hair on a pig's chinny chin chin pal. Get the picture. "I did not kneweth pigs hath chins." Kuramar said. Everyone loves a comedian, and elephants. Exit clown #1 I'm thinking.Half hour later he tapped on my shoulder and pointed again. I turned my ear. "Alright let's make a deal Kuramar." He said, "80 thewsand American doollars."If y'all see Bev on NATGeo or something, I was JUST thinking of you a few weeks ago! Bev you're the BESTEST! Check out my upcoming review. Big Petey, Little Petey, Ortha Petey and Joe aka Joe 'Bag O Doughnuts' do a barber shop quartet to Captain and Tennille in the style of Beyonce and Madonna.

Reviews.Title: best decision ever
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: My son and I made a great decision. Who needs college when we can buy this and enjoy it together forever.... a decision never felt so right I love you SAMSUNG... :)

Reviews.Title: Samsung has saved me!
Reviews.Author: Natural health care fan "Natural health care fan"
Reviews.Content: I'm SO happy this was delivered! Now I can leave the televison in one of the mansions and watch it while I travel on the space shuttle! I'll have room to pack more gold bars and civet coffee :) :). Thank you Samsung for making it possible for me to watch entertainment featuring the lowly peons while being so far away from them!  Now I can leave this planet of commoners.  I was so tired of slumming with the Koch brothers!

Reviews.Title: Super Bowl Party
Reviews.Author: Michael W Doran Jr
Reviews.Content: Amazon has the best return policy ever...just borrowed it for 3 weeks and just ship it back totally free. Just alternate sites and always buy the extended warranty because that's returnable as we'll.  Enjoy...

Reviews.Title: Found G Spot
Reviews.Author: Noicc
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV at a bargain basement price at Wal-Mart for $38,000.  The reasoning for purchasing this TV is because I have a vast collection of pornography (Brazilian fart porn in my opinion is the crème de la crème). It is essential for me to have the paramount of detail available.  Well, with the help of this TV I'm finally able to locate the G Spot.  TIP: It's just a few inches off to the left. Thank you Samsung, for this marvelous invention.

Reviews.Title: Worth it!!
Reviews.Author: Amanda Thach
Reviews.Content: No more to say. Would do it again. Love you Mom and Dad, even the temporary ones. Watching One Direction music videos on this TV is like having 7 orgasms at once.

Reviews.Title: The perfect size
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: I can see that for some rooms this TV could be seen as being 'too big'. But for me, it covers the only window in my lounge perfectly.

Reviews.Title: love the picture
Reviews.Author: michael vega
Reviews.Content: Fits in my bathroom perfect. Superbowl stripper pole and a jacuzzi tub. Watch out BeastMode we coming for the ring!

Reviews.Title: contract killings look amazing at 4k
Reviews.Author: Christian Dominguez
Reviews.Content: I considered filming my exploits and putting them on youtube, but I decided to save them and show them to our party guests on our new 85" TV.The most amazing thing is the bloof splatter, it's like you were actually there ...The best part is that apparently this TV fell off a truck somewhere in Bangladesh and I got the opportunity to feed a hungry family for $1000, and I got this free TV.Winning!!!

Reviews.Title: Great viewing
Reviews.Author: Debra H. May
Reviews.Content: I bought this to watch University of Kentucky basketball. Who knew how great it would be to watch the Harrison twins pick their noses and wipe them on the other teams' shorts!

Reviews.Title: The future is here.
Reviews.Author: Aaron Macruairi
Reviews.Content: Gone are the days of minuscule screen span. The future is here, and along with it... life size porn! Other stuff too I suppose.

Reviews.Title: Time machine feature makes it worth the expense
Reviews.Author: Edmund N Purcell
Reviews.Content: Watching Dwight Clark's "The Catch" miraculously turn into "The Drop" made my entire year. The subsequent return of my childhood innocence was a nice added bonus. Who knew that Danny White was the best QB ever to play the game?!Looking forward to next week when UCLA beats Miami in 1998 and goes on to win the national championship...

Reviews.Title: Outstanding purchase
Reviews.Author: Empty Suit
Reviews.Content: After reading all 960 reviews, I made the decision to go ahead with my purchase. I'm extremely happy with the TV, and after some major renovations to the house, were able to find a great place to watch our favorite shows. When we throw in the renovation costs, out outlay has been around a quarter of a million dollars - money well spent in our opinion. When I say our opinion, I mean mine, and my neighbors, who can watch it from the comfort of their living rooms.

Reviews.Title: Replacement and Extended Warranty
Reviews.Author: Decimuz
Reviews.Content: Only cost me an extra $10,000 for a 2 year replacement Warranty. The one year was only $8,000.. What a deal!

Reviews.Title: WOW
Reviews.Author: M. Anderson
Reviews.Content: This makes porn looks so much better. No more straining my eyes to see whats on the screen.Its so big!!!

Reviews.Title: Kind of Misleading.......
Reviews.Author: 375Ranger
Reviews.Content: So my wife was in the living room doing her thing watching her lifetime shows and I hear a loud scream. I have my m-4 rifle ready and start heading to the scene, clearing other rooms as I go. I stack up on the right wall with an open doorway into the living room. I count down 3......2....... I quickly turn the corner and "pie off" the room and first threat I came across was raising a weapon. No problem, 2 to the chest and 1 to the head is how we roll. I go to clear the obj and notice that strangely my first target pretty much disintegrated on impact but still, tango down. So all I can really say is that I have an awesome rifle with awesome skills and an awesome audio system with a worthless tv that they should at LEAST put a level of ballistic armor in. Oh and Samsung, keep an eye out for it since I believe this should be covered via warranty; well maybe the extended warranty I paid for.

Reviews.Title: Wow....Mr Bean comes to life!
Reviews.Author: B. Thomas
Reviews.Content: You haven't ever seen Mr Bean until you've seen him on this 85", 4K Ultra HD wonder! So glad I only had to sell just 1 kidney to get this. Mr Bean, you are the greatest!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Amazon Optimus Prime is Awesome!
Reviews.Author: James B.
Reviews.Content: I actually logged onto my Amazon Optimus Prime account to find new doggy beds for the dogs wing of the house and I ran across this puppy. I am quite sure our 5 Velociraptors will enjoy eating their long horn cattle as they lay in the comfort of the raptor beds and watch the Jurasic Park Trilogy in 4k. Thats right we whats left of our highly trained staff (Raptors are pack hunters, against Dr. Malcom's advice we procured 5 from the wonderful Dr Hammond) make beds out of the 5 boxes and to imagine these were cheaper than the raptor beds we were going to buy. It is so hard to find a XXXXXXL bed for them, their tails are so long and they DO NOT like them to be on the floor. Jeeves was so pleased to here we were not going to lay him off to pay for shipping, thank you Samsung for including free shipping..........................................................As an addition we bought four more TV's for members of congress and board members of INGEN to watch when they stop by.

Reviews.Title: Max out my credit card but worth it
Reviews.Author: Andrew B Hockley
Reviews.Content: My credit card limit is only $10,000 but I figured I could buy this 85 inch behemoth in 4 installments.  That gives me 21 inches each time I pay!  My wife said she would divorce me if i'm "dumb enough to buy it" but its such a great deal i can't pass it up!  I'll put the first 21 inches i get in the kitchen and when I have enough for a second installment I'll put the 42 inches in the bedroom.  Third installment at 63 inches obviously goes to the living room.  I'm not sure what I'll do when I get the whole 80+ inches at my 4th installment but I'm sure the wife gets it when the divorce is final.

Reviews.Title: Best in dash monitor.
Reviews.Author: Mr. X
Reviews.Content: THanks to Pimp my Ride for letting X to tha Z and the crew at West Coast Customs put this baby in my new pimped-out ride as an in-dash ps4 monitor.  I don't know how I ever lived without it.  Its even better than the Xhibit bobble head hood ornament.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Music Lover
Reviews.Content: I got this for my neighbor I just set it in my front yard point it at his window and turn it on. I could have thought of cheaper ways to get him back but hey with the 85" screen the 4k graphics and a cheep porno he will never forget my name.

Reviews.Title: That 120 hz refresh rate is a total dealbreaker.
Reviews.Author: Jason Silverman
Reviews.Content: I would gladly pay the asking price for this television, which I feel is a bargain when you consider all the pluses: the exclusive cachet of the "SAMSUNG" brand name; the reduction in heating prices due to reduction in livable area in your house; the standard image on the screen, which reminds me of George Winston and relaxes my nerves immensely.  However, when you look at the comparison Amazon has provided, the glaring design flaw of this television comes out. It has a 120hz refresh rate, whereas other, slightly less expensive TVs have 240.  Now, some of you may say that the human eye can see only up to 60hz, so what does it matter? Well, I'll tell you. When you make consumer decisions based on truly important things like I do, it matters.

Reviews.Title: Great picture!
Reviews.Author: David L. Wheeler
Reviews.Content: I recently purchased this TV, and connected it to a DVR with a high res camera pointing out my picture window.  With the TV placed in front of the picture window, I get a stunning, high def live video of the outside world! Well worth the price!

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV!
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: Awesome TV!  At first I was hesitant on purchasing a $40,000 TV when I know it will go on sale for $1,500 in a couple of years.  I worked at Circuit City for eleven years and experienced this with the first Phillips Plasma TV.  After collecting and recycling 800,000 cans I was able to take home this beauty!

Reviews.Title: Who needs a home?
Reviews.Author: eddie tringo "eddie"
Reviews.Content: I sold my house, it was worth it. The warmth form the TV is better than heat, or a bed, or a roof. it makes eating food and going to work seem trivial.

Reviews.Title: Roll Tide
Reviews.Author: Donnie D
Reviews.Content: I can't wait till it shows up. I will be the envy of the trailer park. I just hope I have a room big enough. I guess I can always build a deck with 2 x 4's, I'm pretty handy with a hammer and nails.

Reviews.Title: TV fit for you and your companion(s)!
Reviews.Author: Jose Carlos Trevino
Reviews.Content: I honestly didn't believe Samsung had a manufacturing plant on Gallifrey, but it's just as amazing as you'd expect!  It really does look bigger on the inside!

Reviews.Title: What a bargain.
Reviews.Author: Teresa A.
Reviews.Content: You know, I was a little concerned about spending so much money on a piece of technology that would probably break soon. But then I saw they offer 30 days of free tech support. Sold!

Reviews.Title: WOW
Reviews.Author: Mr. Sy fistication
Reviews.Content: I saw this technological marvel came on its own painting easel and knew right then I had to have it. When it arrived I was wearing my 3 wolf moon shirt and when the box was opened the heavens parted and a magical sound was heard, it was the harps of the angels  telling the world this man has exquisite taste. I immediately hung this masterpiece on the wall above the faux fireplace in the trailer, I used the stand for my velvet painting of Elvis because the TV should be the center piece of my double wide.

Reviews.Title: Get rich fast
Reviews.Author: Beau Dure
Reviews.Content: My repo business was struggling. People really don't care if you drag back some old clunker that'll bring in maybe $500 on the corner used car lot.But once people started buying these things, my finances turned around completely! I've been bringing in 5-6 of these things a week, and my clients are paying top dollar. When I retire next year, I might buy one or two of these myself.

Reviews.Title: Verified purchase?
Reviews.Author: Gabriel B.
Reviews.Content: Do Sam Jackson cuss? Yeah I got me one Black Friday?  Got it at Target though because they gave you choice of free HDMI cable or a Lexus ES350.  They were out of both so I had to take a substitution (Beyoncé is supposed to come over and sing the quick setup instructions this Saturday between 8:02AM and 11:27pm Tuesday).

Reviews.Title: ULTRA satisfied! Hehe
Reviews.Author: Andrew Ault
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV after I sold my left nut to doctors at UCLA and it was so worth the Tom Green aspirations I had! No doubt, I would sell my right one when the 100 inch comes out!

Reviews.Title: Simply Amazed
Reviews.Author: Fulgor
Reviews.Content: I first saw this massive piece of super advanced extraterrestrial technology from a distance while my wife was browsing the television section on her new ipad44 on the Web. I knew I had to have this baby, 85" of lifelike clarity, the kind of stuff you only see through the hubble telescope. My connections with the black market organ division apparently did not have any demand for vital organs mostly because they have seen a recent surge in willing donors, no doubt corresponding with the release of this TV. I was at a roadblock, I didn't know how I was going to get the 40k for this TV, I had to do something fast before the promotional sale ended. I knew I had one week. What took place over the next week is something only OJ Simpson could get away with. I was sitting at my table in the early hours of January 20'th 2014 drinking a freshly brewed cup of Kopi when it hit me, I knew exactly what needed to happen for my dream to come true.Visions of avatar in super 4K HD video were flashing before my eyes, the vibrant intensity of all the blue (which is my favorite color btw) had my heart near cardiac arrest. I recalled being at thanksgiving dinner this past year and my father, a few Heineken deep told me and my wife that he had taken out a life insurance policy just in case any freak accidents ever happened. Now, don't get me wrong, my father and I have a great relationship but I thought to myself, surely an 85" television of this quality would be enough to help grieve through the loss of a father. I won't get into the grim details of what happened last week but let's just say that OJ Simpson couldn't of pulled off this job as clean as I did. Fast forward to today. I got the money, turns out it was for 50k, some life insurance policy that was. My wife has left me and took the kids, dogs and cat. I got to keep the NES with Super Mario Bros 3 though. I was put out on the street with nothing but 50k in cold hard cash. I converted 40k into prepaid mastercards which is a another story in its self, try explaining why you need 400 prepaid 100 dollar mastercards to the girl working the counter at the pharmacy. Anyway, approximately 74 hours later I had my mastercards ready to go. My only problem at this point was how to get this rocket ship sized TV delivered to the abandon warehouse I was now living in. I decided to open a P.O box. Free shipping was key in this decision as 190 pounds of sey circuitry and glass would cost a fortune to ship. I got it 2 days later(wow that was fast). The remaining cash was used to purchase a 10k gas generator which I wasn't sure if that would even be enough jigawatts to run this monstrosity, luckily I had doc brown on speed dial if needed. I am glad to say that it is up and running now and this old warehouse aside from the rodents has never been so vibrant. I'm a pretty big deal around these parts. My spot is go to for cracked addicts and all drug users alike when they want to escape reality for a few short hours.. All in all, 5 star review and I would recommend this product to anyone willing to go the distance to get it.

Reviews.Title: WOW!!!
Reviews.Author: darius tadjrishi
Reviews.Content: I was going to buy a XBOX1 and a 50inch High (but not the highest) Definition TV. After being upsold to this TV by a monkey in a PCWorld Uniform, I could not afford the XBOX1.This was fine by me as I have a SNES at home. So anyway after many hours making my own HDMI - to - SCART - to RF - converter out of a toilet roll and sellotape I finally managed to get my SNES up and running.WOW is simply the only word i can use to describe the experience.16bit graphics are unbelievably sharp when running at 4k definition. One downside to it however, is that you can't play any horror games - When i was playing Super Mario World, I got to the first castle and Iggy Koopa was so big i soiled myself with my penis. I spent the next 3 days cowering behind the sofa as i couldn't find the remote (luckily enough it was also behind the sofa).I am now playing Kevin Keegan's Player Manager and so far, no more monsters.EDIT - There is a slight health problem with this TV. if you watch it for more than 65 seconds in any 24 hour period, you may bleed out of your eyes, ears and nose. - However if you're like me, then you'll have about 9 pints of blood in your body, so you can realistically get away with 5 minutes of watching, just remember to retain the blood. Wearing a cone they use for dog's who have just had surgery works fine - just wear swimming goggles.

Reviews.Title: Free shipping!
Reviews.Author: Kevin C Maxson
Reviews.Content: I bought it from amazon for the free shipping.  Can't beat that!  The local building office was concerned when I wanted to bring 220 into the living room to support it, but they understood when I explained and even helped with the structural modification necessary for my double wide so the whole thing wouldn't tip over, again.

Reviews.Title: That extra inch makes all the difference
Reviews.Author: Quaker
Reviews.Content: Was about to add the 84 inch Sony to my cart, but then I saw this beast. Totally worth the extra $15K.

Reviews.Title: Who needs to travel?
Reviews.Author: geologyfreak
Reviews.Content: I originally was going to use this 40k to go on quite a few trips around the world to see places I've always wanted to see, but then realized I could do it sitting on my couch, inside my house #yolo

Reviews.Title: Well, Well, Worth It.
Reviews.Author: Robert C Lucas
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV after selling a kidney, a lung and 1 testicle on the black-market over the summer break. Luckily, these TV's were still in stock while I was collecting from the organ recipients. After splurging on the TV and a "nudicle" (Replacement plastic testicle) I decided to take some time off and enjoy the comfort this TV provided during my recovery. All I can say is the picture is so unbelievably clear and realistic it has changed my life, in some ways for the worse as I am now using the bathroom every 11 minutes and can not take 15 steps without having a shortness in breath, but the HD picture makes it all worth it. The only downside I have now is that I can no longer watch exciting or horrifying movies as my lack of lung capacity could kill me during intense/scary scenes. Overall great purchase.

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV, but a few minor flaws.......
Reviews.Author: DLegend
Reviews.Content: We traded in 2 cars to get this bad boy. And let me tell you, it was soooo worth it. We have decided to walk to work from then on, or occasionally if we can afford it we use the public transportation. Now th 4 star rating is not because of the TV, but because of the fact that at times we have to sleep at work in order to come to work on time the next day. But hey no problem!It is so worth watching LOTR on this TV in 17 minute segments daily......I mean with all the walking to work that is all that we can manage, but hey, it feels like we are out there with Frodo, for the Nth time destroying that darn ring in the fires of Mordor.I guess the -1 star from a perfect score is also attributed to an occasional fight with the wife......I mean 17 mins/day, yeah we can get testy at each other over what we would like to watch in that time span. But again, not too big of a problem.Ultimately, we can't wait until the 100+ inch version of this TV comes so we can trade this bad boy in, move to a studio from our current 2 bedroom apartment, and get a loan from the bank to get the next greatest TV on the market. Hope we won't have to wait too long for that. And I wonder if the interest rate on the TV will be low?In the end, it was a great buy. We recommend it to all the enemies first, and then friends and family. for now, I guess they can just watch stuff on their boring TV and sleep while we enjoy 17 mins of 4K Ultra daily entertainment. Sweetness :)

Reviews.Title: Is it bigger on the inside?
Reviews.Author: Miskatonic
Reviews.Content: This was the perfect TV to make my $4000 per month studio apartment in downtown San Francisco just like Jake Sully's apartment from Avatar! I now have 200 square foot apartment and a giant TV for a wall that makes me forget how miserable my life is. I also converted the box that this TV comes with into an apartment. I am charging $2000 which seems like a legitimate amount of rent for such a palatial box in San Francisco. I also figure that if I ever get evicted from my apartment through the Ellis Act that I can just do the same to the people renting my box. For $39,999 this TV is nothing but a Win Win!

Reviews.Title: By far the best balance of quality and cost
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: I needed a 4k tv to watch amish mafia on, so after looking at the reviews this one seemed like the best balance of quality and cost.

Reviews.Title: order 2 its worth it
Reviews.Author: Mr. J. F. Pilott
Reviews.Content: I ordered one for me and one for my daughter. The funny thing is i used my girlfriends credit card. Her bank hasn't stopped calling.

Reviews.Title: Our New Home
Reviews.Author: James Sanderson
Reviews.Content: Sold the farm to get it, but well worth it.  The tilting mechanism allows for us to sleep soundly at night without fear of getting snowed upon.  The light also does well to heat the ground, keeping all the cow cows, horseys and sheep warm.

Reviews.Title: Don't be scared by the cheap price!
Reviews.Author: Arty
Reviews.Content: I was going to buy it but the cheap price scared me away. Something gotta be wrong with it. Then i saw that Tony Stark bought one for his bathroom. That's where i saw it... and i gotta say, it supports you with whatever you wanna do there, makes me feel i'm in a real bathroom...

Reviews.Title: Best decision I ever made
Reviews.Author: Scott whitbeck
Reviews.Content: I only got 30,000 for my wife from the sheik of Tehran.  but I was able to get a referbished model I was so happy when the transaction was complete and I was able to get my tv. She said she was going to leave me if I got the tv so. A little duck tape and black bag over her head and thanks to the morphine I stole from the hospital she was out in seconds and off to the Middle East just for me:) thank you honey! the Shiek said he will treat her well as long as she takes care of his needs whatever that means.  I got me an 85 inch tv! I decided to move into the garage better acoustics and to many memories in the house. The picture is incredible well worth the nogtiations that took more then 5 min. I can't believe I finally got what I always wanted for the rest of my life.

Reviews.Title: Been saving for over 20 years to purchase this bad boy.
Reviews.Author: Danny Hy
Reviews.Content: Been working the rice fields everyday since the day I was able to walk.  I saw a billboard of a TV back in the farmland and knew right then and there that I had to save my hard-earned coins to buy myself one.  Fast forward 20 years later, and I've finally picked enough rice to buy myself one of these bad boys.  Highly recommended.  Will buy again.

Reviews.Title: my baby
Reviews.Author: eddie
Reviews.Content: This TV is amazing! its got buttons, and dials and stuff and when you press your fingers onto the screen and swipe hard you get these cool multicoloured streaks! and the thing i love most about this TV is the voice control feature, although it still hasn't said anything to me yet, maybe we need more time together, maybe i'm doing something wrong? i caress it and i let it know how i feel about it but it still keeps its silence. Maybe one day i will hear it tell me that it loves me just the same, that my love and affection were not in vain, until then i love it....if you can hear me now baby!? i love you!

Reviews.Title: Can't live without it
Reviews.Author: Jodie O.
Reviews.Content: It was the free shipping that sold me on this bad boy.After a family meeting where we all decided to sell one kidney each on the black market and relocating our son to the shed in the yard, the newest addition to our happy home was installed in a fanfare of confetti and fireworks.Our son will no longer be attending college, nor will he be providing us with grandchildren as the toxic chemicals in the shed are known to cause infertility. But now we can watch Lord of the Rings in almost life size glory.FOR FRODO!

Reviews.Title: Alternative Use
Reviews.Author: D2B3C3
Reviews.Content: Love the tv however I can no longer afford cable or satellite so I use it to hang my clothes.

Reviews.Title: Greatest phone ever!
Reviews.Author: Dan R.
Reviews.Content: I'm pretty tech savvy, so when I got sick of my buddies bragging about the screen size of their galaxy phones, I ditched my iphone, bought this tv and rewired it to be a smartphone. Now they all watch in amazement when my girlfriend calls me and her picture comes up actual size. Only thing is to be sure to turn it off in movies because people get PISSED if you text.

Reviews.Title: Don't insult me!
Reviews.Author: J. Kerzner
Reviews.Content: What, Samsung and Amazon, you don't think I can afford a more expensive and larger one?!  I give you just three stars, despite its razor sharp quality of FOX news, and will banish it to my basement man cave awaiting one worthy enough to display in my family salon. Please don't insult my intelligence again and come out with the 100-incher!

Reviews.Title: Honey Boo Boo
Reviews.Author: kevsl
Reviews.Content: Finally, a TV where I can see every pock mark acne scar on Honey Boo Boo's moms face. Totally worth EVERY penny.

Reviews.Title: Slap Chop My Wallet!
Reviews.Author: AngelaH
Reviews.Content: I always wondered what that guy in the 'slap-chop' infomercials would look like in super HD!  I can now see the white powder around his nose.  Like a halo of personality and energy radiating from his nostrils.  Best purchase EVER!  I am going to need to budget to buy the 'slap-chop' though.  But after 5k OFF this TV I think I can wait.

Reviews.Title: Honey Boo Boo never looked so good.
Reviews.Author: Jethro Obama
Reviews.Content: After watching Honey Boo Boo on my black and white 13 inch Wards TV I wanted to upgrade but didn't have the coin. But then the accident happened. My baby mom got her meth mixed up with her home made birth control and ended up in a coma. Since I pay the most in child support I was given power of attorney. So instead of pulling the plug I chose to sell off some of her organs...just some. I hear after 2015 organ prices are gonna go up so I need to protect my investment. I also need a 85 inch TV to see Honey Boo Boo in almost life size! So I was able to sell a kidney and some of her eggs to get the money for this TV. WOW it is big...It takes up and entire wall of the trailer. I am not a fan of the hand control...it makes it really hard to watch the Spice channel...and the OWN Network. Everyone in the trailer park are so jealous but I just say....get your own baby mom and swap out the meth with the home made birth control and they can have one too. Or they can just look out their window cause you can see it all through out the park.

Reviews.Title: No turntable ?
Reviews.Author: Sharon Strater
Reviews.Content: almost got this . price seemed reasonable enough,  I was going to get this in honor of the 50 year anniversary of the war on poverty and then noticed that it does not come with a turntable to play records.  deal breaker for granpa

Reviews.Title: Not very compatible with existing devices
Reviews.Author: Mike Cappuccio
Reviews.Content: Perhaps I was overly optimistic, but when I bought this t.v. I assumed my VHS and 8-track wifi system would just plug right in but Samsung seems to want only their current hi tech devices to be compatible with this t.v. Even worse, PONG burns lines into the screen. Buyer beware: This is a loss leader for the them. After you pay what seems like a great price for a t.v. be prepared to pay an arm and a leg to upgrade the rest of your system.

Reviews.Title: Alley Glare and Warm at Night...
Reviews.Author: Murrwin
Reviews.Content: Now that I have sold everything I own to buy this TV, the only thing that I dislike is while watching it in the alley, sometimes the sun glare hinders the TV's picture quality. Otherwise its awesome, it keeps me warm at night while entertaining me. It's not in the manual but it repels water and weather elements very well. No regrets!!!!......i'm hungy......

Reviews.Title: Such a great deal...
Reviews.Author: Christo
Reviews.Content: Amazing 3D on this puppy. I was watching Bill Maher and actually able to punch his grill in, Worth every penny.

Reviews.Title: Could Be Improved
Reviews.Author: B. Hunt
Reviews.Content: For the price I thought there would be better shows on it. Nope. Same stuff, just bigger and clearer. Since the shows are no different, I would have preferred that it include a small monkey or a clown dog as an entertainment add-on.

Reviews.Title: A must have
Reviews.Author: Daniel F. Kent
Reviews.Content: After winning the lottery the first thing I went out and bought was this TV. It amazing, my whole family can hide behind it at the same time when our landlord knocks on the door looking for his rent. I hooked my old Atari up to it, but the picture was not good, and the reception from my rabbit ears leaves a lot to be desired. I'm hoping to get cable soon so hopefully the picture will improve with the HD updates. I was a bit of a job getting it into my condo on the 12th floor as it wouldn't fit in the elevators, so I have UPS carry it up the stairs. It was comical to watch, but quite a bit of damage was inflicted to the outer shell of the TV. I thought the shipping costs were a bit high. As most people will know, when you pay $39,999.00 for a TV, you would hope they shipped it free. Anyway, the UPS guy says he is not coming to my place anymore, something about a herniated disc? The upside is my wife said she is leaving me because I bought this TV, apparently she had other things we should have spent the winnings on first, like rent, electric, clothes and food for our kids, and gas for the car, but I say neigh Neigh. I think all would agree, when you win $42,000 on a scratch off, get the TV first.

Reviews.Title: NO kids...
Reviews.Author: mik boogie
Reviews.Content: The wife and I were thinking about having kids but after i saw this TV, I sold my testicles to the blackmarket to fund it. My wife may divorce me because we cant have any kids but hey this tv dosent complain as much as her.

Reviews.Title: Forget a wife! Get a never ending relationship with 4KPorn!
Reviews.Author: Sergio Ivan Castrejon
Reviews.Content: The porn on this thing is amazing!!!! it's almost like looking at a pornstar through a window in your living room. She almost came through the TV to finish the job! I swear! Scouts honor! I was considering getting married to my fiance but the TV was a way better decision. You won't believe how great the porn looks in 4K not only that, it's probably cheaper in the long run. 40k is what I was going to pay for the wedding but then of course you have the honeymoon and then a baby and all that other junk. This TV gives me exactly what I want. The only draw down is the expense I have to make on tissues and lube but straight jackin saveS you that mad cheddar.

Reviews.Title: So mad, I could spit
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Loudd
Reviews.Content: I saw someone mention this on Facebook and I couldn't believe my eyes. I read the details and thought "This is such a good deal! Free shipping?! A $5,002 discount?! AND a low price guarantee?!" Sign me up! I would be stupid not to jump on this.But I am so angry right now. After purchasing this with funds from my Swiss bank account, I'm dismayed that I have not received my item yet. It clearly states "enhanced delivery" on the website. It has been 36 minutes already and I see no UPS man delivering my 85 inch 4K Ultra HD television set to my office. There are only 2 more left in stock! If I miss out on this micro-dimming and voice control experience because of Amazon's sloth-like delivery methods and false advertising, there will be hell to pay.

Reviews.Title: MY OLD VHS TAPES HAVE NEVER LOOKED BETTER!
Reviews.Author: Capt. P.T. Wacky "is so lonely"
Reviews.Content: Took some tinkering to get the VCR to plug into the HDMI port, but once I got that settled, it's been great! The built-in sub makes my Atari 2600 sound amazing, too. Highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Such Definition. Much Resolution. Wow.
Reviews.Author: Drew E
Reviews.Content: At first I was hesitant to drop 400 Benjamin's on this baby. While the Samsung UN85S9 is an incredible piece of technology, the price is obviously a barrier for many people. After much sweat (and tears - it was an emotional process), I decided that hey, why not live a little? So I bought the TV. And I must say, all in all great purchase. Like most people reviewing, I had to part with a few of my organs to afford it, but the minute I turned it on and experienced the heavenly glow of 4K, I knew that a liver and a lung aren't really that important. I give it 4 stars only because it wasn't delivered by drone. I do have one warning though, even with its thin design, the TV is extremely heavy and can be very dangerous in an accident if not secured properly.For example, today I was watching TV with my four year-old sister, and she was hogging the remote. I asked for it back, but she insisted that we finish watching iCarly. Talented as the actors may be, I am not a huge fan of the show and attempted to pull the remote from her hands without success. Now, as any other logically thinking person would do in this situation, I started biting her hand, and she yelled "STOP IT!"I knew this could be a pivotal moment in her young life, so I quickly took action and pushed the TV over onto her dumb little face.And then my dad came in and was like "what the f***, Sparky?!"And it was then I remembered that I am a dog, so I pooped on the rug.

Reviews.Title: DON'T BUY DISCRIMINATES AGAINST HANDICAP PEOPLE!
Reviews.Author: B. Wampler
Reviews.Content: I had been really excited to order this for my father for Christmas, he has poor eyesight so i figured this massive tv would help him not squint. I had just loaded it into my virtual cart (it took me a very long time because the virtual cart wasn't big enough to fit this mammoth tv. I had to get a virtual sales assistant to help me load it) when i noticed that it requires a signature to be delivered!? I couldn't have it delivered to my father cause he has no hands ever since the sheet metal accident back when he worked for the union. So I had to drive all the way across the country just to sign for the stupid thing to be delivered to his door. After getting it set up for him I realized to my horror that every thing was controlled by touch or gesture. Once again how is a my handless father going to change the channel or volume? The remote allows for voice commands but you need to push a button in order to speak the voice commands into the remote. We decided we to just flip the tv with the screen facing the ceiling because he needed a harder mattress for his back. Other than that redeeming quality the TV is junk and discriminatory against handicap people. Do not buy from someone who doesn't care about those who are less fortunate than us.

Reviews.Title: An okay TV for the kids room, nothing more
Reviews.Author: Arun Nair
Reviews.Content: This TV reminded me of those lighted make up mirrors in hotel bathrooms. This flips exactly the same way.It flips horizontally to a very nice flat table that I can use to put freshly baked cookies for Christmas.I'm not very impressed with the picture quality from my VCR on this TV. I am thinking about putting this in the kids room and getting two more of these so they can make a playhouse.

Reviews.Title: No-brainer Purchase
Reviews.Author: Rick
Reviews.Content: It's $5,000 off right now, so this is the time to buy, guys.  No one can pass up those savings.

Reviews.Title: Pleas read this tv is awsome
Reviews.Author: C.Sua
Reviews.Content: I love this tv i bought it after selling my arm and leg, also some organs here and there, but over all was so worth it. Oh and the box it come in was so big i moved in it!

Reviews.Title: Best Tv ever!!!
Reviews.Author: Drew
Reviews.Content: I'm so upset w these reviews!!! First, it's affordable. It'll only take me 57yrs to pay it off: granted, I may not be viable at that time, but who cares!! The pic quality is amazing, refresh rate not so much. I would definitely recommend buying this amazing TV! Just take out a 2nd mortgage or use your kids college fund, it's way to expensive anyways! ;)

Reviews.Title: Great TV- but be careful....
Reviews.Author: ConcernedParent
Reviews.Content: Great TV. Word of warning though when watching porn; make sure no one else is home. I might have made my hetero son turn gay when he walked in on a scene with a close up of, lets say a “jaba the hut” sized female part. Scared the hell out of him and me too.

Reviews.Title: Totally worth it!
Reviews.Author: Kelly Sheedy "Kelly"
Reviews.Content: I bought this so my wife and I could watch Hee Haw and the Dukes of Hazard on Bluray. Let me tell you! Nothin' I've ever seen is better than watchin' Roy and the gang fiddlin' and steppin' on this beautiful screen. And when the General leaps a bridge in Hazard county, it seems like it's about to land in your lap.The only thing I don't like watchin' on this TV is diaper commercials and seeing a 4' baby ass settin' down on a wet spot.

Reviews.Title: In hindsight not a good idea
Reviews.Author: Packcity
Reviews.Content: Last year I sold cups of sperm so I could buy this TV.  I had quite the successful enterprise going on.  Women were getting babies they wanted and I was going to get my TV.  Well the TV is great but I'm likely going to have to sell it now that I'll be liable for child support to all those women I sold my sperm to.

Reviews.Title: Best television ever!
Reviews.Author: Alex Wiesemann
Reviews.Content: I had to give 4,000 hand jobs to pay for this thing but now, I have to have surgery on my arm to fix Ulnar Nerve issue I am having from an overactive arm but at least I have the awesome 4k HDTV!  Too bad I do not have cable, satellite or movies to watch because I have to pay for my surgery somehow.  Also, if anyone needs a roommate, I have an 85" television to offer!  This review took a long time to type with my nose but hopefully someone will take me in :( (i used my tongue)

Reviews.Title: awsome for porn
Reviews.Author: Gemma Vara
Reviews.Content: porn looks killer on this thing, i've watched a ton of porn in my time but never like this.  nips the size of trash trucks.

Reviews.Title: Fragrant Display!
Reviews.Author: dylan kates "hip hop hound"
Reviews.Content: There's nothing better than watching the BetaMax transfer of Kevin Bacon's masterpiece "The Air Up There" on this glorious display, you'll swear you can smell Charles Gitonga Maina in the room with you.

Reviews.Title: I couldn't pass up the free shipping! The quality of the TV was not what I expected for the cost.
Reviews.Author: Jason J. Yu
Reviews.Content: I couldn't pass up the free shipping! The quality of the TV was not what I expected for the cost. I think I should of waited for a 8k TV.

Reviews.Title: THIRSTY SAMSUNG TV BEAVER
Reviews.Author: terry j roberts
Reviews.Content: Besides developing my prehistoric 3rd eye back out of my head so i can watch this even MORE intently, I notice on channel 666 there is a THIRSTY BEAVER SALOON channel. Its near the RFD channel so i reckon its sponsored by them, but evidently its this little honky tonk bar in Charlotte NC that is an actual old time divey honky tonk...not a pre-processed "order your patina'd signs from a retro chic LA shop"..an actual C&W; old time bar..where men ride motorcycles into the place, women dance on bars, men do manly overdrinking, women dance on tables, men tell raunchy jokes, women pass out, men pass out, beavers are on walls, on shirts, on barstools in them tight-fittin' jeans....like if Merle or Waylon, in a coke'd up fever, dreamt of their own land of Oz and this materialized...one drawback is on this 3rd dimension of space/time TV, sometimes I see stuff in there a little TOO well

Reviews.Title: FINALLY!!!...
Reviews.Author: jc
Reviews.Content: ...never thought i say this but something bigger and better than liam neesons tv!  has arrived!!! This baby is on par or greater than liams tv in performance, size, stamina and durability.  Samsung really came hard with this tv.

Reviews.Title: So glorious, but too late.
Reviews.Author: Still Alive and Kicking
Reviews.Content: This TV is by FAR the best I have ever owned. If only it had been available back when Tim Russert was still around. "Meet the Press" in 85-inch luxury would have been the ultimate viewing experience.

Reviews.Title: OMG!!!
Reviews.Author: Alan B. Rosenfeld "Mr. Caffeine Freak"
Reviews.Content: I don't need a life anymore, this gift from the gods displays it for me vicariously...which is fine because all I have left after this purchase is a couch and enough money to pay my electric bills for a year....

Reviews.Title: They LIED!!!!
Reviews.Author: Mark Horton
Reviews.Content: 4 stars because they lied about the actual TV itself. I was grabbing some popcorn about to watch the Heat game, tripped and fell into the TV. So what do I get for 35K? A mouth full of sand, pyramids, and black people chasing me with weird symbols stuck on their forehead. TV is a mother!@#$%in STARGATE! Made the best of it though, now I am worshipped as a god: "King Lo'ren LeBron Kobe Horton" (my bad...) AND got to bring back one of the baddest alien females with 3 titties. Changed my mind, 5 stars for Samsung!!

Reviews.Title: everything is coming together like butt-cheaks!
Reviews.Author: Nick
Reviews.Content: At 40k for a 4k tv that is 1 inch larger than Sonys version yet half the Hz true motion and half the price of sonys 240hz. This is a damn good deal! I mean just imagine the 12k you are going to spend in wrapping paper, and not to mention the stadium seating you that you can now install into your 300sf basement "man cave"!  The real question is getting it under the tree? Or do you just save on the cost of wrapping paper and throw a giant bow on the top of the box?the real catch is the easel for those who are opting out of mounting their prize TV, I mean... we only put art on an easel, right?? And apparently this baby is equipped with voice prompts so all those years complaining about losing your remote is in the past as well!Despite having to sell your kids, your non-vital organs, taking out second mortgages or having your wife stand on the sidewalk for a month to afford Samsungs mega-TV; one thing you can be sure of is, buying this seemingly priceless object could potentially be the best decision you have ever made!

Reviews.Title: Only 3 left hurry up!
Reviews.Author: games
Reviews.Content: You guys better hurry up they only got 3 more in stock!! Wow what a TV. I added it to my wish list.

Reviews.Title: Thanks taxpayers, now I can watch TV all day!
Reviews.Author: Pam
Reviews.Content: I was able to sellI my government welfare checks, food stamps, cell phone, cash, and healthcare back to the government and got this TV as an even exchange! Thanks Obama, democrats got my vote next time too. :)

Reviews.Author: Oliver klozoff
Reviews.Content: This product is wonderful. It was saving myself for marriage but because it isn't legal in Philadelphia I sold my virginity and used the money to buy this tv. It was bigger than I expected but it somehow fit just right. I had no problem getting it in and it really changed my perspective on a lot of things in my life. I am grateful for every inch.

Reviews.Title: Wow! What a deal!
Reviews.Author: M. Varney "Tc"
Reviews.Content: So I got this tv and man I have to say I feel so happy. Think about this for a second, it's like plugging a piece of Sheetrock in, well a little smaller than 8ft but it glows. 40k well spent.

Reviews.Title: Uh...the shipping better be freaking free.
Reviews.Author: Alexx Montes
Reviews.Content: I'm just gonna go ahead and wish list this and hope someone randomly buys it for me.Where are you Bill Gates??

Reviews.Title: Love it, but...
Reviews.Author: Kevin F.
Reviews.Content: while I enjoy this television I was shocked to discover that it required 2 AA batteries.  Having spent unGodly amounts of money on silly, unnecessary luxury items in the past, it offends me, personally, that should have to ask my personal assistant to find such a mundane item.  He works hard, and his having to spend his arguably valuable time finding batteries, when he could be tanning, shopping, buying "contraband," or otherwise supporting his employers' household is unacceptable.  I have fired him.  May God have mercy on his soul.

Reviews.Title: more realistic then reality
Reviews.Author: Sir Spendsalot
Reviews.Content: I must admit that I had a few reservations initially. Pay for college or buy the only thing that I'll ever need to buy again in my entire life...ever. After a period of much deliberation and soul-searching a realization hit me that rocked my would and blew my mind all over the room...free shipping. It took me only a few days to sell every worldly possession that my entire family and I hold dear but the worthwhileatude factor was completely worth while. Here I am sitting on the curb outside what used to be home, watching the last thing that I'll ever need to watch. Buy it now! Free shipping!

Reviews.Title: All my prostitution efforts paid off!
Reviews.Author: B. Beasley "True Reviewer"
Reviews.Content: I was selling my goodies on the 'black market' for years in order purchase this. I was "give'n it up" for $2 here, $3-4-5$ there. You'd be surprised how many people I had sex with in one night at an average rate of  $1 per blow job, $3 per handjob and then $5 for the good stuff. Either way I saved up and this picture is awesome. I can even see the HIV virus swimming happily in some of the cum of the male porno actors.

Reviews.Title: I Should Have Waited
Reviews.Author: Ophelia Keith
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV the minute it came out, thrilled to finally have a viewing screen worthy of The Rich Kids of Beverly Hills. Much to my dismay I logged on today to discover that the price has dropped $5,0000.00 in anticipation of the release of the 86 inch later this year. I will be listing this TV on Ebay for $100.00 plus $39,897.00 overnight shipping and handling if anyone's interested. Standard ground shipping is free. Batteries for the remote are not included.

Reviews.Title: Great for the deaf...
Reviews.Author: D. West
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my friend because he's deaf in one ear and I figured the 85" would help him hear better. Who knew such a large screen would work wonders on his hearing. This TV made me decide that when I go blind, I'm going to buy a $300,000 surround sound system!

Reviews.Title: Doubles as a great hammock for my deck
Reviews.Author: Glen Ames
Reviews.Content: This is the best TV yet!  I can put it outside on my deck, rotate the screen up and use it as a hammock.When viewing certain programs, I am even able to pretend that I am laying on the beach or in a gorilla nest.Thankfully I can afford this or I would have to get a more comfortable hammock.

Reviews.Title: Good TV, not such a great deal
Reviews.Author: Benjamin Woodruff
Reviews.Content: I thought this tv was an amazing bargain until I found out that the Smart Evolution Kit is sold separately. Buyer beware, if you want to buy this tv for the Smart Evolution feature you have to buy the kit. I guess you get what you pay for. Other than that the tv works great.

Reviews.Title: Comes with Black and White option!!
Reviews.Author: Steven Morris "MINDCRIME518"
Reviews.Content: Just found out that there is an option to switch to black and white in HD...Made my mind up easily!!

Reviews.Title: All Life Desires for a bargain price
Reviews.Author: Catskill "Booker"
Reviews.Content: I was going to have open heart surgery but then I seen this advert. What a bargain, how could I pass this up! Why suffer with all the pain, inconvenience and trials of recovery when you can have the quality of life and joy that this TV would bring. May die young but happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: best tv ever,
Reviews.Author: sadhbh
Reviews.Content: Although I had to sell my house , car, husband and three kids for it. Its totally worth it. I now live in the free box it arrived in but on the street its hard to find somewhere to plug it in so I can catch up on my fb, twitter and see what the celebs are up to.  Would completely recommend this bad boy to anyone who wants to change their life. It totally changed mine.

Reviews.Title: Accessories are Needed with this TV
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: In order to fully enjoy the experience of the Samsung UN85S9 85-inch 4K Ultra HD 120Hz 3D Smart LED TV, one must have true couch potato food to enjoy along with the Smart aspect of the television which doesn't always work.I highly recommend the Fresh Whole Rabbit and to wash it down properly, nothing else will do but the Tuscan Whole Milk, 1 Gallon, 128 fl oz.A word of warning, though: do not use the Uranium Ore ($39.95) anywhere near this set. The electronics don't seem to interact well with uranium which I needed for my new homemade nuclear reactor that I so desperately needed after purchasing the Samsung UN85S9 85-inch 4K Ultra HD 120Hz 3D Smart LED TV.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Eco Sensor = Money Saver
Reviews.Author: Wowgamer93
Reviews.Content: The Samsung Eco Sensor is what did it for me. Knowing that I can have more intelligent energy management was just icing on the 40,000 dollar cake. Power bills can be so expensive and it's good to know that this Samsung product is practical enough to keep my energy bill down so I don't break the bank.The only issue was getting Amazon to ship something to Mars. But luckily Amazon was able to get in touch with NASA and I received my delivery on time and within budget.

Reviews.Title: I'm so Happy Today
Reviews.Author: DJB "A Creature in Time"
Reviews.Content: I'm so happy today. Earlier, Nancy Reagan's former psychic wouldn't accept my request for a new appointment because when we Skyped on my 50 inch Panasonic, I could not see her crystal ball clearly, which is very important when looking into the future from the past. But after my my 85-inch 4k Ultra HD was delivered, she accepted my appointment request. The the crystal ball was, well, crystal clear on my 85-inch 4k Ultra HD TV. I am so happy. My future is bright, the sun will come up tomorrow.

Reviews.Title: PS5 and Xbox Two games look great on it.
Reviews.Author: H. J. Kim "junkimchi"
Reviews.Content: Great TV. Currently the center of my entertainment system. PS5 and Xbox Two games look great on it.Minus one star for the 3 dead pixels though. Looking into the RMA process, will keep everyone updated.

Reviews.Title: Great First TV
Reviews.Author: Richard Phillips
Reviews.Content: Sadly, my mother passed away and I wasn't sure how I was going to be able to watch TV. I would always go to her place and watch her TV. However, she must have come back from the dead! She was able to buy this new TV 4 days AFTER her death, I couldn't believe it!!! She even opened a new credit card to pay for it, now I can't watch TV again!!!

Reviews.Title: Great house for a family of three, but watch out for giant robots.
Reviews.Author: Clampants "clampants"
Reviews.Content: Because we couldn't fit it in the front door, this TV was stolen from our front lawn by a giant robot.  Our family now lives inside the hassle-free packaging.

Reviews.Title: Amazing. Picture is great!
Reviews.Author: JennC
Reviews.Content: Amazing product! Turtle man catches the BIGGEST TURTLES. They never looked that big before....yeyeyeye LIVE ACTION! His side kick is a little scary to look at.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Deathcop
Reviews.Content: Was going to buy one but saw it on store display and it kept changing channels every time I farted. With my innards I'll be flipping channels every few minutes!

Reviews.Title: Good investment
Reviews.Author: B. Peckham "Astralan"
Reviews.Content: Texas uses these as a way to inform motorists of traffic conditions. They have them posted every 10 miles apart along the entire 879 miles run. They have very high definition and can be seen at least a mile away. I had to take points off because drivers were too busy looking at the devices instead of road conditions. It's a good thing Gov. Rick Perry donated them for the project or I'd be pissed.

Reviews.Title: Subliminal Samsung
Reviews.Author: Joe Cantrell
Reviews.Content: We was thrilled whin the insurnce payd us off for that elm tree fallin on are doubl-wyde, and we thot it warn't nearly "totaled," caws most of it was stiyull thayre.  So we used that chayuk fir a down paymint on this hyer TV.  Boy howdy, doez it do the job.  We cawlked it in wher that wall was be4 the storm and its mighty fine.  Whin it storms now, we watch 700 Clubb reruns and praysus jesus to tarnation, and that mostly gits us throughe it for the most parts.

Reviews.Title: Samsung 4k
Reviews.Author: James R. Avery
Reviews.Content: I bought two (2), one each for "his & hers" bathrooms. Placed one over her sauna & the other in my shower.The first problem is the screen will fog-over. The second problem is that hand signals don't work correctly in the shower. And thirdly, the channel changes whenever the toilet is flushed.Otherwise, the picture and sound are great!I plan to buy a third one to install on the bottom of the kid's swimming pool. That ought to keep the little rug rats happy while watching SpongeBob!

Reviews.Title: No tv and no beer make homer go something something
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: I wanted to get the tv but i felt they should charge more than the free super saver shipping. i want to pay an outlandash rate all around for the purchase. Oh well woe is me right?!

Reviews.Title: Wow!
Reviews.Author: jared
Reviews.Content: Somebody down the block bought this and I watch it via Google Earth. The only draw back is that my laptop is only 17" and 720p. The description says 85" and 4k. Fix this and I'll rate it 5 stars.

Reviews.Title: Will it play PS2 games? Sort of
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer "Sunstealer"
Reviews.Content: Look, this is a nice TV with a good picture and everything, but I just recently purchased a refurbished PS2 (who can afford those outrageous new systems?) and I was wondering if it would play the games correctly.The final verdict is. . . pretty good.When I popped in Backyard Wrestling 2: The Family Reunion edition I was barely into the brawl between Mama Pinchy and her estranged half-brother/baby daddy, JD when I noticed some real screen tearing going on.  I could barely make out the tattoo over Mama Pinchy's navel even though the characters were just as big as actualy human beings.I got a nice surprise when I tried my next (and only other) game, Bad Boys: Miami Takedown.  I never knew there were 3-D effects and a director's commentary by Michael Bay!  It certainly made the game more interesting even though it appeared like the characters weren't responding to my button presses (maybe a problem with the VGA cables?!?).  There were also many more giant robots than I remember being in Miami.  Perhaps these were the eponymous 'Bad Boys'?When it comes to watching regular TV, this is the perfect format for your Duck Dynasty and Real Housewives marathons.  The actors are so crisp that you can see the hairs growing out of their nostrils or them becoming more bleary eyed and inebriated in real time.According to advertising this is a 'Smart' TV, but I found it wouldn't let me watch Jersey Shore reruns at all.  WTF?  It just kept flashing a message 'A Bridge Too Far. . . AI Shutting Down. . .' then a bunch of 1s and 0s until I turned it to that crappy PBS station.So is the TV nice?  Yes, it plays PS2 games about as well as they can be played I suppose, though I still think the picture quality could be improved and I have yet to find a place to plug the HDMI cable into my PS2.  So, a good choice for the money, but just be warned that Walmart is not stocking this particular model.  Not even Target is!  WTF?

Reviews.Title: It was worth it
Reviews.Author: Hangry Emma
Reviews.Content: I like the teevee, but the price was a bit of a hardship. I had to lay off one of the crew members of my yacht for the winter, and sell my pet rats for food.

Reviews.Title: At first, I bought an XBOX ONE.....
Reviews.Author: John D. Quitoriano "GambitVII"
Reviews.Content: At first, I bought an xbox one because I thought it was the future of TV. Then this monstrosity showed up in the recommendations list and I HAD to get it to maximizes my TV experience.And low and behold, the almighty came through the front door and now I am left in awe. With blistering 4K resolution at a size that even Mount Everest would be jealous of, your brain will start to wonder why people didn't invent graphics cards for your eye balls just so it could keep up with technology.Perhaps the most fascinating thing about it is how it seamlessly pulls you into the reality of all your entertainment mediums whether it's movies or video games. Try reading your favorite book in digital format and even the text will start to tell the story in a way that not even nostalgia can bring to life. Watching national geographic on this TV makes you feel like you might as well google image your next vacation spot instead of dealing with the hassles of traveling there . With 82 inches of absolute immersion, it makes you wonder why you should continue with the daily duties life when you can just play second life with this and live the dream that you have always wanted this technological titan.With so many pixels in the screen, it makes you wonder whether Samsung was in a competition with the galaxy on how many dots it could fit in a single viewable plane. This product is indeed a monument of all humanities historical accomplishments. If Leonardo da Vinci were here, he would give up on science and take up Photoshop just so he can remaster his masterpieces in true 4K HD. So why wait? Make a masterpiece of your living room and buy this RIGHT NOW!

Reviews.Title: Best money ever spent
Reviews.Author: Danny B
Reviews.Content: Well I sold my truck, my car my motorcycle my dog and cats and let me tell you it was well worth it.. Unfortunately it's bigger than the cardboard box I now live in S.F.s tenderloin district but I ran an extension cable from the shelter and all the hot toothless crackhead women are bunking down with me tonight and my 85" too bad I don't have cable and only have old pornos to watch on the DVD player.. But that's ok it gets those girls ready to go!!!

Reviews.Title: seriously...
Reviews.Author: fishman
Reviews.Content: I'd buy one of these puppies but my kids would still find a way to stand right in front of the bloody thing if I even got a shot at watch five minutes of a show without 'when's it my turn, can I watch my shows, dad I feel sick, etc' can it be installed on the roof?

Reviews.Title: Just bought it!
Reviews.Author: Sam
Reviews.Content: Wow I bought this over a new BMW 328i and its worth it! I recommend this to anyone that can afford it. Sike, just wait a year or so.

Reviews.Title: like a production set in your bedroom
Reviews.Author: Nathan Dayton "Nathan"
Reviews.Content: I'm a film maker who use to spend thousands on set designs, location filming, and green screen technology; after my purchase I simply have my actors stand in front of the TV, it looks so real! Worth the price, it pays dividends. I understand more directors are going this route.

Reviews.Title: Technology is amazing
Reviews.Author: P. Peel "Peel II"
Reviews.Content: Hard to believe but this thing only needs two AA batteries to operate. It says so in the technical details....

Reviews.Title: Nothing fills better that stupid empty life of yours than a badass 85 inch 4K tv
Reviews.Author: Mateus P. Velloso "MatV"
Reviews.Content: I have to say I am very pleased. Now every time I feel like my life is empty and without any sort of meaning I just go watch American Funniest Home Movies on this 85 inch TV at my 6 bedroom house in Paris. I mean, money won't buy you happiness, for sure, but it will definitely help you suffer in Paris while watching a TV that that screams "You're da boss!" all the way. Now I need to buy a Hummer.

Reviews.Title: Change the Screen Savers!
Reviews.Author: Zombie Hunter
Reviews.Content: I've bought and replaced three of these.  The picture is good...but I think they need to rethink the screen savers that come installed:First one I had went into screen saver mode with an Ultra HD image of my old "pitch and catch" from when I played Little League.  My game only lasted one pitch.  Man it was fun to relive those memories of my youth...but not fun picking up the shards of glass for hours.On the second one I chose a beautiful, blank canvas.  You could actually see the stitching...THANK YOU ULTRA HD!  I had to bring my nude model in and get to work.  I was so inspired the paint just jumped onto the canvas....until my neighbor saw it from all the way across the street, called the cops, and had me arrested for kidnapping and harassing a homeless person.  I thought it was clear the sandwich he was eating was payment - guess not.  Noted.Then the third...I guess you could say was my fault, being a gun guy.  And I get that zombies are all the rage now, but that doesn't mean I'd want them as a screen saver on my UN85S9.  If millions of undead pixels are coming at me, I'm blasting every little one.I'll let you know how my 4th goes....

Reviews.Title: This TV + Hutzler 571 = unlimited possibilities!!!  Better than dividing by Zero!  More fun than a Large Hadron Collider!
Reviews.Author: g
Reviews.Content: We went all out and got a combo package with this TV and the Hutlzer 571 Banana Slicer, BEST DECISION EVER!!!!  Now we no longer argue whose banana slices are bigger and who cut the best slices.  The Hutzler 571 Banana Slicer has made our lives so much easier now!

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Simon P
Reviews.Content: This TV is so amazing that I replaced the windscreen in my car with it. I now have a cinema for 5 people parked in the garage. An added bonus is that I am now fitter than ever from cycling to work and back.

Reviews.Title: 4K!
Reviews.Author: Emmanuel M.
Reviews.Content: I am absolutely loving this television, it's a terrific improvement from my old 75 inch I bought last year.And with almost quadruple the resolution, it amazing.I mean, nothing I own has 4k support yet, but I'm glad to have those extra pixels , the picture looks so much better nonetheless.I think.

Reviews.Title: Best Child's Toy Ever
Reviews.Author: NoBodySpecial "Fishing"
Reviews.Content: We have very delight ever since this arrived. We purchased it because our daughter said she just had to have it.We unwrapped everything and placed the unit in her room. Well, I can tell you, she is simply delighted with it.From the time she wakes up until she goes to bed, she spends every waking hour drawing on this giant blackboard.I will say, she has had some difficulty using her Dry Erase Markers, but she's only four and can only reach half way up so far.The board tilts and moves, although we did had one causality. At 198 pounds, the board did fall over one day and Muffy has left for better places, but cats are easy to replace.Overall, I would recommend this to anyone who has a child that loves to draw!

Reviews.Title: Who said Tornadoes are God's way of saying never live in a Trailer Park?!
Reviews.Author: CTCoffeeLuver
Reviews.Content: Only 3 left in stock!  Thankfully I came upon this deal when I did, as I needed all 3 of them in order to build my iMax theater in the screening room I just added onto my Quonset Hut here in the Trailer Park.You would not believe the hassles I had to endure dealing with the Trailer Park and Town Planning Commission in order to build the extension, but when I promised to set aside every Thursday night for special showings of Captan EO (BYO3DG) alternating with The Wizard of Oz ( Just three words - Dorothy's Ruby Slippers!) they practically begged me to take the building permit and help expedite the construction!The only complaint I have heard so far is on nights were we might be having heavy rains, sleet or hail.  As we all know, no matter how GOOD the PICTURE on any of these HD units (4K Ultra or not), the sound is always lagging behind (I liken it to a transistor radio in a Bentley).  The din of the rain, sleet or hail pounding on the tin of the Quonset Hut means we have to turn on the Closed Captions to insure everyone is able to keep up with the story-lines.  Again, another testament to the quality of these Samsung units is the clarity and ease of reading those captions - second to none!I would highly recommend anyone looking to up the resale value of their property to invest in one or more of these units...right now our trailer park has a "wait" list a mile long and growing by the minute.  I am hopeful that in time, I will be able to move into a first rate  double-wide with a Jacuzzi - but for now the toothless smiles of all the folks as they leave the theater and make their way back to their trailers is reward enough!Thank you Amazon for making life here in the Trailer Park just that much sweeter!

Reviews.Title: I gotta stop drinking
Reviews.Author: NWlistingagent
Reviews.Content: So I'm in a bar with some friends and, well, you know how it goes.  Someone talks about his boyfriends' new job, someone else is wearing really cute shoes and of course I had to outdo them with this giant TV.  I live in a small apartment.  My roommate, I and my boyfriend now all live on our balcony as the TV takes up what used to be the living room/kitchen.  The bedrooms are now storage rooms for the furniture we used to use, but that's ok cause we can't open those doors anymore.  And though we can only eat take out now, since the box this thing came in is permanently wedged in the kitchen, things are looking up.  Since we lost the cat a couple weeks ago, we have more time to see the tv through the sliders from our sleeping bags on the balcony so other than the frostbite it's like we're on a vacay every day!

Reviews.Title: Best way to blow dat 401K
Reviews.Author: Chris Baldassano
Reviews.Content: I purchased this because I wanted to sit at my parents house.. 11 towns away, and still be able to see crystal clear football games, thru their livingroom window.  It has only cost me my house, car, kids college fund, and 401K, but hey You only live once, and 85 > 1 in my book..What they don't tell you, is Samsung sends hot models to stand next to it so when people come over your house they gawk even more..As far as the Smart Apps, nothing screams $$$ then opening up Facebook on it and seeing someone you dated 20 years ago, who is now HUGE, Fill a 4K Screen.. You can literally feel the cellulite.

Reviews.Title: Great Job
Reviews.Author: Yosuke Hiradate
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV for my pet giant I have in my backyard. He started to take the house apart since his 32" tv was way too small. Now he can use this 85" as a pretend iPhone. Thank you Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Could Not Resist!
Reviews.Author: David Suchanek
Reviews.Content: The Samsung 85-Inch 4K Ultra HD 120Hz 3D Smart LED TV has no equal.  We bought four - one for each the children and one for the kitchen.  The kids have never been happier - we were moving their furniture around but then realized the ceiling was the best spot to mount them.  Instead of reading to them now we just watch a few movies with them in bed. Two of our children are left handed and thankfully, Samsung developed the left-handed remote for their Ultra Smart. No more arguing at the dinner table as a result.  Our lives couldn't be happier.  There is a rumour that Samsung will be selling the Samsung 120-Inch 10K Uber HD 600 MHz 5D Smart LED TV in January - lots of room in the family room and basement for this baby.  Love you Samsung!

Reviews.Title: wow such tv
Reviews.Author: Owen Williams
Reviews.Content: wow  such size  many pixels  wow tv  very dollars wow  such quality  many dollurs  no doge  much shibe in 4k

Reviews.Title: I may need to move ...
Reviews.Author: rqw
Reviews.Content: I don't have enough apartment ... or courtyard ... or Mississippi ... for this honkin' big TV.  But, I want to watch Doctor Who on this.  Soon.Hmmm ... Speaking of "Who" ... I wonder if THE Who still have those speakers and if they'd loan them out.

Reviews.Title: 1st class problems.
Reviews.Author: ukryoshin
Reviews.Content: Best home makeover idea ever! My roof collapsed and I was shopping around to get it fixed and then I saw this Ultra HD 4k 120hz 3D Smart TV. I thought to myself if I mount this where my roof had collapsed and buy Samsung bluray player and project day and night images...now its like I have a glass ceiling!!! I can see to the heavens above!!! *MIND BLOWN* To think I was going to fix my roof and all I get is a white ceiling.Anyways, best idea ever and money well spend. I am getting a special snow edition bluray disk being shipped to me right now. Will update you guys on quality. I can have winter whenever I want now!

Reviews.Title: Black Friday Special
Reviews.Author: Mora
Reviews.Content: I couldn't believe it when I came across this fantastic black Friday deal; I mean look at those savings! So, I decided to rent out my womb in order to finance the TV. I have to say that overall it was a great decision.Cons: I wish the price could have been a little higher. They always say you get what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: A 4K review!!!
Reviews.Author: Henry Lee
Reviews.Content: Forget all the fake reviews out there. This one is real real real!  The other reviews are like Betamax while mine is 4k.How can you believe my review? because I use Pros/Cons like only real ones do.  I am also an average wage earner whotakes the subway to work, w/ my iPod...no Dr Dre Beats though cuz I cant afford them.  Here goes...Pros-A Bargain. I dont know what the number of pixels on this thing but for PPI (Price Per pIxel) it must be better than your junky iphone-Stunning picture.  Great for videos.-Battery life has been great, watching it 8 hours a day for 3 weeks and have not had to recharge.-Sound is fantastic, again better than your junky iphone-Superior build quality...makes your iphone look junkyCons-Wifi appears not to be working-No 4G LTE..would have expected more from you Samsung.-A little large to fit in bag, no case.  I hope amazon begins to carry accessories for this thing-Call quality has been sub-par...actually not working. Your junky iphone wins here-Samsung has really innovated here. The screen is surely larger than any other Apple product they copied.-No expandable memory, cant figure out how to root, no removable battery...a tie with your iphone.-Worried Apple will sue and I have to return it because I dont want to own illegal things and worried Edward Snowde n will tell the world I am using an illegal product.
