Reviews.Content: What they don,t advertise in the specs is that this is really a time portal machine.  I climbed right in and came out the other side  in another millennium.Ps I went back in time to last years Super Bowl made a great bet and won the money to pay for the TV.

Reviews.Title: Done
Reviews.Author: Adam
Reviews.Content: "You can save $5,002.00 by purchasing with Prime"*Buys now with one click*You gotta spend money to make money.

Reviews.Title: I brought it but sadly had to send it back!
Reviews.Author: Take Notes Entertainment Inc.
Reviews.Content: Wow what a excellent buy I had there, o boy I brought it home paid the guys on the block a quarter each to bring it to the 10th floor of my NYC project apartment. The elevator was not working plus it smells like urine. Who wants there 40k TV in a urine smelling elevator. So I had them carry it up the stairs, (hey people piss in the staircase also go figure) well anyway I get this beauty in my house and take it out the box mount it on top of my old floor model black and white TV we had since i was 4 years old. When I noticed this damn thing was packed in styrofoam (o hell nah!) Im not throwing styrofoam in the garbage that stuff can't be recycled. So i kindly repacked the beautiful thing and sent it back. Styrofoam they should be ashamed of themselves. O by the way whomever Micheal Bloomberg is check your credit card statement to see if u got that money refunded. I would not want u to be robbed. Damn they really packed it in styrofoam that sucks!!

Reviews.Title: BEST VIEWED WITH 4K 3D PORN!
Reviews.Author: Eugene W.
Reviews.Content: This TV is AMAZING!!!!  The titanic size screen fits the bill.  Watching 4K 3D porn on this bad boy is the greatest thing in humanity since sliced bread...

Reviews.Title: Helps with weight loss
Reviews.Author: Daneen Rogers "Daneen2Fabulous"
Reviews.Content: I don't know why everybody is complaining about the price, simply sell a kidney to pay for it, like I did.  Right now I'm enjoying the amazing picture clarity from the comfort of my Duxiana (which I purchased by selling a lung, but that's a story for another time) as I recover from surgery.  I've never realized just how handsome that Drew Carey really is!  Regular HD does him no justice.  Anyway, I have to cut my review short as Peapod will be here soon with my groceries.  I recently purchased a Vitamix 7500 to help me lose weight (by selling bone marrow, but, hello, ouch!).  But then I realized--if I keep parting myself out in order to buy ridiculously overpriced, materialistic items, I will reach my weight loss goal in no time!

Reviews.Title: The Tears of 3rd World Countries...IN HD!
Reviews.Author: Kevelev
Reviews.Content: I was going to do some missionary work down in Central America or Africa & help feed children, but why bother when it all looks just as REAL on this magnificent piece of technology.  No point in travel either when it all looks just as good from the comfort of your own home.Also, thank goodness for Amazon Prime FREE shipping because I wouldn't have had enough to pay for it.  That 2nd mortgage gave me just enough to buy this baby.  Thanks Samsung!  Outstanding deal!

Reviews.Title: Great Picture, but read the details.
Reviews.Author: Katherine Rinkes
Reviews.Content: I just got one of these, and it is AMAZING.  I would have gotten one of these a long time ago, but it took forever for my homeowners association to approve bringing something this big into the neighborhood.Read the fine print though, I was disappointed to find that there were no connections compatible with my BetaMax, and now I might have to move to VHS, :(

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: The man
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV after my wife told me to chose between her or the tv. I made a great choice, the TV cooks for me helps me raise my kids, walks the dog and takes out trash. Porn is beautiful after a long day.......help me I'm soo lonely. I can also travel through dimensions.

Reviews.Title: Not big enough
Reviews.Author: Matthew Panaia
Reviews.Content: I wanted to get a 90 inch but this will be good enough for now until they create a 90 inch version

Reviews.Title: Men beware
Reviews.Author: A. Smith
Reviews.Content: This is a great picture.  After watching all 236 porn DVDs I own on it I find two issues:  1.  The remote is not water, lube, or sperm proof.  2.  I feel I might need male enhancement products after seeing just how large real men actually are.  But I really don't care for women with such large anatomy either, so it's kind of a dilemma for me.

Reviews.Title: It was sooooo big, I climbed inside it and went to Wonka land
Reviews.Author: MARK A WALDRON
Reviews.Content: It was sooooo big, I climbed inside it and went to Wonka land for a choco bar and a shot on one of the flying elevators

Reviews.Title: Three dead pixels not covered under the $18k extended warranty
Reviews.Author: D. Bott
Reviews.Content: Good news, bad news. The screen size enables me to see even the vanishingly small hope that UVA might beat Virginia Tech and possess the Commonwealth Cup. However the super HD resolution meant that the 5 year warranty expired before I was able to document the three dead pixels in the top left quadrant. It was the twinkle in Sandra Bullock's eye -- dimmed by more than 0.00014 lumens during Miss Congeniality that i had the proof required by customer service. Quality control cost this unit one star, and the level of customer service cost this unit another two. Are these extended warranties ever worthwhile? I cannot wait for the advance on my autobiography so I can replace this defective unit with a solid built-in-the-USA RCA (so much easier to notice when a vacuum tube dies than a pixel, and the HD down converter is an absolute bargain at $49.95).Tech Experience: high from 1979-1984

Reviews.Title: What a TV!
Reviews.Author: Uziel2000
Reviews.Content: I just realized I spent 40K on a 4K TV.  That means I speant 10K per K of resolution.  And to think, the nuns at St. Louis Catholic School told me I'd never amount to anything.  Take THAT Sister Ethel!

Reviews.Title: Paraplegic, sold my chair...worth it!
Reviews.Author: PJB "Artist"
Reviews.Content: I sold my wheelchair and took out of my 401k for this beauty. Now, since I am paralyzed, I can enjoy this television and never need to leave the couch (since I really can't) but sooo worth it!I might be paralyzed, I might be out my chair and $35,000 more BUT I can watch television and pretend I'm in the real world!

Reviews.Title: Very nearly almost bought one of these, but...
Reviews.Author: Mr Goose
Reviews.Content: Saved up all my money and very nearly almost bought one of these, mostly to keep the wife happy. But after in depth consideration, I decided instead to ditch the missus and blow the cash on high-class hookers and top-quality skunk - having first moved home to a jurisdiction where such pleasures are legal and the wife's lawyers could not find me, of course.I figured this would probably cause me less brain damage than spending the next few years getting earache from the 'trouble and strife' about how much we just spent, and having my eyes permanently glued to a giant talking gogglebox.

Reviews.Title: I'm feeling the Chrismas spirit
Reviews.Author: carlcat "carlcat"
Reviews.Content: I'm very happy with this television. Unlike others who took advantage of the free shipping combined with the discount, I received this as my Secret Santa gift as an employee shipper/loader at UPS. Needless to say I was very surprised to receive such an elaborate gift especially since  the limit was ten dollars. I must confess, I did break the rules and found out who my secret santa was. I just needed to thank him personally since it seems he might have gone over the ten dollar limit. Well, "Vinney" as he likes to be called, told me "forgetabout it", he got it very cheap, so cheap he picked one up for himself. Not being one to look a gift horse in the mouth, I humbly accepted his gift and thanked him profusely. There really are very nice people in the world.  One caution though, if you're planning on purchasing this puppy, it does put out a lot of heat. Even though it's December, I have the ceiling fan on and  the windows open.......a small price to pay for such a lovely gift. Merry Christmas to yall and to all a good night.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for road trips!
Reviews.Author: Brian P Dunne Jr
Reviews.Content: I bought one of these for the backseat of the Suburban, the kids love it! I had to give it 4 stars through, the remote just didn't feel right in my hand.

Reviews.Title: Pampered Servants
Reviews.Author: Brad "Brad"
Reviews.Content: My servants especially love the motion detection features.  Now they can serve me a fresh glass of Tuscan Whole Milk with one hand while motioning at the television with the other.  No more remote control blisters for the help! This has been a problem in the past, as I do enjoy channel surfing.  The only drawback that I have seen with this wonderful television is that I fear my servants may become spoiled eventually.

Reviews.Title: Makes a great GPS screen!
Reviews.Author: Kim Michael Coyne
Reviews.Content: Bought this bad boy to use as a GPS in my new Kenworth GT Convertible. I was going to buy a cheap Vizio 85" on ebay for like 800 bucks, but the dude wanted like 15 bucks for shipping, so I went with this one on Amazon. Who can pass up free shipping AND 1.5% back on my Amazon Prime credit card with only 37% interest? Not this guy!Any way, after a few modifications to the dashboard, like removing, well, the dashboard, and a few unsuccessful calls to Crutchfield customer support, (they're not very friendly over there) I was able to wrestle it into place. The map details are amazing, and with Samsung's brilliant 3D technology, the buildings are actually life- size! I mean this thing is so big, you can actually get where you're going before you get there!I use it as a screen for my built in DVD player when I'm in park (safety first). I played a DVD of my friend's Molly Hatchet cover band. The detail was so good, it turns out he's actually in Molly Hatchet. Who knew?So in closing, don't settle for for a cheap TV or a cheap GPS for that matter. Why have to listen to that annoying voice telling you 4 times to turn left on main street. In my Kenworth, that voice is actually sitting in my passenger seat! And she looks really similar to my mother in law....BUY IT!

Reviews.Title: Praise God for this TV!!!
Reviews.Author: troy lightfoot
Reviews.Content: This TV is incredible. It's has by far the best picture on the market.Currently my wife and I use it to watch documentaries on starving children around the world. We love it! It reminds us of how many people are truly in need and how blessed by God we really are! God is indeed great and we praise him every day for this TV. Thank God we were born RICH! USA > poor countries!

Reviews.Title: nice gift
Reviews.Author: Teddy Cruz
Reviews.Content: Because of some recent hard work, my employer, the Koch brothers, provided me with a few of these to scatter throughout the house.  I am so thankful for this technology and for my employer!!!Senator C

Reviews.Title: it's alright
Reviews.Author: rodney diaz
Reviews.Content: i like the idea of the tv, but actually having it in my room, it quickly becomes an eye sore, my first day i loved it, but i think this is going in my guest room, thanks a lot though Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Identified fliying object catcher
Reviews.Author: Aurora
Reviews.Content: After a 5 second discussion with my husband we decided to buy this amazing TV to decorate our rather empty and boring wall designed by a top Japanese interior designer.I figured out when husband comes home late and drunk and passed out there's no one throw things at and I could make use of the TV. With the 3D technology I could see the plates and other furniture crashing in so much astonishing view I've never seen before even when it's not on.My husband freakin loves it because he doesn't have to catch all the things I throw at him anymore as I enjoy throwing them at that beauty of 85". With it's super duper quality material made of gold, diamond and stainless steel, it's unbreakable and will last for eternity cheaply sold for only $40,000. Good investment. Great catcher. recommended piece of technology.

Reviews.Title: Meh.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "brookeb"
Reviews.Content: I know they say size matters, and the stand is nice and all but the TV? It's just okay I guess.

Reviews.Title: We didn't like our backyard so...
Reviews.Author: john tierney
Reviews.Content: instead of landscaping we got this puppy. We can pretty much place it anywhere out back and you can't see our neighbors ugly pine trees. The added benefit of having the back of this thing facing our neighbors didn't hurt either. They can deal with the low hum. Apparently TV's don't require planning permission. Who knew!Pros:* This TV gives out enough heat that when the Hawaii screen saver is on its actually nice and toasty on the patio.* Indestructible. A fastball will only piss this thing off.* Nothing like putting on the end of "Dante's peak” to get the kids inside.* National Lampoon’s Christmas vacation pool scene.Con's:* We've had to install blinds but hey, summer every day and night.* Certain TV shows and movies are a no no. "Signs", and "The Walking Dead" are good examples.* One of the kids got a bit of a sunburn when he got a bit too close while trying to retrieve a ball. That won't happen again* We have no idea what's going on behind the TV. There used to be a swing set back there but who knows now.* The dog's missing

Reviews.Title: Cannot mount it to the wall
Reviews.Author: ebschor "ebschor"
Reviews.Content: I ordered this TV to mount on my bathroom wall and after getting it home I found that it MUST remain in its stand. It cannot hang on a wall. So, instead of mounting it in my bathroom I decided to put it in the butler's quarters.

Reviews.Title: What a steal
Reviews.Author: Ronald S. Garrison
Reviews.Content: Thank God it came with free shipping...otherwise it would not be worth the price!Amazing clarity...heard of Narnia?Wardrobe is out the window, you can actually walk through the screen and explore any movie/show/game you want!It was worth the 57 likes i got on Instagram alone!

Reviews.Title: Couldn't be better
Reviews.Author: ODS
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my friend Aspa as a Christmas present (so I could see her reaction to the characters on screen being larger than her!) and I could not have made a better purchase! Fantastic screen size (it grows on you) and great resolution - fantastic value for money!.

Reviews.Title: Hmmm.
Reviews.Author: David S. Shapiro
Reviews.Content: While originally confused, I will say one important thing--you can totally get this on eCostdotcom for sixty dollars, but you have to opt for the six thousand-a-year service contract.And no delivery.

Reviews.Title: Well I just refinanced my house to get this and.....
Reviews.Author: mariloopy
Reviews.Content: Pros: $25.00 rebate...SWEETCons: For the price the speakers sounded really tinny, instructions in Mandarin, hard to view from International Space Station : (

Reviews.Title: Check out Lamar...
Reviews.Author: Christopher M. Johnson
Reviews.Content: Save yourself the money and buy a billboard instead, they're cheaper.  Lamar and CBS Outdoor make a better TV than this.

Reviews.Title: It Was Really Close!
Reviews.Author: J. Brooks
Reviews.Content: Just as I was ready to pull the trigger on this purchase, I noticed Samsung today announced its 86" "Big Brother" to this model for just $19,999!!!  Whew!  That was a close call!  Now I only need to forfeit ONE of my nuts so I can afford to buy a nice TV!!!  Someday, my grandchildren will thank me for catching this great deal just in time!

Reviews.Title: My car is 20000 dollars.  My house is 150000 dollars.  My TV - priceless.
Reviews.Author: ACD
Reviews.Content: To many people, their ultimate purchase is a Ferrari, a nice big mansion in Beverly Hills, or their very own Olympic sized swimming pool.  Well for me, being a humble guy that I am, my ultimate dream purchase was this beastly Samsung TV.The times were tough, people could not find jobs.  I could not find jobs.  But I had to do whatever necessary to buy this TV for my favorite TV shows, or play my Playstation with awe.  As a result, I decided to join the military.  Yeah many join up to serve their country, pave a way for their career and whatnot.  But for me, there was one thing and one thing only - this beautiful piece of man made masterpiece.  I signed up for additional years to get the sign-on bonus, which would expedite my getting my hands on this TV.  For years while I was in service, I only ate at mess hall, with occasional dining at McDonald's for a Big Mac.  While others were going out on the weekends, I stayed home doing research and analysis on object of my affection.After having retired in the military with full pension, I'm happy to say I have finally purchased this TV.  Many have asked me why I stay single.  Well, if I have a wife and kids, where would my money go?  Exactly.  Whenever I pass by a homeless person, I think of chipping in a few bucks.  But then, I thought my ultimate dream machine, so I inclined not to waste my money on this homeless dude.Life is short.  Therefore, sometimes you have to be frugal and be less giving in order to make your dream come true.  And I consider me a great American success story.Thank you, Samsung!

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: S. Ashbeck "Spartan & Jedi Trading Co."
Reviews.Content: I wasn't able to afford one of these TVs at first, so I decided to sell a ton of crack to Toronto's mayor, Rob Ford. He bought 25 of these TVs for me in return. Overall, the TV works fine, but I noticed that it's not playing in 1080p, but rather 1079.9p. Other than that, it works great! I just hope that my immigrant maids aren't watching it while I'm off selling meth to the US congress representatives!

Reviews.Title: Three Inch Hole Not So Bad
Reviews.Author: Midwest Guy
Reviews.Content: I knew there was going to be issues when I got home from work and saw the thing squeezed in between my storm door and the front door.  It works but the 3 inch round hole near the top center that was caused by my door knob took a little getting used to.  With such a big screen a 3 inch hole is less noticeable than you'd think and since most action in a movie is near the center of the screen I got used to it after a while.  The other 82 inches are really fantastic so I only took away two stars for what was really more of a You Pee Es issue that anything that has to do with the TV.

Reviews.Title: How soon are the $300K 8K televisions coming out?!?
Reviews.Author: M. Eggleston "BLACK ARK"
Reviews.Content: I can't even begin to explain how breathtaking the view is when watching this screen...then again, all views are breath taking when I'm in a heroin soaked crystal meth craze. I had just enough cash left to get a nice blast to sooth the fact that I spent $40K on a TV set...I was upset when I found out absolutely no celebrities own this thing.I was really looking forward to being in the "elite" crowd, yet I got indoctrinated to a secret society of tall yellow cone cap wearers that sit facing random corners. Oddly we never talk to each other, too busy watching our sweet 85" 4K televisions. Hooked it up HDMI to my PC and the tower started smoking, seem this authentic piece of "baller level" techno blingage has too much "juice" for mere computers, DVR's, gaming consoles, Blu-Ray players, it wouldn't talk to anything I own valued under $30K...so now I have only one question remaining:How soon are the $300K 8K televisions coming out?!? This thing is played out man, I can't believe I jumped the gun to get it knowing full well it wouldn't match the Walmart decor in my project neighborhood one bedroom apartment...Oh crap, the electric company just rolled up to yank the meter out the back, I forgot to pay the bill...

Reviews.Title: Hammock lovers must-see!
Reviews.Author: Eggman
Reviews.Content: Although pricey, this beautifull hammock stand is very sturdy and will endure harsh weather and horse bites.Note that the lonely tree landscape it's not real but i get enough of those already, so it's fine.

Reviews.Title: The early withdrawal from my 401(k) was worth it!
Reviews.Author: Chad Kautzer
Reviews.Content: I couldn't be happier with this bad boy. And the Amazon discount definitely helped defray the costs of the early withdrawal on my 401(k). Although I've taken a hit on my retirement savings, nothing beats the feeling I have right now as I retire to my lazy boy and watch The Bodyguard on an 85-inch screen.

Reviews.Title: Breathing new life in the oldest profession
Reviews.Author: zoo007
Reviews.Content: As a male escort my nights and days were filled with meaningless tricks but now I get out of some stranger's bed every morning looking forward to working my way toward owning this incredible tv!  I used to hang my head low on every street corner I worked but now I have a spring in my step and a gleam in my eye thanks to unfettered materialism.  Thanks Samsung!  I don't know how much longer my soul could continue to be shredded in this horrible industry but now it feels like I could go on forever. My life is just like this tv FAB-U-LOUS!!! *two snaps up and down*

Reviews.Title: ultra slim tv ftw
Reviews.Author: Lindsay
Reviews.Content: I just had to buy this ultra slim tv as I felt fat.  Now I can watch my work out shows while doing thirty day cleanses via a television that doesn't look as if it's a tub of lard.  Talk about thinspiration!  What more can you want in a tv?

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Jadon Breeding
Reviews.Content: This tv is much better and more high Rez than the last 40,000 I bought and the 2 AA batteries it comes with is high quality and cased in diamonds

Reviews.Title: Best TV ever
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: i originally bought this TV for my movie viewing room.  Me and my family liked it so much we bought another one for the bathroom.  I bought mine new and did not get the cheap price of $33K.  Some people have all the luck.

Reviews.Title: Suitable for Single people as well as couples
Reviews.Author: David J Chamberlain
Reviews.Content: I have to say it has all been worth it, once i had seen this I excitedly showed my partner and we decided we HAD to have it.I should have explained my means to acquire such a wonderful piece of modern media engineering, before I went ahead and seduced the widow that lived down the road. My partner was not impressed at all, even though I did it for the both of us.The widow even said it was worth every penny, for that week of indulgent passion. My partner disagreed and said it should have only been 1 night, and she left me all alone.. HA.. I got the last laugh as I have this wonderful TV which tops up my tan whilst I am watching Game of Thrones.The widow said he might pop round sometime too..

Reviews.Title: If it were only waterproof
Reviews.Author: Joe S
Reviews.Content: My wife, children and I are out of a home, but we were fine with it, until it rained.  My neighbor was nice enough (he didn't really know) to "lend us an extension cord and cable.  We should have thought about a tarp. Anybody want to buy a used tv?

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!!! but kinda confused
Reviews.Author: Rockstar
Reviews.Content: I love the picture and the sound is perfect. But it's kinda funny that I don't really notice a difference between this and my 2008 Sony 47". All of the signals seem to look the same. Something about how I need to wait until programs are shot in $4k or something.Please note!! It's not just a TV. It's a big TV. Make sure it'll fit in your entertainment center first. Also, you can't mount them so don't even try. LOLPeople are complaining about the remote but I don't seem to have any issues with it.

Reviews.Title: Weight is an issue
Reviews.Author: Rachel Rice
Reviews.Content: I had to have this professionally installed. They did a great job but less than 2 hours later, my whole toppled over onto its side. It cost me almost as much again to have it righted, and then I had to go and buy another freaking Samsung for counterbalance on the other home. I shoulda just bought the local movie theatre than went out of business and moved in there. Cheaper and easier.The picture is nice though, and now I have surround sound for free.

Reviews.Title: Worth every penney! Get one now before the price goes up!
Reviews.Author: Melvin P Spittle
Reviews.Content: Pros: I bought this for the 3D interactive porn feature alone and can tell you it does not disappoint!Cons: **************WARNING************This TV makes great looking women look a million times better, but magnifies ugly even more and can be very traumatizing to those sensitive to ugly! Be very careful what you watch! SAMSUNG: I recommend you include this as part of the disclaimer!

Reviews.Title: Thanks Chua
Reviews.Author: Ben
Reviews.Content: Me and some of my Asian pals spent 2 years saving up for this, Carlos even ditched his plans on going to New York to help us out.I have to say, this thing looks great sitting up on the top of my tractor, I swear I can see the hairs of the deer as a I watch the hunting channel.

Reviews.Title: Could've gotten cheaper locally but...
Reviews.Author: Jim Seward
Reviews.Content: I was in a local shop looking for a talking clown doll for my son's birthday, when the strange man behind the counter pointed out this TV.  I was hooked, and thought at only $29,999 it was a steal.  It even came with a free frogurt!Sadly, the frogurt toppings contained potassium benzoate, so (knowing that's bad) I politely declined.  The TV was probably cursed anyway.  I'd rather pay the extra $10,000 to buy from a trusted dealer like Amazon than to take my chances with this mysterious shopkeeper.Just be sure the switch on the back of the TV is set to "good", not "evil"...

Reviews.Title: Will wait for the analog Hisense, Funai, Sansui, or Westinghouse and pick it up for $999.00 for the 8K model
Reviews.Author: Vassil Stoev
Reviews.Content: Will wait for the analog Hisense, Funai, Sansui, or Westinghouse and pick it up for $999.00 for the 8K model

Reviews.Title: Warning! This TV Does NOT Cost $4,000!
Reviews.Author: K. Cate Jr. "Socktown"
Reviews.Content: $4K? More like $40K! Seriously Samsung? Sure, the picture is gorgeous with my SWEET 4-Head HiFi VCR but I could have used that extra $36K to pay off Razor Toed Johnny and the boys down at the Provoloneshark Bar. I demand you remove pricing references from these model designations. At least I have one kneecap left. For now........

Reviews.Title: Highly recommend!
Reviews.Author: NICHOLAS
Reviews.Content: This "TV" is a perfect addition to my home. The images are the actual size that they appear which is what I was hoping for :-)

Reviews.Title: Fantastic for iRacing!
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: I bought three of these for use with my three-screen iRacing setup. Fortunately my 6 DOF hexapod motion platform I use for the racing seat had enough spare capacity to support the extra weight. I am using the large PC cluster installed in my basement (modeled after the Pixar rendering farm) to drive the three displays at full resolution, 5000 fps, 3D. Fortunately the computer farm has enough spare water cooling capacity to keep the TVs cooled down as well.I am paying for the TVs by leasing simulator time out to various professional racing teams. Now, with these new TVs, I am getting calls from various F1 teams that I cannot disclose (one is sponsored by a caffeine infused drink company named for a four-legged male animal, another uses a different four-legged animal on their logo). It is convenient for these teams because the simulator is located right next to my full-scale moving ground wind tunnel. Talk about a marketing opportunity! After installing these TVs I did have to hire security to keep the aerodynamic engineers from trying to get some unauthorized free time on my sim since they cannot afford it on an Engineer's salary. Peasants.Since he just retired from F1, I can talk about Mark Weber, who comes by regularly to help out with the development in exchange for some sim time. He seem to really enjoy these new, larger screens, but I can only guess because he does not seem to speak English. Ross Braun also comes by often, since he frequently uses the wind tunnel, and can expense the sim time since he is a Team Principal. Ross helps me communicate with Mark, since apparently Mark comes from a country that splintered off from England somehow. Whatever.Anyway, if you are serious about iRacing, you will buy three of these. Otherwise you will not be able to compete with me and my sim. I don't care if you are a pro NASCAR racer. Speaking of which, learn to turn right. It will expand your universe, almost as much as my TVs expand mine.

Reviews.Title: This is the Shiz! I want to porn this up
Reviews.Author: BigGumForFun
Reviews.Content: This is an epic TV! we had hours of fun using it with perlmutter. God im going to miss him!

Reviews.Title: She can see!
Reviews.Author: kathotheman
Reviews.Content: After Grandpa mysteriously died, we noticed Grandma's new flat screen. I guess only having one eye makes sense to insist on owning the biggest and best tv out there... She can't see too well.. Seriously, one of her eyes is a glass one...At first it was hard to get used to the entire wall being a screen. It used to be covered with pictures of Grandma and Grandpa.. But thats all forgotten when watching Chitty Chitty Bang Bang. Now I can't wait for the times I get to spend with Grandma and that amazing flying car! We will eat her stale and sometimes moldy leftovers from Mongolian Grill that she snuck into her purse. It's alway special to find that stray piece of gum that made into the napkin full of noodles, but who cares when you are watching the Buttercream Gang in life size proportions!I guess my one complaint is the placement of the power button. Did you HAVE to put it on top of the TV? I mean, grandma nearly broke her neck last time trying to turn it on. She misplaced the remote and oddly doesn't have enough money to purchase a ladder. I found her doing a balancing act on top of 4 folding chairs.Its getting a little easier not having Grandpa around, but I do miss his small TV and VHS duo that always had Bonanza running in his office... Which is now a room to hold all of Grandma's rapidly growing DVD collection. Grandpa sure was a stickler with all that money.. I wonder how Grandma..... Oh wait...

Reviews.Title: changed life, changed world
Reviews.Author: Cocorose
Reviews.Content: I for one am so thankful for this globally impactive product of biblical proportions. This is just what America needed to pull our economy out of a slump, and with 3 available our national debt will become a surplus before anyone can say "chesterfield potato".I used to be so bored with my life...watching tv all day on a little 72" screen while my friends were out doing crazy stuff. They'll be the ones crying now.And actually...it turned out to be no big deal selling my house for the money to buy it as the packing crate is plenty big enough to live in!

Reviews.Title: Amazon drone did not ship my package to India
Reviews.Author: Samir Shah
Reviews.Content: I am a Indian cricket star. I actually make enough rupees on a yearly basis to purchase a tv like this. However, the $2,000,000 rupees i paid for this was not worth it. I expected the tv to be bigger, its not. It seems almost as small as my 26 inch tv. You can really notice the difference between 240hz and 120hz (my old tv was 240hz). The picture looks like 1980s for some reason. Last but not least, how can you only have 2 hdmi ports? I have 7 videogame consoles I need to hook up. Also the box that this tv came in is too big. They should create smaller boxes. The worst of it all is the fact that a special amazon drone did not deliever my package to Baroda, India. Sorry for bad grammer and spelling. I am a fob. Go india!! I love america anyways I give 5 stars!

Reviews.Title: Mixed Feelings
Reviews.Author: M. R. Parson
Reviews.Content: Watching Wheel of Fortune, I find that Vanna White's head is just a tad too huge; I should've maybe gone with the 80" Aquos.Live and learn.That said, porn is A W E S O M E.

Reviews.Title: didnt fit
Reviews.Author: doug voyles
Reviews.Content: I tried to install this in my cars dash, apparently they are a little too large for that,, will be returning ASAP

Reviews.Title: "Samsung new, everybody owns one!"
Reviews.Author: David Simon
Reviews.Content: This was airlifted to me via an Amazon Drone and when it was literally dropped off, it created a Grand Canyon sized crater where my front lawn used to be. To make matters worse my Grandma Noonie was sunning herself at the time and we have not seen her since.  All that is left are a pair of orthopedic Crocs, a pack of Marlboro lights and seven empty cans of Ensure.  I bought this TV because of the Neil Diamond song,  “Samsung New, Everybody owns one!”  But here’s the thing: they accidentally sent me the wrong one. They sent me the U85S9 85-inch 4K Ultra HD 120Hz NOT SO smart LED TV and all it plays is either Fox News or The Kardashians. At 85 inches and in 3D,  Kim’s bottom is the same shape and size of a Dumbo’s head and Elizabeth Hasselbeck looks like she’s on a  billboard for Peta’s campaign to stop clubbing baby seals.  Watching blu ray movies unfortunately totally recreates the movie going experience: during every film, teenagers suddenly appear on our couch, texting, talking on the phone and screwing up the picture with their laser pointers. And when I went to the bathroom I noticed that a mentally challenged usher was in the doorway, trying desperately and unsuccessfully to count ticket stubs.  In the kitchen, several more mentally challenged movie workers were selling popcorn, taking, on average, three to four hours to deliver one coke and one small popcorn to a waiting customer.  When I called to complain, I got a recording of Kim Jung Un acting as Mr. Moviefone (acting out all the parts) and who then offered free vacations to North Korea which included hotel, airfare and one souvenier abandoned female newborn of your choice (that can be conveniently picked up at roadsides all over the country).

Reviews.Title: loving life in a cardboard box
Reviews.Author: eddie
Reviews.Content: after finally getting online and saving tons of money on Obama care, I was able to purchase this tv in 386 easy payments, thanks Obama care and samsung!!!!

Reviews.Title: Roast Beef
Reviews.Author: Sweet
Reviews.Content: After selling my booty outside gates of prison for money. I purchased this tv to fuel my addiction to porn. After 12 hours of continuos visual basting I must say that I will look at Jenna Jameson's labia the same way again, or roast beef for that matter.Yeesh. Sooo worth bankruptcy.

Reviews.Title: lacking functions
Reviews.Author: jc
Reviews.Content: I'm rating this 4 star instead of 5 because it doesn't come with a cooking and cleaning function. How am I supposed to have guests over for the Super bowl party?

Reviews.Title: terrible support
Reviews.Author: Alan
Reviews.Content: I had this for 31 days, then, when i needed tech support, i was told I waited one day to long, and they hung up on me!

Reviews.Title: Spend your money!
Reviews.Author: Stacey Feinsilber
Reviews.Content: I was going to go to college, but I decided to get this TV instead.When I got this TV, I expected that 4 K's were going to be on it, but there were not 4 K's on the screen. The quality was good and this TV had amazing quality. Looks like I am not going to get an education anymore!

Reviews.Title: College was not worth it
Reviews.Author: Aaron S.
Reviews.Content: I saw this TV and instantly disenrolled from college next semester. After purchasing the TV, with student loans, I realized I made the right decision when I turned on Monday Night football. THe delivery guy didnt seem to sure where to put the TV in the studio apartment, so I moved my bed near the stove. Heat will be closer a least!!!

Reviews.Title: Finally found happiness again!
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: I didn't think it was possible to find true joy again, but I did it. When I was fifteen my parents died and I was orphaned. Since then I've worked at Wal-Mart, forced to roam the electronics section staring at vizio tvs. Working 70 hours a week but still Part time, I was miserable and lonely. I was tired of selling recycled plastic vizio tvs to overweight women who looked twice their real age. Even worse were the swarms of Indians who came in on black Friday asking me for additional discounts on the umrp brand tvs. I shed more years while hiding from Indian men with mustaches, fake "north face" coats, and flip flops in November, than when my parents died years ago. Then, to my astonishment, a customer asked if we carried the 85 inch Samsung 4k tv. I was puzzled by the request and immediately searched vizios website but found only more e series flagships. The customer left disappointed, and iwent home that day with hunger in my heart. I found the tv on amazon and bought it with my Wal-Mart master card, a few hundred dollars on my PayPal from selling stolen tvs from Wal-Mart, and the remaining $36,788 I had received as inheritance. I would need a new keyboard to tell you how good my 2160p tv makes my 720p hd cable look. I am so glad my parents died,or I would not have been able to get this tv. One time I tried to count all 8 million pixels on the screen, but I ended up bleeding from my pupils and got blood on my hdmi cords. Just as my picture as flickering, I headed to best buy to pick up an audio quest vodka cable. I knew if I had the Samsung 85 inch that I would need a cable that could handle the detailed sound quality of Verizon fios. Well anyway, I've been away from Sammy (my tv) for too long. P.s. pick up screen cleaner with this tv to wipe off your many kisses that you still lay on the screen.

Reviews.Title: Can't believe it fit, but we made it work...
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: When I first bought this TV, my wife was very upset. Mainly because 85" is a lot more than she is used to handling. I assured her that, once she took in the whole experience, she would never be the same. I was right.Now, I'll admit, once it showed up at our front door, it seemed virtually impossible to fit the whole thing in. As a matter of fact, the first time, my wife whined that it was WAY too big, and there was no possible to fit the whole thing in there. Fortunately, with a little elbow grease and some lubrication along the walls, we stuffed it right in. I can assure you, there is no possible way for us to get anything in that area at all, now that it's in there, but it fit, thankfully. (I'm not sure if we'll ever be able to get it out, either.)The first time I hit the power button, my wife complained that it gave off too much heat, and the vibration from the speaker made it a little awkward to her liking. She soon got used to that, though. I thought there was something wrong with it, because my wife seemed to look uncomfortable every time I turned it on, but she's doing fine now.I must say, if there's anything to complain about, it's simply this: the sound is a bit muffled, and it fades in and out, depending on where she stands in the room. For instance, if she is in the kitchen, it sounds muffled and faded, but when she's close to me, it's just muffled. I also noticed that it smells kinda strange after it being in there for a few weeks. Otherwise, it's a great addition to our lives. She's not nearly as bitter about the MUCH smaller one she had been used to for the last 10 years.My suggestion is this: When you tell your wife that you are going to give her 85" for Christmas, she's going to complain, but just stick to the plan. She will eventually get used to it.

Reviews.Title: This TV Will Change Your Life - Also, Really Nice Box
Reviews.Author: dude manrod jr.
Reviews.Content: At one time I had a normal 65" flatscreen LED that seemed adequate for movies and Xbox. Then I stumbled upon this TV, and I suddenly sensed there was something missing in my life. My wife, Didi, tried to tell me it was because I had left my seven-year-old son at a Best Buy in downtown Detroit, but she doesn't understand that you have to camp out overnight when the Xbox One launches. Any way, he got me one, so it's clearly not that. Good job, Timmy, wherever you went after snagging that coveted console! Any how, I'm playing Battlefield 4, and I'm getting my ass kicked by a bunch of Indonesian third graders, and I realize that it's probably because of the inadequate screen size of my TV, and the fuzziness of 1080p resolution. Luckily my wife has a really high limit on the the credit card that I signed her up for. Yearly income? One million dollars! Even more fortuitous, I've been unemployed for the last three years, so I'm home to intercept the bill while she's at her second job.  Now armed with this plastic wish fulfiller, I discovered that Amazon is discounting this beast five grand, which is probably why there were only three left in stock. Without hesitation, I clicked on "add to cart", but then began worrying about how I would pay the bill. And then I had an epiphany - the credit card was in my wife's name. With that moral dilemma lifted, I laid back on my couch, took another bong hit, and hallucinated in 4K. About a week later I'm walking my dog, Max, and as he's defecating on my neighbors flower bed, I see a semi drive up to my house with half of a modular home. Then I realized that what I thought was a bifurcated house with beige siding and the word "Samsung" written all over it was actually my new flatscreen TV. I looked down at my dog, Tex, to see how he was making out and thought "Wow is that thing massive". The TV was really big, too.  It took the engineering firm I hired about a week to unpack and set up, and it wasn't cheap. Did you know they take credit cards? I do now! So anyway, just as I'm preparing to school some wise ass Malaysian pipsqueaks, someone started annoyingly ringing my doorbell. After about the seventh or fifteenth ring, I almost got off the couch to see who was there, when, luckily, my wife, Mimi, awoke after working a double shift and crying herself to sleep worrying about our missing son, Jimmy, and rushed to the door. Unfortunately for her it was the police who were there to arrest her for what they called unprecedented credit card fraud. Doubly unfortunate for her they spotted the meth lab I had set up in my daughter Kimmy's room, and because the mortgage for the house was in her name, she took the rap. Unfortunately for me, I was forced to leave my house and new TV by the Hazmat team the police called in to clean up my wife Bibi's meth lab.  Damn, my life sucked. Where would I play Xbox now! And then it came to me - my only brother Ro and his wife Jen rented an apartment a few miles away, so I got my dog, Ajax, and sped off in my wife's 1986 Toyota Tercel, frantically thinking of some way to talk my brother Joe into buying a massive TV for me to play video games on. By the time I arrived at their apartment, I had come up with not only an undeniably rational reason to buy an 85" TV, but also, considerately, a way for them to pay for it. Moe's wife, Bren, had recently given birth to their first child, Troy. On the black market, he had to be worth fifty grand, easy. That would leave an extra ten grand to buy a lot of new games for the new Xbox One console. For some odd reason they seemed perturbed and asked me to leave. As I left Bro and Jan's apartment I realized why they seemed so angry - they were Playstation fanboys! Geez, did I screw up! On top of that I had left my car keys in their apartment. Having no desire to face their wrath, I decided to hot wire my wife's 2012 BMW 6 series, which, talk about weird coincidences, is the same model car my brother Nero's wife, Nan, drives.  And so, there I was, homeless, wifeless, childless, and most of all, 85"-4K-LED-TV-120Hz-less! There was, however, a silver lining - I still had the box the TV came in, and so, today, thank you Samsung, my dog, Anthrax and I are not homeless! I just wish this box came with more outlets and a bigger kitchen, although a guy I know told me it's not that costly to add some more. What's weird is that I forget his name. I'm usually really good with names.

Reviews.Title: Worked out Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Blowfish
Reviews.Content: When I robbed the Bank of America, I hid the money.  My wife used $40k of it to buy this TV.  Then I bribed the warden to get a cell that had a window facing my home.  Now I get 3 hots and a cot, and can watch all my favorite shows!

Reviews.Title: Confused and bleeding... As soon as I can afford electricity and sugery, the picture should be amazing!
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: Okay, let me stop the bleeding real quick... Okay there we go... Okay first off.. No wait it's bleeding again... okay.. no wait.. okay there!!.. Alright... First off. The instructions are horrible! I followed the instructions exactly. I made 3 waffles like it said. Called chuck Norris for video recommendations. Gloated at the neighbors for five minutes then I tried to put the batteries in the remote... Positive to positive negative to negat.. BOOOM!!! Wang caught in turbo jet engine! How does that even happen? I tried different batteries and then a walrus crashed through my wall and read me tax law. As if the gangsters I borrowed $40,000 from calling me every 3 hour saying I'll never see my dog Scruffy again unless I pay up wasn't enough, I have a turbo jet in my living room with my wang caught in it and a walrus that has now moved on to Elvis impersonations. Well let's just try a Blu Ray. I pop in Avatar and a Delorean crashes through my front door and a crazy wild eyed old man who claimed to be a scientist told me I had to go back with him to the future. Once he saw my dilemma involving a walrus dancing to Lady Ga Ga and me with my wang in a turbo jet engine he told me I should have bought the Anti wang in turbo jet walrus repellant for just an extra $120,000. If I only knew. I told the guy who showed up in the T.A.R.D.I.S. to go back and remind me to add that to my purchase since Doc. forgot plutonium again. As soon as I can afford to pay my power bill I'll let you know how the picture is.

Reviews.Title: Not worth my balls
Reviews.Author: Jeff Glessing
Reviews.Content: It was serendipity at first, the same week this sucker went on sale I got offered a promotion at my local sperm bank.  They're real friendly there, especially that 'front desk gal' more like a back door girl really.  And so I went to town down there sometimes 12 hours a day looking for all that over-time so that I can get that big beautiful screen up on my wall at home.  Imagine, the number of hours it took me to put in before the doctor told me, 'Jesus Christ son, you're outta ammo, I mean, you're firing blanks my young friend.'  It was devastating actually to find out that not only I had I lost the opportunity to own this techonological marvel that costs as much as my parents first house, but I had also wasted all of my sperm at the bank, just 7Gs short of the $40G tag, dawg and now I will never be able to have children.  FML and FSamsungToo

Reviews.Title: A reeeeal boner!!!
Reviews.Author: Bobby Boy Ahoy!!!
Reviews.Content: I liked it so much I bought another one for the master bathroom!!! Beware though, its not easy to get it into a double wide trailer. And don't invite the neighbors if they be the "jealous type". We can't help cuz we"re rich!

Reviews.Title: HELP!!  I am stuck inside Avatar!!  I desperately need a better plot!!
Reviews.Author: MR D W HUTCHINGS
Reviews.Content: If you are reading this, please help me - the immersive experience of James Cameron's Avatar has trapped me and now I am unable to get back to my living room!  I know I should never have started watching it on technology like this, but I couldn't stop myself. I was able to cope for a while, but then there were these floating land island things and that was it; I couldn't hold on any longer.  Now there are tall blue people everywhere and I keep getting cut to scene after scene of supposed emotional turmoil which I couldn't care less about or confusing action which should be dramatic and dynamic but I'm not feeling it.  Nobody makes any sense here and there is some sort of moralising going on, but it is passing me by completely.  I could have sworn I saw Sigourney Weaver, but she could never have been stupid enough to get stuck here like me...could she?Could someone somehow get into this digital world and break me out somehow?  Jeff Bridges, you know how to do this stuff - HELP!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic size and display
Reviews.Author: mabst6
Reviews.Content: We bought this for our dog called Putney. He invites some bitches to come around in his pet house. This has solved our problem for not getting our shoes wrecked and chewed.

Reviews.Title: It's all relative
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: A contractor wanted $50k to install a fieldstone fireplace and chimney, so we thought that if we took out a 2nd mortgage, paid $40k for this thing, placed it on the floor along one wall and put a picture of a roaring fire on it, well, we could save $10k! It worked great, and we get to watch Santa climb down the chimney every year, except when the power goes out during snowstorms. The dog even curls up in front of it and if you boil water at the foot of it, it even starts to smell like woodsmoke after awhile.

Reviews.Title: Time for a Raise!
Reviews.Author: Mikey
Reviews.Content: So the purchase was made because I was insulted and had my feelings hurt by an employee very dear to me.My assistant wanted a raise from $19,500 a year to $21,000 a year. I said absolutely not, as business has just been ok, and economy is still bad.She called me a cheap SOB!Can you believe that my most beloved employee said this to me??So... to prove i'm not as cheap as she thinks... I bought this awesome TV for the office!However... I do not think she likes that I had installed it right above her.Just playing! I can't afford this TV! I did buy the empty box from a rich friend for $200 bucks thou!

Reviews.Title: adult film industry funding
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: Joined the "the show" to fund this bad boy and only 2,000 more "money shot" scenes till $ in the bank. Think i'll awing both ways, though, to speed up the process.Hopefully, the wife won't mind once ahe sees it and as long as i don't bring my coworkwrs home.Sweet!

Reviews.Title: Love the tv
Reviews.Author: michael guillory
Reviews.Content: But I have to live in the box.Next on my Christmass wish list is that $33,000 stereo to punch it up some.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: William Noyes
Reviews.Content: Playing Wii in 4K looks bloody amazing. Can see all of the tiny little spots and my Mii. Shame there is no DVD player in the Wii otherwise I could have watched some decent films. Never the less it does have an Internet browser, thats my night planned. #P0rnIn4K

Reviews.Title: Can I have this for Christmas
Reviews.Author: Mary @ *Buried Under Romance*
Reviews.Content: I finally had enough money to buy this after I sold all of my worldly possessions...then realized I couldn't pay for tax and shipping. Had to return it.

Reviews.Title: Thank you tax payers, this TV is awesome
Reviews.Author: Ms. N. M. Imlay "Environmental Scientist, Own...
Reviews.Content: Having spent the past 20 years on benefits, I figured me and the 50 children. by 60 different fathers, deserved a well scrounged treat. The TV is awesome, but the council really need to sort us out with a better house, it totally clashes with the decor in the current pad.

Reviews.Title: Apple is on it folks!
Reviews.Author: yamanoor
Reviews.Content: I heard the sales are dipping because Apple is about to copy it, patent it, double the price and release it, much to a good ol' stampede outside stores!

Reviews.Title: What a magic smart TV!
Reviews.Author: Bruce Chen
Reviews.Content: After reading all these amazing and positive reviews, I had to admit that I was tempted and I decided to get one. I sold my house to get the enough money for this awesome TV. It was not a big deal for me to lose my house. I could sleep in my Honda Civic for the rest of my life. However I encountered a problem when I got the TV. Since I am now a homeless man, I can only store this TV in my car while the TV is too big to be placed into my small car! But finally I did that! How? You may ask. Let me tell you, that's easy. I simply flipped over the TV, then It turned to be a 58-inch one! Now it can get through my car door!

Reviews.Title: Free Shipping?!
Reviews.Author: Windibank
Reviews.Content: The Free shipping just tipped the balance for me. So glad I got this model though, it's turned one whole side of my house into a portal to the world.

Reviews.Title: I didn't think this through
Reviews.Author: Joseph Chandler
Reviews.Content: After seeing the sale price I decided I must have this TV now, the problem was I could not afford it so I sold my house to make the money, then bought a van parked it down by the river and anxioiusly awaited delivery. It arrived in perfect condition but to my dismay I was unable to fit it into my van. I decided to improvise and bought some bungee cords and stapped it to the side. Me and my new friends I met here love watching the included slideshow. Sadly that is all we can watch as I am no longer able to afford cable or even netflix. I would not reccomend buying this TV unless you want to end up broke and LIVING IN A VAN DOWN BY THE RIVER!

Reviews.Title: Be a good consumer. Buy this TV.
Reviews.Author: Patrick Oegerle
Reviews.Content: I took out a second mortgage to buy this television. They may foreclose on my house, but they can't take my TV!

Reviews.Title: The heavenly father approves.
Reviews.Author: Joel F. Janecek
Reviews.Content: When I created this planet, I always wondered at what point I would be able to clap my hands together and just say 'done'. Well, this is that moment. Forget world peace or feeding the needy, this is a friggin 85 inch 4K TV. And yes that's not a typo.So all I can say is way to go...Earth. This is it you done good!Yaweh out!

Reviews.Title: It comes with windows!!!!
Reviews.Author: Mr. Thomas B. J. Elwood "tecno kid"
Reviews.Content: I have a job as the manager of a small company, we are of course really struggling in these harsh economic times, when I saw this TV reduced by over $5000 I couldn't help but notice is the same size as the broken window i've always wanted to fix but never had the money to. Thanks to the new 5% deposit mortgages in the uk I was able to buy one and replace my window, the thing is no one knows because The 4k resolution is so detailed that when coupled with the 3d images of open windows a cool breeze proceeds to enter the room.I do have to admit that the batteries wasn't the decider for me it was the fact that it came with a Manuel for this is a must for the proper orientation of the tv, I know this because I attempted to mount the tv without reading the Manuel first and I ended up mounting it backwards.WARNINGIf you have vertigo do not place the screen on the floor and put a picture of anything taken from more than 1893.67 mm off the ground as damages due to fainting is sadly not covered in the warranty.ALSO WARNINGthis tv does not do corners, when transporting you must use either the flu network or amazon prime air for 85inches is an oil tanker of a tv.FINAL WARNINGwhen tv programs warn you that some scenes may be upsetting an immediate action must be to turn off the tv for the detail this tv provides will add a whole new meaning to upsetting, if this isn't possible within 3.5 seconds then the remote can be thrown at the tv, this is a safer option because mainly it will save your life and partly because this action is covered in the warranty (please note prior to throwing of remote batteries must be inserted incorrectly otherwise the warranty is invalid)Thanks.

Reviews.Title: people of Umofia rejoice!
Reviews.Author: Okonkwo
Reviews.Content: My people from Umofia are thrilled that I sold all my yams to buy this wonderful television.  I no longer have yam foo-foo to eat, but I have Duck Dynasty in 4D!

Reviews.Title: Soar with the Condors
Reviews.Author: Alf
Reviews.Content: Personally, I love two things in life, watching TV and hang gliding. This TV offers the size and frame for gliding and 85 inches of 4k delight, so now I can do both at the same time and only with an additional $7000 dollar extension cord.Chump change Jeeves I say. I have recently swooped over the Grand Canyon while watching the Discovery Channel about the Grand Canyons at the same time. Yah, I know right? Awesome indeed dudes. I did have to sell my condo to get this but man, it was worth it. And, it is so large and gives off enough heat, my family of 4 sleep right cozy on it. If I can meet up with another 4 families with the same tv, hell we can build our own condo and just imagine the shows we could watch....God bless 4k Ultra and the means to afford it. Well, we are off to California now, going to soar with the Condors.....if there are 4 families in the California area that want to get together, please contact me. My name is Sam. Sam Sung. I can be reached sam.sung@moretvthanbrains.dum

Reviews.Title: Thanks Obamacare!
Reviews.Author: LLM
Reviews.Content: Amazing!  I can finally see the TV now without glasses.  The best part, under the new Obamacare if you have vision problems you can get one of these bad boys for free!!!!  Thanks Obama!!!

Reviews.Title: I bought four of these.
Reviews.Author: Zachary McQuain
Reviews.Content: Sure, they were a little pricey, but we really needed one for each bathroom, you know? They do the trick and now when I play Xbox while sitting on my gold toilet, I can do it with an 85 inch 4k TV sitting in front of me!

Reviews.Title: It's not worth the money
Reviews.Author: honey
Reviews.Content: I purchased this TV. I actually spent the 40k. It's a amazing TV. Just I ended up going bankrupt. Do not buy this unless you have 100k for repairs.

Reviews.Title: I have a few things to say
Reviews.Author: commops7
Reviews.Content: I traded my car in to get this TV, wow was it worth it, now i can't drive to work to pay for it.

Reviews.Title: I could afford it after saving 100's
Reviews.Author: William Roudette
Reviews.Content: I bought one after saving 100's on my car insurance THANKS GEICO... Can't wait to get another one...Samsung UN85S9 85-Inch 4K Ultra HD 120Hz 3D Smart LED UHDTV (Black)

Reviews.Title: Brillaint
Reviews.Author: TingTong "JMcC"
Reviews.Content: I fell in love with this TV so much that I had to buy it, However as I paid for it on a high interest credit card! I can now no longer afford to pay for my electricity and the supplier has removed the utility from my house. I still have this tv to look at though.....and light from candles helps at night......Who needs electricity for this bad boy . . . . . . The fact you have it is enough!

Reviews.Title: Buyer beware
Reviews.Author: Marty Raymond
Reviews.Content: So I can't afford those HD cable boxes and I have SD only at home. I figured, get this TV and all would be nice, right? Who'd have guessed? At the store the TV was insane. I mean I could see the pores on actors faces. I bring it home and what happens? The image is all fuzzy AND STILL SD.

Reviews.Title: Totally worth it
Reviews.Author: Doug B
Reviews.Content: Totally worth it and this will make due til the 120 inch version cones out... Guess it's not the size of the TV but the motion in the ocean..

Reviews.Title: Great for watching people who actually have a life in HD!
Reviews.Author: Desiree Franco "desxms"
Reviews.Content: I always liked "Let's Make a Deal" and "If the Price it Right". I payed for it in plastic and hope to win the lottery or die first.

Reviews.Title: Best Decision ever made.
Reviews.Author: DL
Reviews.Content: Hmm, this TV was a little over my initial budget, but I made a couple of adjustments, and was able to acquire this bad boy. I needed to learn some martial arts to get my kidney back, so there I was under the bridge quietly trying to watch an action movie. All of a sudden, Jean Claude van Damme punches me in the nose! The cheeky Belgian then invited me in for a little one-on-one session. When I had learned all the martial arts, I really felt One With The Television, and didn't come out after that.

Reviews.Title: Incredible Sound
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: You know how they say men are wired to be more visual, well I got the shock of my life a couple months back. After our last off-site corporate team building excercise I discovered that, neurolinguistically speaking, I'm actually auditory.Well, that really rocked my world because I had my heart set on this bad boy of a Samsung. But could I really justify the $40k price tag for 85 inches of 4K Ultra HD if, you know, vison was not my main NLP attribute?After much soul searching and online research, however, I found my answer and that, btw, Samsung really did think of everything. If you look real close at the pictures of the manual volume controls on the set you'll see that the sound on the UN85S9... GOES TO ELEVEN!!!

Reviews.Title: CHILDS PLAY
Reviews.Author: drewdown
Reviews.Content: I dont see what the problem is here. It is still not even holographic TV yet. It is affordable for any of us who are smart enough to invent things. Why bother even buying this though? For 85 dollars I can give you the plans to build a holographic TV with 40 bucks of parts available at Home Depot! email me for details tony_stark199iq@starkindustries.com. Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Didn't even take it out of the box...
Reviews.Author: Tricia Doran
Reviews.Content: We sold ours for a big profit to Jerry Jones to replace the ridiculously outdated 2D video screens at the Cowboys Stadium.

Reviews.Title: only 120 Hz really?
Reviews.Author: Paul ferris
Reviews.Content: I can't fit it through the front door, but it did revolutionize the way I look at porn. The neighbors don't like it when I watch porn, but I put on friday movie nights for everyone.

Reviews.Title: outstanding
Reviews.Author: TJ
Reviews.Content: All I had to do was sell one of my kidneys on the black market to afford it but the clarity of this TV is so amazing it was worth it.

Reviews.Title: Keeps the harem happy!
Reviews.Author: LuvAmazon "Goin' broke saving money on Amazon!"
Reviews.Content: Personally, I like to buy in bulk, so I bought twenty of them-one for each of my wives! As soon as the chloroform wears off, we'll be sitting pretty. Of course I'll have to wait til they're old enough to drive. This way they can pick them up and haul them upstairs.

Reviews.Title: amazing television all at affordable price
Reviews.Author: elias morales
Reviews.Content: after 1 year of my 75f8000 series that I loved I needed something much bigger with out sacrificing quality. So when I seen in our local 9900$ and above store I new I had too buy one for my living hall. Let me tell you after 3 hours of having this UHDTV I called the VP of Samsung and wired them an extra 10k for this beautiful piece of tech. Also I've placed an order for two more 85s9's and  a couple of throw aways (65f9000), for my bathroom, they are practically giving them away at RRP 4999.99$ . Plus since the holidays are coming up I'm sending my boy gates a few. I know he will get a few jolly's from it "inside joke". For anyone looking to purchase a new Television don't waste your time or money on anything less than the s9. Not only is it a television you can also talk to it, control it with no remote, and it will also transform into an ultrahighdeficon all at an affordable price. I'm told they are making a few models for vehicles, already pre-ordered 5 for the my astons. Apparently there is a limit. Only problem now is have to get a new mansion because the old one made the TV look too real so now I'm going with the all glass wall look.

Reviews.Title: $40,000 for saving $55 on your enegery bill?? Thats one heck of a way to go Green!
Reviews.Author: Saurabhp
Reviews.Content: Bargain of the century...Too bad they didn't have the 20% OFF for cyber monday...........Can I get the 30 minute amazon delivery with the Droid thing?? Would be fun the watch the droid fumble this bad boy into a lake near my house :)

Reviews.Title: Best gift ever for my.child!
Reviews.Author: Ghangus Green
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my sons 4th birthday. He seemed to really like it but quickly took to the AMAZING box. The box has become his favorite play thing, and this from THE kid who has everything. The picture on the box is sharp and crisp and the 3D is stunning. The box is user friendly and set up was easy. The TV lis now a another huge albatross I will likely give to his nanny.  Overall this is a great buy as my child is very discriminating and so hard to please, and he got instant gratification.  PRICELESS!

Reviews.Title: Samsung 4K
Reviews.Author: Coby Bishop
Reviews.Content: I am kinda dissapointed in this television..I thought that for $50K It would automatically know what I want to watch before I do but unfortunately all it ever did was react to my voice which i think is so 2012.... It also came pre-assembled so I had to hire a Russian Mi-26 to lift the roof off of my apartment building which the landlord was not pleased about but ever since they saw the picture they havent moved from my living room...kind of annoying really

Reviews.Title: I'm pregnant
Reviews.Author: ReviewGuy
Reviews.Content: I had a wet dream about owning this last night and now I'm pregnant.And I'm a man.This is one sexy silicon biatch.

Reviews.Title: A saving of $5.000 !
Reviews.Author: FCO. JAVIER REYES MORENO
Reviews.Content: The $5.000 Saving has been the key into buying this. Not many times I have had the opportunity of saving in a single TV more than 10 times my average TV budget.My plans are using it as floor mirror. All I need now is a High-Speed HDTV Pro Camera and a small post-production Unit and my dreams of watching myself in the mirror in the early mornings and changing my underwear color or putting a moustache in real time will finally become true.

Reviews.Title: Too Small
Reviews.Author: Jerry Jones
Reviews.Content: This wasn't nearly big enough for the price.  That's why I immediately gave it to Jason and bought a 200-Inch for $55,000.  I saved over $14,000!  For $39,000 and 85 inches, it won't even make Tony see open receivers.

Reviews.Title: My neighbors are mad! Terrible purchase.
Reviews.Author: Stephan
Reviews.Content: Buying this television was the worst decision I have ever made. When they delivered it, the semi truck blocked our subdivision for an hour! Second of all, the light from the tv is lighting up my neighbors houses at night. Yes, I have curtains, but the glow always finds ways through.We decided to mount the tv after people kept asking why we had a "chalkboard" in our living room. The problem was finding a wall big enough to mount the tv was difficult. My neighbor is a contractor so he helped me extend a wall to accommodate. After finally mounting it, it pulled the wall down because of what my neighbor the contractor said I had "a 200 pound tv on my wall, equal to a full grown man permanently attached".Since neither option worked out we found a solution that made sense. We mounted it on the ceiling. Apollo 13 was amazing! Unfortunately, it is the only thing we have been able to watch since my wife and I are juggling 3 jobs to pay for the tv. We are waiting for gravity to come out.Otherwise we love the tv. (Except that refresh rate!)

Reviews.Title: Amazing TV!
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: We really needed a car badly but after seeing this I decided riding my bike 20 miles to and from work every day would be worth it knowing I was coming home to this beauty. Amazing color, vivid picture and its fits perfectly in my garage right where my car would have been.

Reviews.Title: Out of stock?!
Reviews.Author: Callum Bowen
Reviews.Content: Well it just goes to show that you simply can't hesitate in the race with the Joneses! Unlike many other reviewers here I'd decided to be sensible and save up first. As I filled the ever-growing hoards of piggy banks with my loose change I prepped my house.I now have seventeen metric tonnes of coins and a delivery forklift ready for making payment, but nobody wants my money.When I rang to complain that they had not had the foresight to pre-order enough of these to meet the huge demand anybody could have predicted would occur, the salesperson babbled something about the stock kept in storage collapsing together into a singularity in the warehouse. She then began crying and muttering about tentacles and old ones, but the line went fuzzy and disconnected. Terrible service.An acquaintance told me that they'd seen one heading to an electronics store in our neighbourhood, but apparently the delivery driver had passed the local zoo and caused a riot in the monkey house when one of the chimps picked up an old branch and began smashing his dinner bowl with it. The last anybody heard was someone yelling that it was full of stars (I'm guessing they were watching the Grammy broadcast, lucky buggers).There was one bit of good news though. I learned yesterday that the mining magnate in the next town had bought one, and it just so happens that the lounge room wall I knocked down in preparation for my own gives me a clear line of sight to theirs. I lose the corners of the picture around the sides of my walls of course, and am limited to watching what they want ('Grand Designs: Poor People Foreclosures Series', 'Private Island Makeover' and 'Antiques Roadshow' seem to be favourites) which should at least tide me over until they can restock.For now though I'm extremely unhappy and starting to wonder if I should perhaps go out and make some friends instead.

Reviews.Title: Not a time travel device.
Reviews.Author: zbarlici
Reviews.Content: When i first heard about the UN85S9AFXZC, i knew right away i`d need to travel to chinawhere i could sell my left lung to raise the necessary funds for the necessary purchaseof the UN85S9AFXZ.  After the lung removal procedure the doctor kindly informed me thatthe remaining lung was badly deteriorated and warned me that putting a cognitive load onmy brain during problem solving while sporting an erection could prove to be fatal.Right away i was faced with a life and death situation since i could barely turn myeyes off her tight posterior and what seemed like a D-sized cup.  Having survived thatone i returned back home promptly with the stash of cash.  After initially poweringup the UN85S9AFXZC for the first time, the display`s clarity was so vivid  and the pixelsso tightly packed together that it generated a space-time vortex through which i was notable to travel, but i could see the future.  It seemed to be the same room, butthe UN85S9AFXZC was stashed away in a corner and my future smiling, content self sportingsome kind of headset with writing "Rift" on the side.  Somehow the view switched to ashowing of  tech sector stock market valuations, and seemed that all the tv makers`stock values plunged, at an unclear date in the year 2014, from which they would never be able to recover.  Scared from the recent revelations i hit the power buttonon the UN85S9AFXZC`s remote control.  I have not turned it back on since.

Reviews.Title: 2 GIRLS 1 CUP
Reviews.Author: james miller
Reviews.Content: OMG!! 2 GIRLS ONE CUP ON LOOP LOOKS AMAZING IN BLU-RAY !!! THE "S******"  LOOKS SOOO REAL AND THE SMELLS THAT COME OUT ARE AMAZINGLY PUNGENT AND TICKLE THE NOSTRILS !!  BUT WAIT!!! IF YOU BUY THE TV BEFORE 12/24 IT COMES WITH A FREE MAIL ORDER BRIDE FROM RUSSIA!!! MINE LOVES VODKA, MAGNUM PI RERUNS AND FARM ANIMALS! !!

Reviews.Title: That's it???
Reviews.Author: Jason L.
Reviews.Content: Just got this delivered and I've gotta say, I'm disappointed... It looked so much bigger in the pictures. My wife and I kicked our twins out of their room and made all three of the kids sleep in the same room so we had a space for this. Turns out this puny thing could have fit in the same room the twins had,  even if they remained. Wtf!?! We'll be returning this promptly and turning the room this was meant for into a pez memorabilia area instead.

Reviews.Title: Comes with HIV.
Reviews.Author: Nam Ha
Reviews.Content: After many months on the street corner doing amazingly nasty things with nasty people -- I am an owner of this marvelous TV. Not only does it anally screwed you with price marked-down, but I have to endure the nasty STD and HIV that I got to obtain this.

Reviews.Title: Transformer in Disguise!
Reviews.Author: jeremy vanbuskirk
Reviews.Content: I was watching it, and all of a sudden it transformed and walked away :/ I wonder if that is covered by warranty? would of Called samsung, but my Galaxy Mega transformed and walked off with the TV:/

Reviews.Title: Returning it, did not help with insurance registration!
Reviews.Author: Johnny Depp "JD"
Reviews.Content: After all the positive reviews I bought two of these to see if the inbuilt browser will help me and my wife register for the insurance plan with the deadline approaching in 2014. I am sorry to say that this did not help so please stay away from this TV. I will be returning this and with the money will buy some monster truck toys to overcome the frustration.

Reviews.Title: Thank you, Samsung!
Reviews.Author: Tracy Hamilton "Tracy Hamilton"
Reviews.Content: I was blown away by this television. I turned on the nature channel and it was like I was actually outside enjoying a hike, but in a controlled climate and without actually having to walk around. I may never leave my couch again.

Reviews.Title: Best tv money can buy! Totally Worth it!!!!!! I just absolutely love it! So real!
Reviews.Author: Stephen Pallotta
Reviews.Content: best tv yet. to bad no one can afford it... but well worth it! To bad it cost my right lung...

Reviews.Title: Nice rig
Reviews.Author: BeachcomberBum
Reviews.Content: I ordered this unit in my ongoing quest to extract every morsel of joy out of my favourite work: the Beachcombers. This 70's Canadian classic is, I think the test of time has proven, the pinnacle of visual and sonic achievement in film and TV, and should be the considered the benchmark to which any other work, classic or contemporary, be measured, at least technically, if not (though certainly arguably) artistically. And let me tell you, you ain't lived until you've seen Relic deliver his stuff on this 85" Sammy. Every rogue strand of wool on his ragged stocking cap dancing in the wind like a rookie Vegas showgirl, every crease in his wind swept face coming alive in glorious harmony with the emotional wreckage of the lines being delivered. I currenly run a 17" Magnavox and seeing it outclassed to this degree is something I didn't think i'd live to see. My top-loading Video Cassette Recorder has a new soul mate. Bravo, Samsung. Bravo.

Reviews.Title: Changed my life....
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: I couldn't ask for a better TV... This TV has changed my life, after getting the Black Friday deal for $5000 dollars off, I couldn't say no!This TV looks so nice next to my Sega Genesis in my trailer in the forest ( of course, I can't actually play due to no power) but hey selling my house was worth it! I can stare all day long at how awesome it looks when it doesn't play anything.  Thank you Samsung for showing me the light!!

Reviews.Title: A Possesion Worthy of the 1%
Reviews.Author: carson
Reviews.Content: We just love our quaint $40,000 television.  Sure, we don't really have anything to connect to it, but when you're wealthy sometimes just having something is enough.  Besides - none of our neighbours have one yet, which is an added bonus.  Be warned: this item will make your neighbors jealous.  For example, the other day, while being fanned with palm leaves and eating grapes as I lay on my imported mink rug, one of my servants claimed he saw a neighbour peering at this puppy through one of the windows in our all-transparent-aluminum house.  I'm sure it's only a matter of time before they figure out how to get one of their own.

Reviews.Title: Samsung TV is going back to the future!
Reviews.Author: Jesse M Guajardo
Reviews.Content: I read that you can put Samsung Evolution Kit on this tv making it last forever with its updates.  I didn't think twice after that.  I ran to my local bank and got a mortgage on it with 15 year payment plan.  I opted for that instead of the traditional 30 year mortgage so that I can save on interest.  This tv will give us hours upon hours of family entertainment.  Thank you Samsung for continuing to make everything larger than life!  I just hope that Amazon carries the plutonium I need to run it.  It requires just one container of it to fuel the 1.21 gigawatts of power it needs to power on.

Reviews.Title: Really economical - saves me tons of monthly off the electric bill!
Reviews.Author: Morrigan Alexandros "The Opinionated Me"
Reviews.Content: I have been looking for a tv that is economical in terms of energy consumption. I just can't deal with astronomical electricity bills anymore. When I saw this TV and the specs, I was delighted. it is really economical to use. The estimated yearly cost is $55. But, since the TV is on all the time on the fireplace channel, well....it is a bit more than that. But, it is still saving me a lot more than regular television sets.With all those savings I can now run my snow machine 24/7 in the summer months and my sunshine and tropical weather machine in the winter months. Life is good.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for the Cabin
Reviews.Author: Papaw Jeff
Reviews.Content: Needed an inexpensive small TV for the cabin at the lake in Austria.This one is really great, great clarity on the picture and it really brings in the details of everything so clear.The 85 inch screen size is amazing....Are you ready for some football?

Reviews.Title: It's Obvious - SDM!
Reviews.Author: Timothy J. Lavalli "Tim Lavalli"
Reviews.Content: I am shocked to find with all of the tongue-in-cheek reviews that no one has taken the time to point out the obvious benefits of owning such a unique entertainment item. After all it's been known for centuries - Size Does Matter.

Reviews.Title: Very Satisfactory
Reviews.Author: Brian K. Grant
Reviews.Content: I could barely see anything on my 60" LCD as I lounge at my indoor salt water infinity pool. I thought about buying three more 60" tv's and merging the pictures, but my electrician came down with colon cancer (I fired him having to wait 30 seconds of not responding to my text). After pondering the potential purchase while receiving my daily foot massage from Isabela (plus drinking a few vintage 1775 Pino Noirs from my 37,000 SF wine cellar), it sounded like a good idea. Since my Apple stock went up 1 point, I received enough capital gaines to buy this television so decided to do so. My Regal and statuesque Hungarian Vizsla obviously fell in love when I was watching animal planet while snacking on some French cheese. I decided to buy 7 more 4k Ultras for my movie room and it's quite delightful.

Reviews.Title: best TV ever
Reviews.Author: Cormac Brady
