Reviews.Content: Bought this on a credit card. what could go wrong?How do you turn it on?i think i need some batteries

Reviews.Title: Gullah Gullah Island
Reviews.Author: mgm
Reviews.Content: Why is this television so big and so expensive? Is this actually for sale?If so, please upgrade to a 434 inch television. Thanks.

Reviews.Title: Your not SUPPOSED to have it, peasant!
Reviews.Author: CNILE
Reviews.Content: This, much like Spotted Owl for did-din, simply isn't for those of you unfortunates of the peasant class. You are all simply too stupid to appreciate the quality of picture. It's for those of us that rule you, you see-so get back on your pitiful little Lear Jet and go home to your miserable little life. And don't forget to pay your taxes, now.

Reviews.Title: great!
Reviews.Author: Rit
Reviews.Content: Love this TV and Samsung! I sold my spot in line for the new IPhone over at at&t.; Thank you at&t; customer for my new TV!

Reviews.Title: You can find the Samsung UN85S9 cheaper at Costco.
Reviews.Author: Trick
Reviews.Content: My good friend Norm got one at Costco. You see, Norm has an exclusive membership card. And with that card, Norm gets access to the whole place. Norm can buy large quantities of anything at discount prices.I thought anyone can get one of those cards but Norm was pretty adamant about how he didn't think so.  Good news is that Norm says he can talk to someone, if I like so once I get a hold of a Costco membership I plan to buy a UN85S9 myself.

Reviews.Title: Deal
Reviews.Author: Laura
Reviews.Content: Wow!  $39,997 down from $44, 999!  Now that's a bargain!!  I'll just sell my kidney!  Then I'll have something nice to watch during my recovery!

Reviews.Title: I Would Sell My Butt Hole for this
Reviews.Author: NeedABigOne
Reviews.Content: This looks soo sexy, i really want it. What i would do just to watch some classic topless darts on this tv. Anyone want to help my buy this? I am willing to do anything!P.S bring the Lube!

Reviews.Title: FIRST
Reviews.Author: Winston Penmanship
Reviews.Content: FIRST.Only rating two stars. Picture quality is fantastic, much better than the quality of my own life. However, I was only able to keep 2 out of the 5 drones it took to deliver this massive porn watching machine. Thus, the reason for 2 out of 5 stars.Would definitely recommend this item to a friend or enemy.Have a blessed day, Samsung!

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Evan Glisson
Reviews.Content: This is exactly what I needed! This thing more than compensates for the size of my penis! Now I can't wait to bring my dates home!Thank you, Samsung!!

Reviews.Title: Pretty decent TV, but...
Reviews.Author: Fortyseven
Reviews.Content: Got it last week.  It's nice enough, but the damned thing arrived with 5 dead pixels out of the box.  Tried to RMA it, but Samsung said I had to have at least 8 dead pixels before they would take it back.Considering taking a needle and poking out a couple of them by hand.  (Shh!)

Reviews.Title: Thank Goodness for One-Click Purchase!
Reviews.Author: Abby
Reviews.Content: We are so glad to get one of the three left in stock of these magnificent TV that is $5,000.00 off right now!  Without the one-click purchase, we wouldn't think that we could get a unit of this right a way.  We didn't want to wait another day so we had it shipped the next day and paid the $4.00 additional charge.  This made watching my daughter's Mickey Mouse Clubhouse show more enjoyable!

Reviews.Title: Hold up!
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: I was just about to click "Add to Cart", when I noticed this particular model only features a 120Hz refresh rate.Is there a 240Hz version available in the $125,000 ballpark?

Reviews.Title: And porn has been made better
Reviews.Author: jared hughes
Reviews.Content: You know how they say watching too much porn makes you go blind? Now everywhere I go all I see are double D's that have been burned into my retinas by 85 inches of samsung. Pro tip: duck the money shot or take off the 3D glasses. I learned that the hard way, hence the -1 star.PSThe size of this TV has made me feel extremely insecure about the size of my... bedroom TV. Definitely need another one of these.

Reviews.Title: Available to the have nots?
Reviews.Author: Mark Webb
Reviews.Content: I was extremely disappointed to see that this product is available to the general public. That lowers the value of this product tremendously. If Amazon could create a site called prime elite and only offer this product to those of us privileged enough to be invited that would be great. Then Mitt Romney and I could shop knowing we are not putting our money in the same market as everyone else.

Reviews.Title: On sale?
Reviews.Author: Krzysztof Bogdanowicz
Reviews.Content: I'm giving 3 stars because im not a commoner. I don't look for sales. I expect things to be full price. Thankyou amazon for insulting my $45, 000 wallet. The picture isn't even real definition, it's just high definition. All the poor people who make less then a million a year have hd tvs. I mean come on lol, they drive themselves to work how middle ages.

Reviews.Title: Good enough for the like of Louis XIV, but not for me
Reviews.Author: Blue6
Reviews.Content: It does not handle the insolent daylight intruding through my crystal glass mansion walls adequately!  We do however adore the wide selection of SPO channels (special people only).  The remote sucks.Threw it away.  Won't go cheap ever again!

Reviews.Title: Samsung or bust
Reviews.Author: goldila
Reviews.Content: Wow after reading everyone's reviews I just had to have this TV....at any cost.  I decided to make a deal with the devil himself and give him my first newborn except I went into menopause about 10 years ago.  Well, that's the price one has to pay for being motherless.  I'll just have to muddle thru this miserable life with my 40 inch TV.  Sometimes life is just so unfair.

Reviews.Title: HUGE (tiny) Disappointment!
Reviews.Author: HAL 9000
Reviews.Content: Can't get a view from outer space whilst careening intergalactic space shuttle. Nice try, Samsung #FAIL #PitifulEarthlings #yousuck >-pHAL9000

Reviews.Title: Poor Audio...
Reviews.Author: Roving Reader
Reviews.Content: I wasn't very impressed with the audio of this unit, so, I decided to ramp things up a bit. To start, good speaker wire is a must. At the amazing price of $48,000.00, two strands of these ( Wireworld Platinum Eclipse Biwired Speaker ) 6 meters each was short of my needs so I ordered three sets. The drivers I decided on were these beauties ( Waterfall Audio Niagara Standing Loudspeakers )  that $39,393.71 a pair which, of coarse, I ordered two. To crunch enough power into these bad boys, I used this beast! ( Klipsch THX Ultra2 TX NR3010 Elite 20 ) At only $12974.00, I couldn't pass it up.The next challenge that I faced was another wiring issue. Since most of the units at our trailer park are wired with only 100 amp service panels, I worked with Earl, Junior and Darlene to jump all of our systems together in a quasi parallel/series set-up that keeps the extension cords to a minimal running through the puddles on the 'round-a-bout'.Another challenge overcome was getting this monster in the park. The semi and forklift that delivered it couldn't get further than the dumpsters, so, moved Ray's trailer while he was at work and backed in in from that snazzy neighborhood next door that has them home-owners bi-laws. We got the privacy fence back up before the cops got there and the only proof of our so-called 'trespassing' was the giant muddy ruts left through them folks yard. Since all of us are... well... retired, and home that day as 'witnesses', the police are still looking for that maniac in the dump truck that made the turn around in those peoples yard. The only damage done, well, besides the ruts, was the three sago palms that got 'bumped'.... oh.. and that fancy sprinkler system got a couple of lines broke... oh, and now their sewer backs up because the drain fields got crushed a little.Now, I bet you're wondering why I ordered an extra pair of them speaker cables when I only ordered four speakers...huh? Well, I had to use them other two cable to keep my girlfriend Cherry from gettin' loose. She was a little concerned after her old man showed up wondering about the address that showed up on his credit card when this stuff was delivered. Well, to say the least, nobody's gotta worry about him snoopin' around anymore! Hehee!! Remember that movie Deliverance? Oh yeah! Squeal like a pig boy! Squeal like a pig!!Anyhow, after all the trouble gettin' that thing in the yard, we found out that it would fit in the door. Simple solution! We sawsalled the aluminum off the end of the old domicile and just mounted that thing to the end of the trailer! No worry about being exposed to rain and such. We just split the box open that it was delivered in and used it to extended the roof out over this beautiful creature. Earl had the best idea... He said we oughta mount it on swivels. That way, we can just spin it around and show movies outside and charge admission. The only problem we had was figuring a easy way to move all the sound equipment outside, but, that kinda took care of itself. The first time we powered them babies up, all the windows blew in the mobile home, so, problem solved! That also took care of a few of the pesky pit bulls that had been running loose in the neighborhood. The biggest problem I had was calming Cherry down over the stains when all of her cats went boo boo at the same time and then my Rottweiler, Crusty, got a little confused with all the racket. She's still a little miffed about them cats, but, at least it got her mind off of her old life with that pasty feller that she had been living off of. His new boyfriend didn't want her hanging around anymore....So, all in all... once the mods were in place, the neighbors and I are all pretty impressed with this little set-up. There's been a little wrangling with the uppity crowd from the neighborhood next door, but, once we drive the property values down enough, we got a man that's good with something called CRA's... community reinvestment act loans or something like that. We should be able to get enough to purge the area of them undesirables and them we can get the state to come in and bull doze them houses and make room for a whole slew of 'modular homes'. We'll be raking in the cash with all the proceeds from the 'theater'!Three thumbs up on this one!!!

Reviews.Title: This is a great tv.
Reviews.Author: Joseph W. Van Meter "xerohero"
Reviews.Content: I recently filed a frivolous lawsuit against a major chair retailer who's name rhymes with ballfart. Walking down the aisle I saw what looked like a puddle of sweat (probably from one of their overworked/ underpaid employees)  I took immediate action and pretended to slip and fall in this unknown substance. While laying there I had my wife go find a manager and call my lawyer setting in motion what I can justifiably call the greatest purchase I have ever made. Now I have a second mortgage on my house until the case goes through the courts, but once its done I will have house and everything paid off....Oh yeah this is the life.

Reviews.Title: No ceiling mounts?
Reviews.Author: David Dunseath
Reviews.Content: This TV was a great purchase. I bought it because it would easily fit the 35x69 high-res photos that I used to keep taped to my ceiling without having to worry about any silly letterbox formatting or resizing the photos, but I find myself highly disappointed. With a TV of this caliber and price you would think someone at Samsung would have thought about adding hanging mounts that can be used to transistion to a ceiling installation. I know I'm not the first person to think about this and I'm honestly disgusted more people havent spoken up with their disappointment. C'mon Samsung!  If I'm going to spend this kind of money on a TV to mount above my bed, at least throw in the 4 dollar brackets, jerks.  -Mustang Fan

Reviews.Title: Sing-along wif Samsung
Reviews.Author: J Andrew Tybor
Reviews.Content: The glare was too great, so we painted a Budweiser logo in the middle.  We now feel compelled to drink whenever we watch Spongebob.

Reviews.Title: Buyer Beware!
Reviews.Author: RichZ
Reviews.Content: OK, I had this delivered to the local Amazon Locker so I could pick it up after I returned from the metal recyclers.FIRST PROBLEM: nowhere on website did Amazon mention this TV won's fit in the back of a 2013 Cadillac Escalade!!SECOND PROBLEM: Once I finally found a friend with a flatbed truck, it would not fit through the door of my Section 8 welfare apartment!THIRD INSULT TO INJURY PROBLEM: It did not include the cables to connect the digital satellite dish!

Reviews.Title: I bought 48 of these Ultra HD TV to recreate Tom Cruise's Oblivion Sky Loft!
Reviews.Author: jambaj0e "Joe"
Reviews.Content: I recently saw the behind-the-scenes of that fantabuloustic Tom Cruise movie, Oblivion. Turns out that  they surrounded his entire "sky loft" with giant screens and projected the cloudscape unto it. ([...]That gave me a brilliant idea to do the same to my 1st story apartment. The first step was getting rid off all the pesky drywall surrounding my apartment, which was difficult to do without my apartment manager knowing. Once I pulled that off, I promptly sold the excess drywall material to the local construction company and made enough money to buy 48 of these Samsung 4K Ultra HDs. Woohoo!So after a week of non-stop installation, I have finally surrounded my entire apartment with the Ultra HD TVs and I could finally look out in any direction and see nothing clouds just like Tom Cruise did in Oblivion.There was only one problem, though. People outside can see the back of all of those TVs, which worries me. So now I have 48 more Ultra HD tvs on order so I can install them facing out to the streets. These TV will display my old drywall so no one will be the wiser. Hehehe!

Reviews.Title: no more moon
Reviews.Author: Babs
Reviews.Content: I rated it okay because it has a great display, and I loved the reasonable price! the only down side to this product, is I had to sell my yacht, my gold mine in Asia, and a 1/4 of the moon :( Butler, more edible diamond! NOW!

Reviews.Title: Don't just buy one!!
Reviews.Author: zk4
Reviews.Content: I recently moved to Cleveland from Florida.  My wife and I miss the year round Florida sun.  So we bought 40 of these and replaced all of our windows. With that, $25k of wiring, and a MacBook pro and we are looking at nothing but ocean views from every room and we have yet to miss a sunset.  Thinking of replacing the windows in my car too.  My daily drive is quite unsightly.  Now all we need is a good tv for the family room.

Reviews.Title: Why buy one when you buy three?
Reviews.Author: John Strawberryfieldsforever
Reviews.Content: I can tell you that this T V was worth it at twice the price so I bought two at SAMs Club for the price of three. It's okay though. I donated one to the starving kids in Nigeria or is it Mississippi? I really don't recall, but it was a great tax write off. Then I ran outta room for the second one and as luck would have, I had a big party and as luck would have it, it made a great table and conversation piece. Cheers

Reviews.Title: I recommend you get one...
Reviews.Author: John Mano
Reviews.Content: ....IF YOU'RE A DIRT-EATING POOR GUY! Wow ok unless you're getting three of these bad boys don't bother looking at this page.

Reviews.Title: Kicking myself
Reviews.Author: Shrode
Reviews.Content: I just saw this TV for the affordable price of $40,000...I would have jumped at the chance, if only I hadn't just spent it on a ornate little jar, containing Michael Jacksons testicles! (And yes...one of them is still black.)

Reviews.Title: Great in the living room but too big for the can.
Reviews.Author: T.A. "Vizulefllry"
Reviews.Content: And in conclusion.....I purchased 4 of these.  One for the living room and one for each of my 3 bathrooms.  One is a half bath but only now that the t.v took the place of the bath.In the living room the picture is spectacular.  With 5 ft from couch to t.v. it is about all you can see.  In the bathrooms though the clarity is not the best.  In each bathroom the t.v. is about 3 ft from the "seat."  Due to the close distance you can see each pixel on the screen, you experience motion blur, and you have to turn your neck to almost 90 degrees to see the sides of the screen.I still give it 5 stars.  If not for my need to have the largest screen available on the market, and to watch television while taking care of business, it would look great.

Reviews.Title: Just buy it!
Reviews.Author: Boltach
Reviews.Content: Remember the scene in back to the future when Marty gets blown away by the speaker...same happened to me! I turned the thing on and turned up the volume to 1000 and next thing I know, I am in the next room! Definitely worth the money!

Reviews.Title: Buying this TV got my friend Bill off my back
Reviews.Author: Jay T
Reviews.Content: He's been telling me for years that I needed a larger TV. Here you go, smartypants. Now bring your truck over and lets haul out the kids' bedroom furniture to make room for the thing. And while you're here, mister handyman, let's see you knock down that wall. Thanks, Bill, I've always trusted your advice.

Reviews.Title: I just bought a ps4 on ebay for 21,000 #winning
Reviews.Author: Vito Cafarelli
Reviews.Content: I will wait in line at target for next black friday sale to get this and the new Pad AIr 2.. hopefully they will have more than just 3 in stock

Reviews.Title: The "girls" love it!
Reviews.Author: Celeste
Reviews.Content: My "girls" like to unwind after a long day by watching their friends perform on the Spice channel on this larger-than-life screen.  They pooled their money for a whole week in order to buy it (instead of lottery tickets).

Reviews.Title: Starlifters, bums and glory.
Reviews.Author: nuclearchainsaw
Reviews.Content: I saw this TV on TV and had to have it.  Unbeknownst to me, upon delivery in a C-141 (door-to-door I might add) and shortly after my lawn was torn to pieces by said Starlifter, I was shocked to find that this was 85 inches...obviously in hindsight this was due to the fact that I only saw 50" of it on my 50" tv and assumed I had seen it all  (ZING!).Regardless, I have no idea what to do with the extra 35" and can't get it into my door, so I set up shop in the box it came in and I'm  wondering how in the eff I'm going to get this into my crib.  I'm now the swaggiest cat in the nut-house.

Reviews.Title: Workin it 4 cash
Reviews.Author: Victor Forsythe
Reviews.Content: I told my wife we could not afford this but she insisted we can not afford to live without it. She agreed to make the extra cash we need by pulling tricks here on Colfax when its not too cold to show her legs and flash her tits. I haven't told her this yet but a previous customer is giving me tips as to where to sell her slutty ass for cash.

Reviews.Title: Gave an arm, a leg, and my brother's body for this
Reviews.Author: Steve M II
Reviews.Content: This TV was well worth the price I paid for it. Sure I had to have a automail arm and leg installed and my brother is forever in a suit of armor, but the color on this TV is unreal! I thought I would never see something like this ever since my vist to the gate the other day. It's like you have an eletronic window to the outside world. The color looks so real, it's almost like it's not a TV at all. I reccomend using money for getting this though because equvilant exchange doesn't always work 100% of the time.

Reviews.Title: A grand time
Reviews.Author: Television Enthusiest Paul
Reviews.Content: After recieving my annual bonus from Freddie Mac, I decided to purchase a few things.I decided upon purchasing 4 of these televisions so that I could closely monitor my Football Fantasy Exhibitions. I had recently purchased a Football Fantasy team off of a colleague, obtaining a Tom Brady and the entire New Orleans Saints Defensive squadron for a measily $5,000.These television sets have been wonderous at displaying First Downs, Red Zones, and the occasional Half Time, while giving me the ability to talk to a Television set rather than my butler.

Reviews.Title: I would give it 5 stars, but . . .
Reviews.Author: Big Sky Dreams "Big Sky"
Reviews.Content: Full Disclosure: I have not purchased this TV yet...I am glad Amazon reduced the price by $5000, I now only have to save for 23.4 more years instead of 26.8, so that's a pro.Now to the cons:1: I would have to hire window washers to come out and squeegee clean once a month(I'm not getting on one of those motorized scaffolds!)2: My neighbors steal my cable as it is, now they could just record my shows on an HD camera or 'Google Earth' AND be able to playback and skip commercials like they paid for a DVR!3: By the time I take delivery of this, the SAMSUNG Ai960Si9000 960-inch Holographic Interactive LED-Laser Light 8K Ultrasupreme HD 480Hz 4D Self-Aware and Smarter than you TV will come out. (or H.I.L.L. TV {because a hill is the only place you can view it from})4: My wife gives me 'evil-eye' whenever she catches me glancing at the poster I have of this beauty on my wall. (By the way, she is totally against me purchasing this TV, something about the price of a luxury car, college fund, and retirement; what-evs...)5: Their are some unconfirmed reports and vague stories claiming that it is actually a portal to 'The Underverse'. (Whatever that is; not a deal-breaker for me though)6: My wife really hates this thing!!(see #4)7: I have already received cease and desist letters from the lawyers representing the only drive-in theatre here. They are worried I would hurt their profits and that I am even considering this thing! But I told them not to worry, you will still enjoy 23.4 more years of profits. (Unless that 960" H.I.L.L. TV comes out between now and then, then they will be screwed)

Reviews.Title: recycling @ it's finest
Reviews.Author: vickie l neuhalfen
Reviews.Content: Truthfully we got it so we could get the guys from Tanked to make us an aquarium. I mean....who wants fat fish... that is just.....ewwwww......this keeps them slim and @ Christmas we manage to get an electronic yule log in the bottom....the sparks are quite lovely.  Also the slim box makes a great home for the skinny street people. they don't have to worry about the semi homeless fatties trying to take it over2

Reviews.Title: $55 Per Year to Operate?!!?
Reviews.Author: Po
Reviews.Content: I knew this TV was too good be to be true.  This is an outrage, I tell you!  An outrage!

Reviews.Title: Simply out of This World !!
Reviews.Author: Mukul Sabhani
Reviews.Content: I Don't believe they just put 5 stars for this TV, A Minimum of 11 were absolutely required....especially when I just sold my Kidney to buy this Fabulous TV.There were many organs but i preferred Kidney....Awesome Experience & Awesome TV !!Thumbs up Samsung & Amazon :)

Reviews.Title: What a Great Product!
Reviews.Author: Brandon De Paulis
Reviews.Content: I sold my entire extended family in order to afford this, but let me tell you, WORTH IT. Never seen a TV with such quality! Definitely worth full price.

Reviews.Title: BEST PORN QUALITY EVERRR!!
Reviews.Author: Frank Le
Reviews.Content: I get to watch my "PORN" SUPER CLEAR NOW!!!!!!!!!!!!!! WOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO.. i gotta call my friends to come and watch it with me

Reviews.Title: Love some ping pong
Reviews.Author: stainer4ever
Reviews.Content: I bought this for the sole purpose of turning it sideways to play ping pong. Also buying it used saved me 9 grand!

Reviews.Title: Could be better
Reviews.Author: duane
Reviews.Content: Save your money Samsung has a 87" supra ultra XD LED TV coming out next week for only $10000 more.

Reviews.Title: Samsung's 'S-Recommendation' feature is amazing
Reviews.Author: Tex
Reviews.Content: I was skeptical that a feature claiming to allow you to "talk to your TV"" would work that well; but as the TV was under $40,000 this was a chance I was willing to take.I eagerly unpacked the TV and placed it against the larger wall of my apartment. I can report the TV does indeed listen, and even react when it hears my voice. It is really nice to have someone to talk to since mother moved out.

Reviews.Title: Death Star is now complete...with THIS!
Reviews.Author: Rich
Reviews.Content: After almost exhausting almost all funds in the empire's treasury, and after the first explosive attack from the rebel alliance, our second battlestation is now almost fully operational. However, I needed a device to entertain me during my downtime after training my apprentice and planning my attack on the moons of Endor. What is an Emperor to do?! Thankfully Samsung has created the ultimate Television Device in all the Galaxy. Though shipping was not free to send it so far far away, I was pleased when it arrived the same time young Skywalker entered my chambers. Now my apprentice and his son can enjoy programming on Netflix and 3D movies. I wonder if his sister will join us…~Senator Palpatine, Supreme Ruler of the Galactic Empire, ESQ.

Reviews.Title: Bitcoin help me buy my wife back!
Reviews.Author: HailTopher
Reviews.Content: I wanted to take my entertainment to a whole new level. No regrets.Trying to pay off the debt so that I can buy my wife back.Please donate... anything will help. 17cnK22myHzZiEa94Pjj6Zf29GF46KE4w5

Reviews.Title: WHOA!
Reviews.Author: Right To Bear Arms
Reviews.Content: I decided to purchase this tv but I was a little short on cash. I decided to sell some non essential body parts and dropped the cash. I got home from the hospital and set this bad boy up and man let me tell you it's huge! After set up I realized I was all alone and decided to put in some porn. When the movie played I got scared when I saw a four foot vagina and returned it!

Reviews.Title: TV for Body Parts!
Reviews.Author: John McCarron
Reviews.Content: We recently became the proud owners of this tv after swapping one of my kidneys with the previous owner I met on craigslist. He was having a hard time seeing the screen and was looking for something a bit bigger.Since then, I have loved it!!! While going through dialysis, its great to watch. The only problem is I recently called Comcast to get HD service installed, but they were not willing to install it for a testicle. Thankfully Verizon is planning to hood me up once they receive my left eye.I fully recommend all you with extra parts put them to good use and start watching tv the way it was meant to be watched, outside in the backyard!

Reviews.Title: thought i got a great tv and all i got was this stupid spaceship
Reviews.Author: Cat Gee Photography
Reviews.Content: not long after setting up our new tv, it started letting out these strange signals, transformed into a vessel, and burst through the roof. we quit paying homeowner's insurance because the tv left us a little broke for a couple months and this was the last thing we expected to happen in such a short window of time. not worth the risk

Reviews.Title: Nice set.
Reviews.Author: Forrest
Reviews.Content: Picture is very clear. Probably my favorite TV to date. I set it up in front of our bay window overlooking the ocean. Since we lost the view, I purchased a 4K camera, connected it to the set, and aimed it at the horizon. The live sunsets on TV are almost as good as the real thing!

Reviews.Title: Soylent Green is PEOPLE!!
Reviews.Author: Steve Weston
Reviews.Content: The video feed from the Soylent Green facility is amazingly beautiful in this resolution. The colors are so vibrant.. and those flowers are right...right...th...there...

Reviews.Title: It's 3D!
Reviews.Author: Uncle Boop
Reviews.Content: When my tv arrived I was surprised to find I could walk all the way around it like it was right there in the room with me! Total 3D.The 4K picture is so clear, I'm actually a little disappointed with reality now. Should have it paid off in 2032.

Reviews.Author: Lhd8MWR
Reviews.Content: Ok ppl, maybe if you go diagonal you can get 85 full on inches...but who wants long and skinny?! I want thick and full, I mean, heck, ask any woman which is better. Plus, only 14 HDMI inputs. That's BS.

Reviews.Title: Bah, Samsung!
Reviews.Author: photoflyer
Reviews.Content: I am not satisfied with my Samsung clothes dryer--the lint filter doesn't work properly.  I have to go outdoors every week and clean the exhaust, a horrible job!--so why would I buy another Samsung product?

Reviews.Title: Nice television.
Reviews.Author: seth
Reviews.Content: The picture in picture is bigger then my previous television. Price is well worth the convenience. May need to take down a wall to make it fit, but the contractor doesn't think he can get the building permits?!? May have to set it up diagonally in the theater room. On the plus side it makes my 4 bedroom house in to 5, and any increase in my home's market value will partially off set the cost of this TV.

Reviews.Title: Extra Help on Sunday's
Reviews.Author: Andy Loeb
Reviews.Content: I installed the Samsung UN85S9 85-Inch 4K Ultra HD 120Hz 3D Smart LED TV, as an extra unit in my bathroom to watch the Cleveland Browns play on Sunday.  Lets just say my pregame ritual has really come to life with the 3D technology and the onboard high 120 CFM exhaust fan really clears the air quickly.

Reviews.Title: Just fantastic
Reviews.Author: joe m
Reviews.Content: I love watching movies and tv on the go! But ever since att got rid of my unlimited data it has become so expensive!! So I cleverly invested in this giant tv. I placed it on the top floor of my home, right in front of a Bay Window I had installed specifically for this tv. Now instead of racking up those data charges I just flip on the tv and BAM! I CAN WATCH IT FROM ANYWHERE!!

Reviews.Title: So real I can smell the food on the cooking channel!
Reviews.Author: chompers
Reviews.Content: This baby is totally worth the price.  I am an amateur-professional chef.  Obviously I need crystal clear clarity to make sure I'm making those foods right.  Being off by one grain of salt can ruin the entire dish.  This TV was a MUST for me.And boy was I glad I sold my second kidney.  The food looks so real I just pass it off as my own.  Bonus feature: the Smell-O-Vision.  You can SMELL the food too.  TWO THUMBS UP.  Just make sure if you're going to watch something like Hoarders that you wear a gas mask first.Cannot stop singing my praises about this product!

Reviews.Title: You Are My Sunshine
Reviews.Author: Youngblood
Reviews.Content: Good Lourdes, Your eyes are about to PISS tears when you look upon this magnificent display. I used to be A loner. A rebel. A movie theater masturbator now I can do this in the comfort of my own rocking chair.What is wrong with my chair? Why is it soaking wet?

Reviews.Title: Jeff BonerA made me buy this
Reviews.Author: Jemhaul Ginsberg
Reviews.Content: After growing up in a household where my mom is African American and my dad is a descendent of Israel. so I was torn on what to do when I saw this TV. My mother always thought me to spend every dime that I have and my dad still had his Bar Mitzvah money when he turned 83. So I decided to get a job at Samsung and I stole one of these bad boys from the warehouse and I couldn't be happier with the 4k resolution I can see the blood in the diamonds while browsing the pictures of my mothers wedding ring! Thanks samsung for the opportunity to own this without paying for it even though it would be a drop in the bucket.

Reviews.Title: ORGASMIC
Reviews.Author: RC
Reviews.Content: AMAZING!!!!! to say the least, its like sex but i'm having the pleasure of watching it. There aren't words that can describe such piece of equipment but I'll attempt to capture all its majesty. OVERPRICED, I had as much fun with the box using my IMAGINATION as I did watching it but wait it gets better. I never turned it on because of course you need a home for that. In short i still have my dignity nope double checked also left that at the register.

Reviews.Title: Three Wolves Moon: meet your match
Reviews.Author: Chillin
Reviews.Content: I can only wear my Three Wolves Moon t-shirt when watching this TV. The awesome power of this TV is so immense, that I could only withstand it's awesomeness while wearing my Three Wolves Moon t-shirt. I think they have a deal, if you buy both at the same time.

Reviews.Title: Amazing product that has improved my life.
Reviews.Author: Brandon Reardin
Reviews.Content: Awesome TV! Because of this purchase, I have been able to help those poor little piggies to fly, found a cure for all of the world's disease, establish a utopian society just off the coast of California, and have even brought an end to the cold winters in the Antarctic. You're welcome penguins!

Reviews.Title: My personal pilots love them
Reviews.Author: Bruno
Reviews.Content: I had purchased two of these Tv's for my personal B787 last month; reason being because my two personal pilots (Gregorio and Helga) would have nothing to do in the cocpit after i had ordered the installation of autonomous flight. I know i should have just fired them, but who wants to fly in a plane with no pilots on-board? Anyway, they love the way the screens portray the outside envoronment after the windows had to be taken out and blocked with normal metal (how else would a UAV look). They seem to be working up to par, who can beat 4k resolution 2 feet away?Because of the TV's 5,000 discount i will be ordering one more soon for my daughter's temporary beach house while she studies at university.

Reviews.Title: The Batcave Never Looked Better!
Reviews.Author: Luis A Cortez
Reviews.Content: As a shopper for ultra-rich millionaires, I find myself always thinking outside the box, but now I can't even LOOK outside the box of this maaaaasive 85" screen! Batsie will have no problem using his voice commands and gestures as he scours the city for the Joker. And with a resolution that is Ultra HD, even Robin's tiresome same ol' rhetoric seems fresh and new as he can now accurately make inane comments like, "Holy mobile crime wave, Batman, is that a Samsung Galaxy Note III he is sporting?" I am absolutely sure to get a holiday bonus as 40K is chump change to a guy like Bru...er...my client. Heck, he may order all three! You better get one before he cleans out this steal!

Reviews.Title: I bet you wish you had 85 inches!
Reviews.Author: Eugene R Clement
Reviews.Content: Wow, it's like having a movie theater in your home! True colors and incredible sound. Yes,is the ultimate man cave addition!  My only caveat is the sacrifices that I had to make to my wife in order to get permission to purchase this holy grail. So, grab a beer, take a seat and see if you'd be so brave! I must have been in some sort of trance as I nooded  yes to all of her demands. My first clue should have been when she walked into the room with her sexy teddy and handed me a glass of wine. Must of been the lack of blood to my brain! Anyway, demands please! I could only watch football on Sunday. You'd think that this would be a deal breaker, but did I mention the teddy! Next, I had to promise to do something with my wife that she likes to  do once a week. She's funny,sexy and athletic so, why not. She grins and precedes to tell me that she's decided to train for a marathon! Next, she tells me that she's throwing away the batteries to all her toys and putting me on notice. She says that I should practice the alphabet to get in shape. Hum, I guess she's hinting that I will be having less alone time. Yes, that teddy. Next, I must go shopping with her once a month. You'd think that this wouldn't be a big deal but did you ever go shopping for clothes with the opposite sex. She precedes to tell me that dressing rooms have fringe benefits too! I'm feeling light headed again.. Next, my chores can't be compromised because I'm spending to much time  in my man cave, there goes that grin again!  Next, the wife is allowed use of the man cave once a week. I guess to watch Nashville. Only fair I suppose. Update: So, I've had the tv for about two months now and  I'm sure smiling a lot more now but damn it if I'm not watching much tv! The wife grins again minus the teddy of course....

Reviews.Title: Scrape Out My Eyes
Reviews.Author: hilts
Reviews.Content: I just watched The Brown Bunny on this set. Good Jeebus. Everything is so big. I don't like it, make it stop.

Reviews.Title: Not better than healthcare.
Reviews.Author: I_Rogue
Reviews.Content: Loved the TV, but once the Affordable Care Act kicked in, I lost my health insurance and my sponging 26 year old kid needed his heart fixed.  It was either the spoiled 26 year old man who can't take care of himself or the TV.  So I returned the TV,  paid the small $8000 restocking fee and was eventually able to get an approved Bronze care plan with a $32,000 deductible from the government healthcare website.  Can't believe the site actually worked.  Just my luck.  So, in the end, it was basically a wash.  Thanks Obama.Update:BTW, my young man is fine now.  (Thank you to those who care)  But, he is really upset his friend Amanda never visited him in the hospital and isn't returning his texts or phone calls.

Reviews.Title: My name is Bryce
Reviews.Author: Hunter
Reviews.Content: I see you people joking about how you think this tv is overpriced. It makes me chuckle. The poor people of the world need to laugh at things out of there reach to cope with there sad pathetic existence. I own 3 of these TV's. One for each house. Excellent picture quality combined with an inexpensive price tag makes my TV worth more than 6 of you. I donate a gallon of my bathwater every month to charity. My essence is worth more than you. I laugh at you plebeians every day.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy
Reviews.Author: Bob Mapplethorpe
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV not only for the outstanding picture quality, but also for the ability to connect to Netflix and Amazon Prime Video.  My previous set (a Westinghouse LED), was not a "smart TV" and I had to use Roku in order to stream Netflix movies.  My only complaint is that sometimes I have to adjust the brightness depending on what I'm watching, but that isn't such a big deal to me.  Overall I am very happy with this product.

Reviews.Title: Help
Reviews.Author: The joker
Reviews.Content: This tv opened up a different realm in my living room. Demons and ghostly figures were starting to take control of my family. I ended up having to return it while the same time trying to find catholic priests to conduct several exorcisms

Reviews.Title: Everything in Life Has Lead up to This!
Reviews.Author: John Kellogg
Reviews.Content: Finally!  It took nearly 30 years and $40,000, but there is FINALLY something that will do justice to my laserdisc copy of Porky's!  Thank you, Samsung!

Reviews.Title: Radiation risk!
Reviews.Author: Duder
Reviews.Content: Be forewarned, the high powered and constant Xray radiation from this high powered device is hazardous to your health.  Since purchasing this poisonous device, I have had to pawn it to start my chemotherapy.  But I have hope... The pawn broker assured me that he would hold it for 3 months for me to come up with the loan repayment.Now all I have to figure out is how to install a lead barrier between this device and my chair, then purchase and install the high bandwidth mirrors to deflect the image from the display around the barriers.  As I take my chemo now, trying to figure out how many mirrors it will take to ensure the picture is not inverted...

Reviews.Title: The disappointment is almost too much to bare
Reviews.Author: dave baldwin
Reviews.Content: It is with utter disappointment that I write this review. When I first saw this masterpiece my gaze was locked on the sheer beauty of what was presented before me. The technological advancement we as a species have achieved by creating an 85 inch 4K ultra HD 120hz 3D Smart LED TV is only second to the ability to display an image of crystal clarity and perfect composition. Look at the magnificent symmetry and complementary nature of a snow covered landscape and cloud draped sky. The lonely tree standing solemnly off to the side clearly representing the human condition left stranded to endure the cold harsh reality of life. A tree desperately trying to achieve success by growing to the sky only to realize the cruel and devastating reality of being firmly tethered to the ground, a powerful metaphor for our trivial human journey. The isolation from all other life only adds to the struggle of this tree's poor existence and reminds us all that our efforts to provide shade to the ones we love is an exercise in heartbreak as the winter of old age will drive away any love or affection as our leaves of purpose wither and die.The $39,997.99 price tag for this piece of art was an absolute bargain, especially when you consider the added benefit of a 4k ultra HD 3D smart LED TV that can be turned off when the emotional toll of staring at such a bitterly truthful scene of melancholy certainty is too much to bare. When I received this gift from GOD only five to eight business days after placing my order, I removed it carefully from its cardboard protective sheath and hung it on my wall, all the time handling it with the care of Mary cuddling the Baby Jesus. You can only imagine my disappointment when I plugged it into the electrical outlet bringing to life a bright blue screen where the words "No Signal" taunted me with the clarity only a 4K Ultra HD 120hz 3D Smart LED TV can provide. The image that so beautifully represented my dismal existence was not to be found.Nothing could hurt me more than this disheartening moment, that was until I called the Samsung customer service department to ask for technical assistance in rendering the digital illustration of my newly acquired masterpiece. They laughed at me. They treated me as if I was an idiot for thinking a manufacturer was somehow responsible to provide a product that would in any way resemble the item pictured in the advertisement.

Reviews.Title: Really bad product!
Reviews.Author: Josie
Reviews.Content: Worst product ever!  I have to give you a bit of background for you to understand that buying this TV was a terrible decision, probably the worst I have ever made!  I have been in a tough economic situation for a while so haven't been able to go to the movies for a long time, even though is my all time favorite past time, but going to the movies is so damn expensive! So I figured as much as I love to go to the movies, it would really save me some big bucks to have this TV at home and bring the movie screen to the comfort of my family room!  After much consideration I decided to purchase this TV and just put it on several credit cards.  Well, I pride myself on my good credit and make all my credit card payments on time but little did I know that not being able to pay the electricity bill, internet and mortgage was going to get me into a bit of a pickle.  So now, when I try to watch TV is all darkness!  It doesn't even turn on!  I've only had it for a couple of months so I did not expect this to happen so soon.  I tried to look up Samsung's customer service number online but the computer doesn't seem to work either!  They always say that bad things happen in threes! I'm planning to take it back to the store as soon as I find my car!

Reviews.Title: serious tv owner
Reviews.Author: Ty Sherrell
Reviews.Content: now, i have read all of these reviews in HOPES of getting a true response to intelligent tv buyers as myself....and to no avail have I found such review. Amazon, you really need to crack down on these review posts.NOW for the review:After much debate and searching for the right tv, i found this on amazon and WOW what a difference it has made in my life. My kids are now NOT going to college nor is my wife even married to me anymore. I lost my home, my car and job after pawning all my things to buy this tv. It IS GREAT being a shield to the sun under the bridge on HWY 75 in Dallas,  my friends (other homeless people) love it! The police have seized said tv in a sting to rid us from the bridges, I am typing this from the public library, wait, no, they dont exist anymore. I am typing this from my mind. lamps. ohhh hot soup.

Reviews.Title: If you live in a home with a loft beware....
Reviews.Author: Gunzen "I like Pie"
Reviews.Content: From what i saw of the T.V. it worked quite well.  Problem is, they don't tell you when the screen is off it is blue, and when folded horizontally it looks remarkably similar a trampoline.  After we get Timmy extracted from the screen, we will be returning it for one with the trampoline warning label.  I don't want this to happen gain. I missed both games on thankgiving.

Reviews.Title: Great TV's, but do lack adequate programming.
Reviews.Author: Arun.
Reviews.Content: Heir to a multinational retail corporation here, (hint: rhymes with Paul-mart), bought about 10 dozen of these to have them installed in several of my mansions, vacation homes, and private jets. So far the experience has been great, but I do have to say there is a lack of adequate programming available at this Ultra HD resolution. Apparently there is not enough public demand for that in the market yet, or so my butler tells. I guess I'm just ahead of the curb when it comes to sophisticated television viewing habits.All praise aside, these will probably be outdated by next fall and need to be replaced. But hey, as long as there are no ridiculous minimum wage increases cutting into my yearly bonuses during the next fiscal year, I should be able to afford replacing my existing fleet with the next 5K Super-Ultra HD series or whatever the dopes over at Samsung have released by then.

Reviews.Title: Too Real
Reviews.Author: WAM "Heard It All"
Reviews.Content: I bought one for the bathroom because I was sick and tired of missing so much of all my favorite TV shows.  The picture, quite frankly, is amazing and I found myself spending hours in the bathroom mesmerized watching some of the sports and nature programming and felt like I was right there.  Unfortunately, when I got up to wipe myself, my legs had no blood, were tingly and I was unable to stand.  So, down I went crashing into the TV and knocking it off the wall.  It's toast.  I ordered two more so that next time this happens I won't have to miss watching my shows while a new one is being delivered by Amazon Prime.  We have 12 bathrooms and eventually they will all have one of these marvelous TVs.  I'm considering adding a new wing of bathrooms to accommodate all of our friends that are constantly dropping in to use the bathroom.

Reviews.Title: Worse mistake I've made... Next to believing a terrorist.
Reviews.Author: scottatrip "Scott"
Reviews.Content: Anticipating the repair of healthcare.gov and the thousands I would be saving... I splurged.Best of all, because of the magnificent, awe-inspiring 85" crisp picture, I was able to not take out an eye care plan... cha ching.So, today I finally got on to the Obamacare site and realized my savings were actually going to cost me $102.79 more per month. Imagine my dismay. I blame Obama for this. If he hadn't told me how awesome his plan was and convinced me I would possibly be making money on this so-called "marketplace", I never would have bought this monstrosity for my double wide.See if I vote for him next time.

Reviews.Title: I will be selling them for $19999.00
Reviews.Author: Michael Thomas
Reviews.Content: I have 7 of them on there way. Brand new in the box for $19999.00 each will have by may 11 th. Reply if your interested.

Reviews.Title: The Porn
Reviews.Author: L. Nicole J. "LNJ"
Reviews.Content: It's like you're literally in the same room with them. AMAZING technology. Did some really crazy things to get this... but it was SO worth it.

Reviews.Title: Good... but
Reviews.Author: robertlinsj
Reviews.Content: I bought three of these for about 120,000 dollars. It turned out that there was a firefly inside the screen, so it would always be on. Plus I stole some money! I got this for my one year old daughter so that she can tell her friends how rich she is. I am also cousins with Bill Gates. The UPS man yelled at me, and he almost cracked the screen. This TV is pretty good though.

Reviews.Title: After the 5th one....
Reviews.Author: reza
Reviews.Content: You know, i was awfully reluctant to buy a fifth one, after buying 3 for the bathrooms of my mansion, and two for the doghouse, i realized i need one in the kitchen, and i am here reflecting, that it is a solid product, reaching impeccable quality, it ended up loosing a star because the human assistant included in the box ran away, but oh well what can i say, my next one i will waterproof and let it float along my private stretch of ocean space, finally, if they offered it in 8K SUPER ULTRA HD and with 450Hz I would buy a few hundred, samsung please fix  ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

Reviews.Title: Kidney for sale
Reviews.Author: Ron
Reviews.Content: Im selling a kidney, ill throw in a gallbladder if I cannot get enough for the kidney.Wait..ill be able to sit up to watch this television if im minus a kidney yes??

Reviews.Title: Almost. . .
Reviews.Author: Non-reviewer #243
Reviews.Content: While I was really hyped about this TV, I ended up having to return it. What bonehead in R&D; decided to make it so I could NOT hook up my Sony Betamax Sl-9090 VCR Player? It's 2014, dammit! Sheez...

Reviews.Title: In a word, "WORD!"
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: The "Ultra HD" tag does not do it justice.  I'd say it's Super Ultra HD, but that's why I'm not in marketing anymore.I gave it four stars because it didn't cost more money.

Reviews.Title: The perfect Television for those who can't afford their own Movie Theater!
Reviews.Author: Gavin
Reviews.Content: I bought this television a month ago for my wife's 24th birthday. She had asked me for a movie theater, but I just couldn't afford to spend an extra $500 bucks on one! She didn't like it, so she divorced me and is now dating Tom Cruise. I thought "Since I already have it, why don't I give it a spin"! And I haven't regretted that descision yet...If you like this, then your gonna LOVE this: Display MultiSync LCD8205 1920 x1080I bought that one for my son's computer: MSI 2OD 039US Dragon EXTREME Windows

Reviews.Title: SOLD MY WIFE TO GET THIS!!!
Reviews.Author: Sebastian Mayen
Reviews.Content: Had to Buy it, ITs the best thing that Ive ever wanted since my Motorola ROKR E1 or my N-GAGE!!!!

Reviews.Title: Read the fine print
Reviews.Author: Ian D. Spradling "tdkme"
Reviews.Content: I was in the market for a new tv when I saw this bad boy. Thank goodness I live off credit cards because I can keep moving debt around to buy something more important than good credit. Or paying a mortgage. But with a 85" tv that is $4K, you can't beat that. Worse case is I can use this beast to block aide my door from the loan shark when if I don't have the $4k in time while begging for money near stop lights. Thank you Samsung for making my day a little bit brighter (in only 120hz, but who is counting)

Reviews.Title: 85 inches?  Think of it as 216 cm of greatness
Reviews.Author: Mr. X
Reviews.Content: Only 4 stars as I have to hire the window washers from downtown to clean the screen.  Though it doubles as a jumbotron for my kids little league games (mascot not included).

Reviews.Title: Best mediaplayer ever in my car!
Reviews.Author: a.p. majoor
Reviews.Content: For a week now I own this tv and I must say it delivers!My kids love the size of it when we're driving down the highway.We put it right behind the front seats, just put in the usb stick with the animated movies on it and I can tell you: not one word during the whole trip!This tv delivers and I can only recommend it to every car owner!

Reviews.Title: 'Frank's 2000" TV'
Reviews.Author: Robert M. Ponist
Reviews.Content: Now, I'm mighty proud to say (Yeah, I'm mighty proud to say) that now I can watch The Simpsons from 30 blocks away.

Reviews.Title: Only costs 55$ a year to run no way!
Reviews.Author: Rob
Reviews.Content: I like to look at myself as a very eco friendly member of society. Sure I have 5 sports cars in my house in Jupiter Island, FL but one happens to be electric. I am just trying to do my part. Anyways, when I found out this REASONABLE TV was also energy efficient I simply thought well someone has to save the world might as well be me. Just to be more energy efficient I decided the servant quarters did not need AC or heat, go green or go home am I right. My personal favorite thing about this TV is the clarity. My wife can now easily see the blood diamonds she buys from Shop NBC. We can all do our part to make this planet cleaner by buying this TV.

Reviews.Title: Decent tv
Reviews.Author: Libertas
Reviews.Content: I bought this tv because I felt upgrading from my 32in was important. I took out 17 credit cards, each paying a portion of the tv. Best $40k ever spent! Too bad its 11% interest on each card... Got it today and I realized I cannot get it in my apartment! But, no worries! I just used those credit cards to also buy a tent. Now, all my neighbors can watch in awe as I destroy their front yards with sound from this amazing product!

Reviews.Title: I am one happy hobo.
Reviews.Author: Tanner Fausnacht
Reviews.Content: I am a member of CHIOS. "Coalition of Homeless Individuals Opulently Spending". Instead of going to the library (how I am writing this review) and watching Fresh Prince and Cops online, CHIOS gathered together to purchase this product. About 25,000 of us gathered together to contribute. Unfortunately, didn't know where to ship it because we are homeless, so we paid a little extra for one of their drones to drop it off at the local Taco Bell. So all 25k of us are now able to sit in front of this magnificent screen, and pout while Sarah McLaughlin's "In Arms of the Angels" plays in the background to an adorable yet disheartening montage of pouting puppies and kittens. We are now raising funds to go to a Sarah McLaughlin concert. In time we want to raise money for a Solid gold Bugatti, but some of us feel that its a slightly unrealistic goal.

Reviews.Title: Fun to Read Imaginative Reviews
Reviews.Author: Scott L. Zahner, M.D.
Reviews.Content: Always appreciate Good Humor; for that alone I give it 5 - Stars....Sounds like my family; Fun and Enjoy!

Reviews.Title: Reality? Phuuuuffff, this is real...
Reviews.Author: mini puu
Reviews.Content: I cannot express the happiness this new gadget brought to my home, now my wife and I spend most of our free time traveling around the world, surfing the travel channel, experiencing the word in 3d with super high definition. The sad part is that we have to go back to our boring routine in black and white once this amazing TV is off. I mean, the price for cyber monday week is impressive so we decided to take advantage.How can people let this deal pass is out of my comprehension, really people, compared to a high def 50 inch, this beast is out of this world. Just imagine not spending the 30k for this god send beauty and you will realize what you're missing.

Reviews.Title: Just beautiful! Sold my Lamborghini Aventador for a few of these
Reviews.Author: Chris Tran
Reviews.Content: This is probably the only real review of this product and I have to say sitting on the toliet with this 4K TV mounted 5ft away, it's just beautiful especially watching those special kinds of videos on this TV. (;

Reviews.Title: The TV that Mansour bin Zayed Al Nahyan paid for
Reviews.Author: Joe Hart
Reviews.Content: I'm known for making stupid mistakes, but buying this TV is not one of them, besides this set cost only a weeks wages. The picture is great and since I've been getting more weekends off lately I have more time to enjoy it.

Reviews.Title: Utterly Amazing!!
Reviews.Author: sayitaintso
Reviews.Content: I see there is a lot of joking around here about this TV. Well here's a review from someone who actually owns one. It is Superb. I have it in the living room and just ordered one for the bathroom, which is under construction to reinforce the wall so I can hang this 85 incher. The best $40,000.00 X2 (+$7200 sales tax) I have spent, but I couldn't afford this all by myself, so I withheld food from my 8 children for 6 months, and then I had enough public assistance money and food stamps (sold for 0.50 on the dollar) saved to spend on these Beautiful televisions. My kids are ok, so don't worry. That's what emergency rooms and Obamacare are for!Oh, if you're unable to afford cable or satellite, may I suggest the Winegard Amplified Flat Antenna that sticks to your window. I have one of these bad boys, and it pulls in about 14 ota stations. Only costs around $50. The authorities wouldn't allow me to sell any more food stamps for cash, so I had to improvise. At least they let me keep my babies. When I can tear myself away from my Oprah reruns in 4K,  I will have to go to Family Court to get custody of my 8 kids back though.  Momma wants a third TV for the Bedroom!!

Reviews.Title: Too Large, and WHERE ARE ALL THE CHANNELS?!
Reviews.Author: Chris McCabe "regular schmoe"
Reviews.Content: I thought this was 8.5cm. I wanted it for my nightstand. You can imagine how that ended. And I'm missing an inordinate amount of channels. What ... no UHF anymore?!

Reviews.Title: Marked the end of my career.
Reviews.Author: Josh
Reviews.Content: The purchase of this TV marked the end of my career.  Since 2009 I had been working as a movie reviewer for the adult film industry.  Marking the climax of this time was winning the Pull-itzer Prize in 2011 for my review of the now legendary film Money Balls.  After winning that award things in my career began to soften.  I was no longer able to keep it up with the new generation of reviewers who grew up with the internet and DVD’s as opposed to just magazines and VHS tapes.  So in a desperate attempt to get back into the game, I ordered this TV.  I scheduled its arrival to coincide with the big release of World War G.  Unfortunately, the screen is just too big for me and I was never able to bring myself to finish the review.  After four amazing years in the industry, I was forced to pull out.  Over the next two months I lived off of donations to the local reproductive clinic.  Turns out they have a 350 donation limit, so they cut me off.  I was so depressed that I went home and ended up in a straight 72 hour lube fueled bender.  I woke up in the hospital 4 days later suffering from severe dehydration and major nerve damage in both hands.  Unable to pay rent, I was thrust out into the streets.  I sold the TV and have been living in the huge box it came in for the past month.  Fortunately, my doctor said that I should regain the use of my left hand in another couple of weeks.

Reviews.Title: ArAb
Reviews.Author: RFrancheska
Reviews.Content: With my last oil money i will buy an Island in Belize and still have change to build a beach house with coconut.

Reviews.Title: After 200 trips to donate sperm, i finally could afford to buy it!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Eric black
Reviews.Content: This TV AWESOME!!!! And totally worth it. I hope all those women having future babies of mine are as happy with their child as i am to have this TV.  The real bonus is the voice control feature as i cant hold a remote without going into memory triggered jerking spasms.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal on the TV but accessories are overpriced.
Reviews.Author: Laura E. Simmons
Reviews.Content: What a deal for this TV and thank God I am a prime member, I saved a few 100 bucks on shipping ( the tractor trailer did rut my yard up though).  The only reason I am leaving 3 stars is the wall mount was over 500 dollars this is ludicrous, plus I had to rebuild my living room wall to handle the extra weight.  I am also having a hard time finding an equally good deal on a sound system. happy happy happy

Reviews.Title: Ah, I have 1 Kidney for sale. Asking price $40K or one Samsung UN85S9 85-Inch 4K Ultra HD 120Hz 3D Smart LED UHDTV
Reviews.Author: M. A. Shmaitelly
Reviews.Content: Disclaimer: This is in humor and worthy of a laugh.I have 1 Kidneys for sale, I am willing to sell one for $40K or better yet I would accept a new Samsung UN85S9 85-Inch 4K Ultra HD 120Hz 3D Smart LED UHDTV.Be warned the provided Kidney have some defects and may need the help of dialysis Machine. I just hope the Samsung UN85S9 85-Inch 4K Ultra HD 120Hz 3D Smart LED UHDTV would function better than the traded kidney.

Reviews.Title: The Affordable TV Act
Reviews.Author: John Cade
Reviews.Content: I used the federal government's logic to buy this TV.Think about it: it's available to everyone, offers lower monthly costs, but a high initial out of pocket cost.While I can't afford it any more than I could before I bought it, AT LEAST I HAVE IT! In fact, I hear Amazon will be penalizing everyone who DOESN'T buy this TV by 2015! I'm in the clear! Also, you have to pay $40,000 every year to buy this TV, but everything after that will be covered by Amazon.Why didn't they think of this sooner?

Reviews.Title: It Works
Reviews.Author: joshua smith
Reviews.Content: Ok, the alien translator works. This is ZUMLILAK from the planet blarblar.  I recently lost my VF3-Q9-UPUPLULUOMEGA & came across this device.  To my great surprise this device works just as well or is it good?  Thanks to this Prime Shipping I was able to receive the device within 44 CLU -LUs. JAL#IO! 5+F6d56f589#)Q*QQQQ@@###FA  , oops, the translator turned off.  As I was saying, this is a superb device and will assist in my adventures of taking over the galaxy.  Thank you planet Earth and Samsung

Reviews.Title: I'm going to wait a bit.
Reviews.Author: iGreg
Reviews.Content: New electronics always drop in price in a few years. I'll wait about two years. It will probably drop to $20,000 by then

Reviews.Title: Lots of ways to use this besides just a plain old TV
Reviews.Author: Sandra Wiggins
Reviews.Content: 1. When the lake ices up outside, take this baby for a spin on the ice. Because of the 1 billion pixels it has, it glides across the ice much faster and smoother - plus, up to four people can enjoy the ride at once.2.. I needed to replace my garage door and decided this would be much more attractive. Plus, when I display an image on the screen of the inside of my garage, it's so realistic and clear, people actually think the door's open, and drive right through it.3. This office I work at, they told me if I wanted my own desk, I would need to bring one of the doors from my house to use as a desktop. This will be much nicer, and all my co-workers will be super jealous.Thanks Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Good product for the price
Reviews.Author: Mike4625
Reviews.Content: I can see that alot of people aren't taking this product seriously and are just posting for a quick laugh. Having just purchased this television let me just start by saying the picture quality is simply amazing. It arrived here very quickly as I am a prime member with the free two day shipping so I'm happy I didn't have to pay for it to be shipped. I took away a star because it was to big to fit on my wall, however the kids got a pretty nice new clubhouse with the box it came with so that almost makes up for it.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Investment
Reviews.Author: JAGAR
Reviews.Content: Yeah, I give this TV here 5 Stars.  Me and some buddies pooled our money together and bought one to set up our own Drive-In in the front yard.  Started with Redbox video nights, 99 cent vids of course.  This thing will pay for itself in 4 years!  Can cut it to 2 yrs. if we do "Duck Dynasty nights".Only complaint we seem to get is from the cars parked in row 25 about sound quality, its cost us a few refunds. I've already brought this up with the nice Samsung tech person who referred me to the owner's manual.One little tip for ya, the screen rotates and whammo! you got yourself a carport for your truck!  So get all 30 of your buddies and get one!

Reviews.Title: Used remote works
Reviews.Author: charles tinch
Reviews.Content: Loved it. I got mine this last weekend. Me and the kids watched Shrek. The little girl in Keywest was right. I do look like him. Any ways everything was going good to Sunday. You have got to love the Browns.  The screen is vary sensitive. Should have gotten the extend warranty. It was a steel at 3500. OH well be at my local bar this weekend. Any one lose a remote. Only 5000 batteries sold separate. Ps. if you see Tim Tebow tell him we got work in Cleveland. Never understood why we did not sign him. We have QBs that cant throw RBs that cant run and WBs that cant catch. Tim could have filled two of the three spots. One more thing us Cleveland fans were not to happy over that trade to Indianapolis, but look how that work out for them. My be things are looking up for us. Go Browns!

Reviews.Title: Pretty good, but not great
Reviews.Author: matt
Reviews.Content: Picture is good quality.  After a few hours of watching your arms will get tired from waving them all around to work the TV.  Also, you'd think they could make it a real touchscreen, my $200 laptop has that.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Mr. Bathroom
Reviews.Content: Since I spend so much time in the bathroom, I had to get 2 of them. One for the front wall and the second for behind the toilet for when I straddle it and use the bowl for table when eating! It has an amazing picture. It's amazing the peace and tranquility I find watching this while growing a tail. I would suggest anyone who spends as much time in the bathroom as I do to get one of these.

Reviews.Title: This TV is way too bulky! Was much happier with my 13inch B&W;! BOO Samsung :(
Reviews.Author: Mike W
Reviews.Content: This TV is way too bulky to fit in my foyer! Was much happier with my 13inch B&W;! BOO Samsung :(

Reviews.Title: A great tv. Out with the wife, in with the Samsung!
Reviews.Author: Daniel Shanley
Reviews.Content: This tv has a phenomenal picture with the extremely limited amount of actual 4K content available for it. It offers great sound and is sized for the most immersive viewing experience.How did I afford this tv you ask?  Being the complete irrational early adopter that I am, I decided this tv was worth more than my wife. After all, this thing must be a chick-magnet which would ensure a quick replacement. First, I attempted to poison my wife's drink with roofie. Somehow our drinks got mixed up and I woke up 2 days later with a banana in my rectum and my dog humping my face. Next, I tried to suffocate her with a pillow while she was asleep. She woke up, sprang out of bed, threw a kick and broke my nose. I told her that her breath was causing me great displeasure.  My next attempt was to run her over with my car while she was jogging. I crept behind her as she was jogging, but it happened to be someone else with similar workout gear. My car is totaled and I am facing manslaughter charges. After that, I attempted to come from behind and slit her throat. She mule kicked me in the groin and elbowed be in the mouth, knocking my 2 front teeth out.  Ironically, she took me out to dinner and died of embarrassment with my zigzag mosquito nose and hillbilly grill. I got the life insurance settlement and ordered this right away. This Samsung tv was so worth every penny, my car, my freedom, spousal death and physical deformation that I had to go through to get it. Not to mention, it is nearly impossible to bring a woman home with no car or front teeth, so my hands have become rather calloused as of late.

Reviews.Title: that origins movie no one wants to talk about
Reviews.Author: karim guirguis
Reviews.Content: Saving $55 in energy!!!!!! that means it would take 800 years in energy savings for this TV to pay for itself, maybe those bubs that are complaining should be like me and have some adamantine injected in their bones

Reviews.Title: It all makes sense now
Reviews.Author: Joe Milelli
Reviews.Content: I don't know what I did in my post life that was so awful but god paired me with one wildabeast of a wife. This TV saved my marriage. I used to think I was a happy but it all changed the day i ate that wedding cake. During the reception my new wino wife had a few to many bottles of vino. Next thing I know, she is getting plowed on the dance floor by all 13 of my groomsmen. "But baby, don't you want your wife to be satisfied?" No, I dont. What I was hoping for was that 13th penile injection to punctured a major organ. Never happened and I was stuck. Constant yammering about not being happy was driving me to permanently autoerotique asphyxiate myself. I never understood what she meant when she repeatedly said "I need at least 85 inches to make me happy." Then I saw this TV and it all made sense. My wife and I were so much more alike then I realized. We just needed our 85" to make us happy. Who cares if she gets gets from my 13 groomsmen

Reviews.Title: I win again!
Reviews.Author: B. O.
Reviews.Content: I did it.....again. I borrowed money and bought this TV. Im.very happy with it but my Wife is threatening to leave me now.and take my girls and the dogs But it's ok.. I have this TV now.I'd like to thank China for lending me more money even though I had already borrowed $16 trillion already.I think ill end up marrying this TV and give it my last name...Samsung Obama.

Reviews.Title: Smart TV...maybe too smart.
Reviews.Author: TheRedKeep
Reviews.Content: I was in the market for a new television when i came across what i thought was a jewel of a television.  Don't get me wrong, the picture is super clear and makes everything look life like.  I have an xbox 360 and the tv upscales everything to the point where gaming becomes an experience rather than something merely viewed.  I literally have to dodge bullets and jump over cars so that i don't get hurt while playing Grand Theft Auto V.  All was good until the tv broke because of all the heavy bullet damage the tv endured from the latest Call of Duty  I would've destroyed my enemies if it wasn't for all that internet lag. Luckily the tv was covered and replaced by the warranty.  I received my new set and decided why not just upgrade to an xbox one.  Boy, let me tell you....the new Forza Motorsport racing game is RE-DONCulous.  I used my McLaren MP-12 for the first time and underestimated my turn approach.  I came in too hot and crashed into the wall.  The TV was ruined and there was glass shattered everywhere.  I was immediately rushed to the hospital with a separated shoulder, shattered both knees and have 1/4 of all my major organs in tact after surgery.  To all considering buying this TV, please make sure you get the extended warranty and good health insurance if you decide to play any shooter or driving video games,

Reviews.Title: Not sure to rate it a 1 or 5
Reviews.Author: yorciv
Reviews.Content: Well, I purchased it for the size and the vision of reality it provides with 4K resolution. I figured since we sold our house, our cars, most of our junk and other items in storage to purchase Obamacare. We felt this luxury was worth it. We adored it, yes, past tense, adored it. Since we sold our home, we moved into a cave. Since Caves do not have windows, we hooked up the TV to our older, yet compatible, digital movie camera, and game console projector thingy - also hooked up to our outside security camera so we could see the outside world. Picture - in - picture - in - picture - in - picture is a wonderful thing. Well, waking up in a cave can be rather dark. Thank God for the reality vision. The brightness of the screen lit the entire cave. The security camera was showing me the outside view.  It was beautiful outside. I was still a bit groggy from waking and wanted to step outside. Yup, you guessed it, walked right into that full screen 4K reality vision screen. Like I said i was still groggy from waking up. I remembered the sliding glass doors I used at the old home. I could walk directly outside from the bedroom. My scream of pain, the crash, the sudden "lights out" affect, the sparking wires caused as I walked through the screen - scared the dogs, and sent me to the hospital. Well to add insult to injury, I went to the hospital, told them I had Obamacare. They checked the website, it was down. They called the state where I live. The Navigator was sleeping at the key board. When woken up he said, “ Sorry, he does not show as registered and therefore does not have insurance.” Now I owe for the emergency room visit. Then the bank called the other day. They are reposing our cave. So to make a long a story short - the picture is beautiful, the cost is high, the ease of use is, well, easy. However, if you do buy one, be very, very, very careful - I would set up barriers around the screen so you don't accidently try to walk through it. The barriers may however, block your view. On second thought buy the 55 inch....

Reviews.Title: BARGIN
Reviews.Author: Corey miller
Reviews.Content: Do to the recent markdown from 45,000 to 39,000, I could not help but bye three of these. One for the upstairs and two for the basement. What a great deal, it is practically a steal. Also, I bought it because it is a smart TV and I need as much smart as I can get. Maybe three smart will be enough.

Reviews.Title: Long Live ME
Reviews.Author: Dinorah Alvarez
Reviews.Content: that much money for a tv?! in THIS economy!! well then i shall take 8 of them! Lucky for me i was not born among the commoners, but rather flew high above them as my mother gave birth to me in one of my family's many private jets. I plan to use one as my coffee table for the size of it is perfect for me to have my five course meal on while i use the other tv to watch my various favorite shows. The price assures me that i will not have the same tv as any mere commoner.thank the divine gods for bestowing such a treasure among me and my fellow multibillionaire friends.

Reviews.Title: Screen cleaning problems
Reviews.Author: Red Baron
Reviews.Content: First, the picture is gorgeous but is anyone having problems keeping the screen clean? The wife is screaming mad because another Cessna had to be cleaned off the set last night in spite of all the low flying aircraft warning signs we put up. Our attorney is working on forcing the city to relocate the airport, but these things take time.

Reviews.Title: TV > Mercedes
Reviews.Author: Taurus Hall
Reviews.Content: Had to trade in my brand new Mercedes to purchase this bad boy, but it was well worth it. Now I'm coming out of retirement to go back to work.

Reviews.Title: ultra tv and porn watching experience. jzzz
Reviews.Author: B. Nguyen "Yes?"
Reviews.Content: 4k porn here we go!pro)porn: never looks better I can literally taste the onscreen entertainmentcost: 40k this is cheaper than my ferarri which only had an 8" screenflippy style: don't like watching commercial? give it a kick and it will flip up. Please train yourself so you don't over kickcons)- Very limited 4k porn available, you would have to buy your own Red Epic camera and shoot your own footage.- only 3 available? I need like 6 to filled all the sides of my room. what am i going to look at when i look behind me?!?!?P.S when you do please share

Reviews.Title: beware
Reviews.Author: thomas
Reviews.Content: This television arrived and BAM!!! Life is good now. Some women in bikinis popped out of the box with it and set up a volleyball net in my living room. Sad to say I don't want to watch the TV now.... Remember this when you drop 40 grand on it. Lesson learned.

Reviews.Title: Alphabet.
Reviews.Author: Ordinary guy "Ordinary guy"
Reviews.Content: An alphabet is a standard set of letters (basic written symbols or graphemes) which is used to write one or more languages based on the general principle that the letters represent phonemes (basic significant sounds) of the spoken language. This is in contrast to other types of writing systems, such as syllabaries (in which each character represents a syllable) and logographies (in which each character represents a word, morpheme, or semantic unit).

Reviews.Title: Dont be conned!!
Reviews.Author: PHILIP M NAYLOR
Reviews.Content: There is no 4K content being broadcast at the moment worth seeing, internet speeds to carry this hi-def would have to be so fast Superman wouldn't be able to keep up with it, no standardised compression algorithms which means it could be outdated next week, and it's waaaaaaay over-priced!!Do some research first on 4K and you'll see.(My daughter is breathing a sigh of relief too...no slavery for her as a comfort girl at the local jail to pay for it!! lol)

Reviews.Title: HELP!!
Reviews.Author: Trey marshall
Reviews.Content: I managed to save  $6.43 towards this bad boy! I called samsung and asked about there flexible pay plan!! I sent them the $6.43 and boy was I disappointed :/ they sent the free batteries an...... WAIT!,

Reviews.Title: Robbo
Reviews.Author: kin
Reviews.Content: My friend Robbo said he didn't believe in full HD and that I had to prove it to him by buying one of these, so I bought 2 of these and gave him one.  Hmmm ... Somehow I feel like I've been robbed.

Reviews.Title: From Milton Wadams
Reviews.Author: Andy Cunningham
Reviews.Content: Um yes, this is Milton Wadams.  I was told by Bill that I could buy this TV, as long as I kept it at a reasonable volume. told Bill that if I didn't get this TV, I was going to burn down the building.  With this TV, I can see the squirrels, and they were merry.  I told Samsung that the TV had to be red, like my Swingline stapler, or I would burn down their building.

Reviews.Title: Best bang for you buck
Reviews.Author: victor i perez
Reviews.Content: I was deciding between this tv and buying a new car. So I choose this tv and I can watch car commercial and feel like I can sit in any car but a click of a button. The real life picture quality is amazing to say the least. As I was watching the walking dead series , it felt like I was in the action and even tried poking the governors other eye out. Wow, intense moment. Back to the tv quality. I have since removed the door from our room and put the tv in its place of the whole wall and decided it would just be more practical to enter through the window ( movie like experience with no interruptions ) , also decides to go ahead and get a sound system but put the tv in first and can't fit the tower speakers through the window. Smh .... Stupid me. Word of advise. If you decide to purchase this tv 1. You a complete moron 2. Really 40k 3. Jump off a bridge head first no strings or parachute attached and aim for a rock to knock some sense back in to you.

Reviews.Title: The new Islam!
Reviews.Author: crazycatlady
Reviews.Content: There is this new glorious religion!  It is called Samsunginism.  You buy this tv, and when you die, you get 20,000 beers and bags of pretzels, and infinite football time forever!  Allah Akbar Samsung!

Reviews.Title: Needs to be more solid
Reviews.Author: dkjensen
Reviews.Content: My wife and I bought one for the kids because the previous smart tv in the guest game room didn't have the clarity and size their friends wanted. They often use the room to play on the Sega Genesis, as old school games are the current fad. Since Sega doesn't have the highest resolution, we thought a cheaper tv like this would suffice. The problem is the screen strength. My son convinced his friend that the tv doubled as a portal to Dimension X.
