The screen broke when he tried to fly one of my drones through it to "spy on the Neutrinos". It was worth the prank, but now we want something more solid.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't come with Scart!!
Reviews.Author: Josh Rigby
Reviews.Content: So I went to plug in my VHS player and it doesn't have one? I only brought this to watch my low def cat videos and well... now I can't. I'll stick to looking out the window, the picture is 8k outside :)

Reviews.Title: Delivery issue
Reviews.Author: battybats
Reviews.Content: Ordered this TV the other day, and the delivery guys left it at my door. And wouldn't you know it? Someone walks off with my new TV! Ah well, such is life.

Reviews.Title: Is this thing Saorview compatable?
Reviews.Author: Owen O'Connor
Reviews.Content: I'm not going to spend all my jobseeker's benefit on it if I can't get the lotto numbers on Aertel

Reviews.Title: Too slow
Reviews.Author: Alexander Glover
Reviews.Content: My Samsung 85-inch TV wasn't fast enough.  I was hoping to win some more races with this thing but so far my $40,000 has gotten me a piece of metal headed straight for the junk yard.

Reviews.Title: ... anything that already exist in a slightly less insanely great design and functionality for an
Reviews.Author: Philippe Timothee "out there"
Reviews.Content: Apple just filed a complaint on the ground that only them can sell anything that already exist in a slightly less insanely great design and functionality for an... insanely great and absurd price.

Reviews.Title: Samsung blowz
Reviews.Author: Aaron
Reviews.Content: idk...my dad bot this for my Xmas presnt. he tride to hide it in are other hous. i fownd out thats wear he hidez all the presentz a long time ago. anywayzzzz, my boy tj down the street sayz hiz dad got him a 300 inch fer Xmas on hiz fb status for like NOTHIN. I no it's tru cuz like why wuld he ly??anywayyyyyy...u also cant bring it with u on like road trips...wtf?!!! how els do i play video gamez when i vizit my frend tj in the car? Iv gotten sooo used to shoooting peeps that r like giants, when i play on the tvs in my car it's like shooting elves. likkkkke wtf??? shooting elves AIN"T COOL BRO.idk.I relly hate it doesnt detect hwen i wake up and fall asleep to tern off and on. sometimez i can't find the remot and hav to call my dad to tern it on.What a piece of crap. samsung blowz big ones.

Reviews.Title: Too big for trunk!!!
Reviews.Author: JoeYGunZ
Reviews.Content: Needed an extra TV for the trunk lid of Honda Civic but West Coast Customs couldn't make it fit. #PimpMyRide

Reviews.Title: Saved my marriage!
Reviews.Author: Buck the System
Reviews.Content: To the dismay of my already less-than-fulfilled wife, I recently purchased a 2015 EXP 9F Concept SUV. It's engineered by Bentley and I had to be the first, which, as you know, entails a steep price tag. She flew off at the handle, assuring me we couldn't afford the payments until McDonald's doubles our wages. I had to think quick, and then it hit me - new purse! While perusing through Amazon's rather disappointing selection, I came across this bad boy. How, you say? Because I'm a bearded man who would never look at purses to begin with, I go straight to electronics. I need this Herculean piece of technology for myself. After checking the specs, I was confident it wasn't controlled by NSA {Team Edward (Snowden) here}, but rather what God used to DVR our sins and Breaking Bad with. In an attempt to feel Christlike and closer to God, I purchased it on a whim. Running low on funds and at my credit limit, I did what I do every year: I bought it during Daylight Savings Time. If you buy something online in an hour that never existed, the system recognizes the purchase but never charges you. Boom! I found the frequency, Kenneth! Anyway, back to my discontent wife... With the money I saved, I bought a ceiling mount for this puppy and, since I do all the work, she doesn't even notice I only last 2 minutes anymore. I'm merely a commercial break to her. And now when she says "Oh God", I know she's not talking to me, she's talking to God through the TV since Breaking Bad is over. RIP Walter, we see you!

Reviews.Title: S to the A to the M sung
Reviews.Author: A Concerned Citizen
Reviews.Content: Stop.Drop.Shut `em down, open up shop.Oh.No.That's how Samsung TVs roll!Where my TV at? Holler.

Reviews.Title: Great Value!!!
Reviews.Author: Kurt Kistler
Reviews.Content: I wanted to pay for the rest of my life but instead I decided to go ahead and ruin my life by spending my money on a tv, which only shows me a false world that doesn't exist anyway.  What a great purchase.  Thanks Samsung.

Reviews.Title: Cinema
Reviews.Author: Mr. J. C. Furie
Reviews.Content: Can you advise on quality? I'm thinking of starting a cinema on a budget 3 screens for less than 100 grand, let the money roll.

Reviews.Title: Brian Farley says Pizza feature good, but not in combination with 5d feature- lacks rain suits
Reviews.Author: Brian Farley
Reviews.Content: This tv is actually 5d and ultra high res.  Its 5d features including realistic vomit.  When watching a show that involves a character vomiting, the television actually vomits on you via 2 super high pressure vomit spray jets subtly built into the sides of the stand which are almost invisible.  Also, it has an "order pizza" function on the remote.  When pressed the television offers a "delivery quality" pizza from the rear speaker.  The quality is good, but "delivery quality" is a questionable adjective.  Most of my friends considered the tv pizza similar to Digorno or possibly Hungry Howies/Little Caesars, but this is no Pizza Hut or Papa Johns.  For the price you expect these type of features, but be very careful not to watch a documentary about "Cafeteria Lunchroom Stomach Sickness Outbreaks" after you have just used the "order pizza" function, it is a bad, bad combination.  Also, for the price, the 5d vomit function should include sometype of rain gear.  Sure, digitized, wet vomit from your television is exciting, BUT VERY MESSY!  Come one Samsung, how bout a rain suit with the 3d glasses?

Reviews.Title: Excellent and cheap utility TV
Reviews.Author: Padmanabhan Viswanathan
Reviews.Content: Excellent TV. I wanted a small 85 inch TV for my gym in my private island near jamaica. I usually buy 200 inch tv's, but this one is ok for a gym and at 40K, it is damn cheap. All my other 200 inch TV's cost a million each. Keep it coming Samsung.ps - It would be great if you can make a 100inch tv. I have a 100 inch space in my kitchen on my private jet. Let me know.

Reviews.Title: Good things come to those who wait!!!
Reviews.Author: Nadine Darmanie Evans
Reviews.Content: Oh JOY! Finally! Something fitting to go on my rocket ride to the moon next year! Eat your heart out Branson.........

Reviews.Title: cheap tv
Reviews.Author: D. Lando
Reviews.Content: pffft... all these good reviews on this TV dont make sense. Step up your game and get the bigger one..... cmon now this thing is obsolete by like 3 minutes.. thats basically an eternity for electronics.

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: Gabe
Reviews.Content: I saw the tv fell in love with of course like many didnt have money but I decided to be a test subject for a hospital and not I don't have any balls but I have a huge tv :) I can practically feel the balls of the tv

Reviews.Title: Finally saved up enough money to buy this TV.... WOW
Reviews.Author: Candy Star Adkins
Reviews.Content: As a single mother of 6 kids, I admit it was difficult to save up enough money to purchase this TV.  For three whole months, I sold my food stamps and struggled to keep myself from spending my government assistance checks on cigarettes and fast food.  I really missed my steak dinners the last few months but it was worth the sacrifice to buy this TV.  The kids get free breakfast and lunch at school so they really only got hungry at dinner and on the weekends.All 6 of the dads are deadbeats and it angered me to spend the child support payments on feeding my children instead of getting my hair and nails done.  I fought through the pain and finally saved enough money to order this TV.  Since my Hummer was in the shop getting 25 inch rims, I couldn't pick the TV up at the store and I decided to order it online.I live in a state where Amazon does not collect sales tax so ordering it online saved me a few thousand dollars as well.  I avoid paying sales tax at all cost and don't have a job to avoid income tax.  I tell my friends that my children are my paycheck and I am excited to announce that I am 6 months pregnant with number 7.  Hopefully I can figure out who the dad is before I give birth so I can put him on the birth certificate and hold him hostage for child support for the next 18 years.  Either way, having another child should put my monthly government assistance checks at around $20,000 so I figure I can scrape by.So anyway..... back to the TV.  I regret to announce that the box arrived today but it was too big to fit in my trailer.  I'm not sure what I am going to do yet but I will make sure to post an update when I decide.

Reviews.Title: Best Tv for a Steal
Reviews.Author: Christopher
Reviews.Content: First of all the price blew my mind, it was soooo cheap. I bought each of my sons this for Christmas, and all four of them are very satisfied. Personally my marriage was going down the drain, but after this purchase, its bonding powers allowed us to rekindle our passion for each other. Once again the price was amazing. Not only is it cheap, but it's 4k technology makes my world HD. This might have affected how my wife and I rekindled our passion. At any rate BUY THIS TV, it's CHEAP and life changing. Your spouse will thank you.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IS BLIND
Reviews.Author: jim mahaffa
Reviews.Content: I am a 59 year old male and I have always lived with my parents. The reason I live there is because I dont work and oh yeah my drug habit (as mom calls it) Dad died a few years in a drunk driving accident so now its just me and my 96 year old Mom. I knew after last Christmas I wanted to get Mom a better gift then the Depends I bought her. Mom gets her check every month and hides it. She dont need it cause our house trailer is paid for. I have been borrowing ( ha ha) Moms money as I always have but instead of buying drugs I put the money back and bought her this TV. Borrowing her money is alot easier the dealing on the corner.Not knowing how much time mom has left because of her smoking 3 packs of smokes a day I gave her the TV early.  Mom was blind but with this TV she was healed by placing her hand on the screen and touching the heeling preachers hand. Its was like he was in the room with her. Now Mom enjoys The Price is Right show not that she is healed CAN I AMAN

Reviews.Title: Amazing Picture and Price
Reviews.Author: Gary
Reviews.Content: Yes my whole family has fallen in love with the stunning picture quality. We did however need to sell our vehicles in order to buy it.. but it's so worth the price. Living in luxury is the best especially when you have this high class tv. Why buy a low class one for $38,000 less? Don't think.  Just buy it and live in poverty.

Reviews.Title: Thank you, Samsung!
Reviews.Author: marush denchev
Reviews.Content: When I sold my house and bought this TV everyone though I was crazy! "You are mad", they say! Now I live under it when it is raining or too sunny, I usually sleep over it .. ah the heat is so good for my back pain.

Reviews.Title: You are "Bound 2" love this TV
Reviews.Author: Kanye West
Reviews.Content: Only I should be able to get this TV cuz I am a GOD! You can't afford this TV unless you a GOD. Me and Kim gonna watch Keeping up With the Kardashians on it while they film us watching it. Then we gonna watch ALL my music videos on it. The TV is so clear, I can see all my perfections on it. Now, Kim can learn how to make macaroni necklaces in 4K Ultra HD. My baby so smart! Don't forget to pick up my album Yeezus!

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: Hi, I'm Dareel and I work at WalMart. Good thing I get food stamp advancements, because I had to use mine, my four baby mama's, and my ten children's advancements to pay for this tv. Now that someone stole it from my Caprice w/ 26" rims, I have to figure out what I'm going to do for food. Worth the few days I had it, though. I enjoyed watching myself on the Walmart Commercials.

Reviews.Title: Something is seriously messed up here
Reviews.Author: Nick W
Reviews.Content: $40,000 for an 85" or $1,200 for their 65"...The only good thing about its being $40,000 is that it has some awesome reviews!Samsung UN65EH6000 65 Inch 1080p 120Hz

Reviews.Title: Turns any apartment in a poon palace
Reviews.Author: Sherman11teen
Reviews.Content: I relecently sold my house and used my profits to buy this TV and got myself a small apartment and let me tell you... No regrets.  I get so much poon with this TV I was able to sell my fleshlight on Craigslist. I get way more sloppy poon then I ever did when I owned a house and a car. My kids don't talk to me anymore but doesn't matter because 18yr old honey pots talking to me know.  I might be 55 but I still get a pretty nice rager. Buy this tv

Reviews.Title: Great picture
Reviews.Author: Gibson Les Paul "Guitar God in the making"
Reviews.Content: This TV is great.  I have to recommend it to all of my colleagues.Sure, it's a little pricey; but not unreasonably so.  I just spent the past 6 months developing a website that was supposed to pay $94 million.  But the guys at the office had a little meeting and we decided that we could make way more money if we launched the website and it didn't work.  We didn't hire any new developers for the website, at all.  Just downloaded a couple of "off the shelf" templates and threw in some graphics and some numbers, then let the thing launch.Let me tell you, it crashed BIG TIME!!! LOL.  Just as expected.So now, I've got a crew of 4 guys working on this thing for about 6 hours a day.  Small cost.  But the kicker is, we are billing out almost $300 million for one freaking website!!! CAN YOU BELIEVE THAT!!!!????Everyone on the team is getting one of these babies, along with new homes, new sports cars, and new wives from the Middle East.Thanks Obama!  Thanks Obamacare!

Reviews.Title: Best TV on planet
Reviews.Author: Hannah O'Donoghue
Reviews.Content: Me and my partner have recently just hit and run a close family member in order to get our hands on one of these beauties, we are delighted with the quality and clarity, my boyfriend said it was worth it as he can now play his Xbox One in great detail

Reviews.Title: The "product dimensions" are for the outer frame, not the screen
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "homeschool helper"
Reviews.Content: the "product dimensions" are listed as follows: LED Design: TV without stand (Width x Height x Depth): 78.9" x 64.4" x 2.8", TV with stand (Width x Height x Depth): 78.9" x 64.4" x 22.9"Checking Samsung's own product page they list these same dimensions, but with a graphic that shows just what those dimensions are counting...these are not the screen dimensions, but the dimensions of the outer frame (see here: [...]).The "without stand" description may lead one to conclude that the dimensions as listed otherwise would be just for the screen, but check it out on Samsung and you can see for yourself that they don't provide here or on Samsung the actual screen dimensions.  For $40,000 you might like to know the screen dimensions other than the 85" diagonal figure (which probably isn't exact).

Reviews.Title: Wow
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: If you want a TV that costs more than your trailer this is the TV for you. The s***ter is full Clark!!

Reviews.Title: The gift that keeps on giving
Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: I've owned this television for a year now, and let me tell you! I originally bought this bad boy on a whim - back in my more spendthrift days - though retrospectively I can say with confidence that this is the best purchase I've ever made.At first I regretted the steep price tag, but now those days are behind me. After checking out my electric bills since switching to this new Samsung, I've saved a whole $28 just from its energy efficiency.Now, I know what you're probably thinking, "Just how can I believe this dubious rating?" Well, I wouldn't have believed it either when I first gave my Samsung UN85S9 85-Inch 4K Ultra HD 120Hz 3D Smart LED TV a try, so go ahead and check out the Energy Guide in the product's image gallery.The energy savings alone have brought my family closer together. Now, we can finally afford our kitchen staff to make roasted lamb for supper each Wednesday, and thanks to the Samsung's swivel feature there are no excuses for the kids to be distracted from what's served on the table.

Reviews.Title: Life changer
Reviews.Author: Tytek
Reviews.Content: I just bought this TV a few months ago, and it literally changed my life. I can now watch anything and everything on it, even in a foreign language, and I understand all of it. I don't even have to watch the whole movie to know the ending - this TV is that good!My love life got better too. Mainly due to my 401k swelling based on investment tips I picked from programs that only air on this TV. They are delivered by none other than Warren Buffett himself, and he does it in his pajamas! With all the new found cash flow, I am driving top dollar cars - my daily is a Veyron convertible, while my track car is a Sebastian Vettel's current F1 car; he just let's me use it off season, but I promised not to beat his pole position times on the tracks around the world. I get there easily, with my Boeing 747 Cargo that carries a Prevos motor home, and Nevell motor lake cabin home.Thank god for this TV, otherwise, I'd have to keep a job and go there 5 days a week. Right now, I just wake up to a room full of fresh flowers, and a dozen doves get released everytime I enter my bathroom - it has a Times Square view, as I like to pee into my golden, diamond encrusted urinal, while looking at the crowds at my feet. It may be perverted in its nature, but with the success I have experienced by buying this TV... how can you judge me. Get one for yourself. It is the best $40k you WILL EVER SPEND! DOEET!PS. This was written by my assistant, as I am too busy watching my new TV and counting all the cash, fending off all the gold digging models and royal princesses, who want a part of the action.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't play VCR tapes well...
Reviews.Author: Larry
Reviews.Content: I have a 42" Sanyo TV I bought a few years ago at a WalMart Black Friday sale at 330 am that I had a hard time giving up for this 85" Samsung. It took a lot of convincing to trade my old reliable TV for something this big, new and expensive.  After finally learning how to program my VCR with the correct date and time and hooking it up to my current TV I found it disconcerting to find that it doesn't work the same with this TV as it does with my Sanyo.  If you had one with a built in VCR or at least the RCA jacks I might keep it but since I have no desire to try to rebuild my current VCR library with DVD's or Blu-Ray's I was forced to return it and keep my old 42" Sanyo.  Now I need an 8-track adapter for my AMC Pacer so I can play my Mitch Miller 8-tracks.

Reviews.Title: Steal Of A Deal!!!
Reviews.Author: Chauncey Alexander
Reviews.Content: Found two of these bad boys during a Black Friday sale as an "open box" item. Disregard any extended warranty - as you will want to purchase one of the newer models before this one bites the dust..BTW, you do know all the cost is primarily in the packaging....

Reviews.Title: I'll wait for Apple TV
Reviews.Author: Paulg35c
Reviews.Content: As I beam back to reality - really 39000!It's not even worth it. All 4k is a bigger pixel. Soon there will be 5 k 240mhz.. For the price it better be some Star Wars 4d s***! Rock on Samsung ! Make it better

Reviews.Title: Who needs a fish tank when you've got this!
Reviews.Author: Z. Matthews
Reviews.Content: I was going to spend $50k on a fish tank built into the main wall in my living room. Boy am I glad i bought this instead! I bought a budget computer (didnt want to spend much more) to hook up to this bad boy and am running one of those cool "fish tank" screen savers instead. I look at it as a brilliant $10,000 decision!

Reviews.Title: badassness!
Reviews.Author: ikeroop
Reviews.Content: I sold my house so I could buy this television set but now I have no place to put it. No bedroom, no bathroom, no living room, no dining room. Its just me, my friend, the remote, and this badass TV. All 85 inches of it. Well, actually the remote is about 11 inches, I'm about 75 inches, and a dear friend of mine is another 7 inches. That adds up to a whopping 178 inches of badassness! totally worth it!

Reviews.Title: Thank you Antiques Roadshow
Reviews.Author: ClockMan
Reviews.Content: On a whim I bought  an unusual knick-knack from Goodwill which I decided to bring to the Antiques Roadshow which was hosting a show in my hometown.  Well, guess what?  What I thought was a worthless piece of crap turned out to be worth $40-50K so I put it on Sotheby's and it fetched over $100K but with the fees and middlemen I had to pay, I was left with $44K, just enough to pay for this TV with tax.  The first shipment was damaged but since the delivery person had already left, Amazon agreed to send in their heavy duty drones to pick it up.  They had the foresight to deliver a brand new one using the drone so the damaged one was loaded and returned on the same day.  You should have seen the commotion in my cul-de-sac when the drone arrived.  It looked like a full sized helicopter but without a live person.  In its place, there was a bot in the driver's seat with a TV monitor head of the person navigating the drone, sort of like Sheldon in Big Bang Theory when he decided to stay home and send his bot off with Lenoard. The TV quality was OK but honestly, didn't seem that much better than watching my $99 13" 720p Coby TV sitting closeup at  around 1 foot away.  I took 2 stars off because for the price, it should have at least a 240Hz or even a 480Hz refresh rate.

Reviews.Title: Well worth the money!
Reviews.Author: Biff Richy Rich
Reviews.Content: The wife and I were discussing whether we should go on a world tour, buy a new Lexus or donate to the needy.  After a short thought process and listening to Rush Limbaugh we realized all of those would suck!  Especially helping those needy people!  We decided to buy this TV and rub it into our less successful friends and families faces.  Boy was that worth it!  Thanks Rush, Cheney and Bush,Santorum and all the other Right Wing Douche Bags for keeping us.on track...........!

Reviews.Title: Ten Thousand Dollars per K?
Reviews.Author: Amazonian
Reviews.Content: First of all for the price,  This means that I paid ten thousand dollars for each K.  And they're not even fair about it. I asked if I could get only 1k and they said that if I don't buy all 4 then it's twelve thousand each.  What kind of a scam are they running? I don't even have cable. And all it would use is 2 ks anyway, even if I did. But I just have my trusty old antenna which gives me 1k resolution.  In the end I couldn't deal with the hassle and just shelled out for all 4 Ks.  All and all it's a nice tv but now I don't know where to put my kitchen because I am part of the tiny house movement and this just took up 1/3 of my home.  So in goes the tv, out goes the kitchen!

Reviews.Title: Not smart at all.
Reviews.Author: Blake Jones
Reviews.Content: My uncle had recently damaged his older television in a drunken rage, so my family go together on Thanksgiving to pool our money to purchase him a new television. Thanks to our sound investments, we had an excess of money we were willing to donate, and were able to purchase a new television. In our drunken stupor, we had decided to spend all the money we had pooled, which turned out to be exactly the price of this television set.His home is a maze of strangely shaped walls, broken doors, and piles of dirty clothing. The delivery driver had an assistant help move the television set, but they were unfortunately trapped in the stairwell, and the television had fallen and broke the assistant's back. Luckily the television was undamaged, as that was our main concern (we do pay for obamacare, so it shouldn't be an issue anyway for the assistant).Unfortunately a thunderfly did get in between the cracks. If you haven't had in insect in your monitor or television before count yourself lucky. Due to this blemish, he had kicked it several times, but it was undamaged, however repel rodent droppings did drop from the top, we are unsure if they were from the purchase or if rodents decided to use it as a lavatory. However, due to the recent poor weather, a pipe had burst and we found out that the television was not 'smart' enough to repel water. You'd think a television, which is frequently around liquids such as soda, bodily fluids, wet paint, and melted ice cream would be water repellent, but again samsung dropped the ball. They asked us to send it in to repair it, and I was giving out the information, but my S4 glitched and it dropped the call. Sometimes I feel if Samsung is spying on us and they did it on purpose so we wouldn't get a replacement. Smart phone indeed.

That money will go into a special fund, which will be used to be one of these marvelous televisions for EVERY SINGLE AMERICAN! That's right! You get a TV, and you get a TV, and even Rush Limbaugh gets a TV!Once every American has one of these TV's in their home... which of course you all deserve, why, all of our woes will disappear! You can be instantly transported wherever you wish to go, all from the safety of your own home. Why get a job when you can watch marathons of the Kardashians or Duck Dynasty or even the Bad Girls Club??And for those Americans who don't have any housing? Reviews.Title: Amazing Display if you can afford it.
Reviews.Author: Marshall
Reviews.Content: Honestly I love some of the comments here. Good to know we all can have a sense of humor! On the serious side, I have never seen such a awesome picture off a flat panel display, especially when you actually have REAL 3840 x 2160p (UHD) material to feed it. This thing has so much detail you need to sit closer to it to see it than your would for a normal HD panel. Up conversion from 1920 x 1080 looks pretty good too, but doesn't hold a candle to real 2160p. The display does pivot some, and can moved vertically on the supporting frame. The speakers are in the frame, and considering the restraints of doing that sound amazingly good. Since the UHD standard isn't yet written (look for it late 2014 or the following year) Samsung supplies HDMI 1.4 inputs in a small plug-in box they call "One Connect." This gives them room to add Display Port, HDMI 2.0, or whatever the UHD standard will call for without replacing the set. The only negative comment I can make is for UHD, the display isn't big enough. You need a display at least 10' wide to appreciate the resolution of UHD at a "normal" viewing distance. Human vision just isn't that good. Samsung should consider building a projector in this price range. Their last venture in projection, the HD SPA900, has turned into something of a legend, achieving a price / performance level no other manufacturer has even come close to.

That's when I saw the TV, and it was amazing!  It showed me exactly what I wanted to see in ultra high definition.  I took my best friend to see it the next day, but we couldn't agree on what to watch.I sneaked out to watch the TV several times.  The same show was always on, but it was my favorite.  But then the headmaster caught me.  He was pretty cool about it, though.  He told me I could waste away watching ultra HD television for the rest of my life, and none of it would ever be real.  He moved the TV, and I moved on.I did run into it again a little later, but the channel had changed...plus, I was distracted by some crazy stuff going on in the room.  I wonder where it is now...

I would recommend the OPPO BD-105 Blue-Ray player if you don't already have one, a thousand or so dollars well spent.Overall, I can definitely recommend the Samsung tv for a theater room in your home.

Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "jl952"

Once outside the box it takes on a life of its own and grows at a rapid rate as it balloons from its shipping weight of 21 pounds to its full operating weight of just over 189 lbs. Once it attains its full weight the picture is unbelievable. I would really like to know the technology behind all this as I could save a lot on postage.Update - seems they maybe fixed the weight or maybe it went the other way. At first the shipping rate was listed as 21 lbs now it says 319 lbs. As the product weight is 189 lbs I guess you get a lot of protection and foam for $40K. Will keep you updated. But I haven't seen this model in stores so if you want it buy on Amazon and use your Prime delivery.

Reviews.Title: SAMSUNG MAKES DEFECTIVE TELEVISIONS - COSTLY REPAIRS - NO CUSTOMER SERVICE
Reviews.Author: Just Sayin'
Reviews.Content: *****W A R N I N G*****Do not buy SAMSUNG Televisions!!!  Maybe $2,500.00 - $3,000.00 is not a lot of money for some folks to spend on a television, but it is to me.  This is money I'll never get back, nor derive true enjoyment, nor value from due to the DEFECTIVE SAMSUNG product that I purchased.  After the one year warranty period SAMSUNG Television screens tend to show burn-in and ghosting with horizontal lines, along with very heavy distortion of picture on right side of screen.  This problem is systemic in all their LCD's and LED's.  Consumer's have complained all over the internet.  There are even numerous Youtube postings with the exact same problems as in my DEFECTIVE SAMSUNG model, as well as the same DEFECT in many other DEFECTIVE SAMUNG models.  This defect occurs upon start-up, and lasts for the first 15 minutes of trying to view a program. Then the picture gets progressively worse over time and continuously declines.I tried SAMSUNG's Executive Customer Relations Dept. and was told:  "We will do nothing but refer you to a local Authorized Repair Shop."  They were downright blunt and rude to boot!  I feel robbed of $2,900.00!Furthermore, I was informed that the repair will consist of a diagnosis visit, and then another visit to install a replacement "Panel" that costs $1,300.00 for the part plus $279.00 to install, plus taxes......all told, another $1,719.16....at which point the technician basically stated, "just buy another TV."SAMSUNG customer service also told me that their Televisions depreciate at a rate of 20% per year, and that they do not repair any of their products after 4 years!  Their own repair people told me to just buy a new set!!!If I save one family the heartache of losing they're hard-earned money on SYSTEMICALLY DEFECTIVE SAMSUNG TELEVISIONS, and a company that offers zero customer service....I'll be happy!  God bless....SAMSUNG CONS:No Customer SupportSystemic Panel DefectGhosting of imagesBurn-in on screenDistorted pictureVery expensive to repair
